Meanwhile, Peyton steps in to help Major, and Blaine issues a warning. Lastly, Ravi's unexpected romantic connection has the potential to make things awkward for Liv.

tvmaze1589_0009_0001_0009.name: Patriot Brains
tvmaze1589_0009_0001_0009.summary: Liv and Clive investigate the mysterious death of a former sniper, Everett, who has been working as an instructor at a paintball facility. They begin questioning family members including Everett's ex-wife and her new husband Sean and realize things are not what they seem. Meanwhile, Major continues to get closer and closer to the truth, and Blaine does the unthinkable.

tvmaze1589_0010_0001_0010.name: Mr. Berserk
tvmaze1589_0010_0001_0010.summary: Liv and Clive investigate the murder of a journalist working on a story linking psychotic episodes in a small number of consumers to the energy drink Max Rager. Liv goes straight to the top at Max Rager HQ and questions the man in charge, Vaughn Du Clark. Meanwhile, Ravi tries to help Major who continues to believe he's going crazy.

tvmaze1589_0011_0001_0011.name: Astroburger
tvmaze1589_0011_0001_0011.summary: When someone close to Major dies of an apparent suicide, Liv consumes the brains resulting in a mix of reality and paranoia. Clive questions Major and learns of a secret computer file that may contain important details in the investigation - and finding the killer.

tvmaze1589_0012_0001_0012.name: Dead Rat, Live Rat, Brown Rat, White Rat
tvmaze1589_0012_0001_0012.summary: High School Redux - A group of drunken teenagers take a late night joyride with disasters consequences. As they cover up the accident, the man mysteriously comes back to life and attacks one of the girls. After Liv consumes the girl's brain, she is taken back to high school as she and Clive investigate the case. A surprise death of one of the victim's friends raises some serious questions about the case. Major believes Blaine's deli is not all it seems to be.

tvmaze1589_0013_0001_0013.name: Blaine's World
tvmaze1589_0013_0001_0013.summary: After discovering new evidence in the Max Rager case, Liv and Clive pay a visit to Vaughn Du Clark at Max Rager HQ. Ravi continues his search for a cure. Meanwhile, Blaine makes Liv an offer she can't refuse. Lastly, Major finds himself in an unbelievable situation.

tvmaze1589_0014_0002_0001.name: Grumpy Old Liv
tvmaze1589_0014_0002_0001.summary: Liv deals with the aftermath of Major's death, Blaine's cure, and Evan's injuries in the explosion. Meanwhile, she consumes the brain of an old man and takes on his worst traits while trying to figure out who murdered him.

tvmaze1589_0015_0002_0002.name: Zombie Bro
tvmaze1589_0015_0002_0002.summary: While Liv eats the brain of a frat boy to help Clive solve his murder, Major agrees to go with Ravi to a club and observe him on Utopium. Meanwhile, Blaine turns to his father Angus for money so he can pay off the DA to go after a rival drug dealer.

tvmaze1589_0016_0002_0003.name: Real Dead Housewife of Seattle
tvmaze1589_0016_0002_0003.summary: Liv eats the brain of a rich dead housewife to try and solve her murder, and learns that she's connected to Vaughn. Meanwhile, Major meets Gilda, and Peyton returns to Seattle.

tvmaze1589_0017_0002_0004.name: Even Cowgirls Get the Black and Blues
tvmaze1589_0017_0002_0004.summary: Liv works a case of a dead country-and-western-singer and the eaten brain begins to awaken feelings in her about how Major has been treating her. Meanwhile, Peyton crashes at Major and Ravi's place, Clive makes the acquaintance of a female FBI agent, and Major hits rock bottom.

tvmaze1589_0018_0002_0005.name: Love & Basketball
tvmaze1589_0018_0002_0005.summary: A moonlighting kid's basketball coach is shot while working as a security guard. Liv eats his brain and takes on his personality as a take-no-prisoners coach, just in time to deal with Major's depression. Meanwhile, Blaine gives Ravi some of the tainted Utopium so he can develop a cure, and Gilda begins to question Major's commitment to Max Rager's anti-zombie efforts.

tvmaze1589_0019_0002_0006.name: Max Wager
tvmaze1589_0019_0002_0006.summary: Liv's newest brain is an inveterate gambler and his death may be connected to his habit. Meanwhile, Blaine pays a visit to his grandfather after Angus takes over Blaine's funeral home, and Ravi tries to find a condom strong enough so that Liv and Major can have sex.

tvmaze1589_0020_0002_0007.name: Abra Cadaver
tvmaze1589_0020_0002_0007.summary: A magician at a magician's convention turns up dead, and Liv eats his brain. She soon discovers that he was obsessed with death, and his fascination bleeds into her love life. Meanwhile, Blaine asks Liv for help breaking into Dale's apartment to learn what she knows about the Meat Cute murders, and Ravi breaks up with his girlfriend.

tvmaze1589_0021_0002_0008.name: The Hurt Stalker
tvmaze1589_0021_0002_0008.summary: A woman that Clive used to date turns up dead... shot with his police firearm. While Liv and Ravi try to find the real killer, Liv eats the planner's brain and picks up her obsessive stalking habits, which threaten her relaitionship with Major.

tvmaze1589_0022_0002_0009.name: Cape Town
tvmaze1589_0022_0002_0009.summary: It's Christmas in Seattle, and Liv is called in on the case of a shop teacher who pursues criminals at night as a costumed vigilante... and turns up dead. Meanwhile, Major makes the acquaintance of a new zombie.

tvmaze1589_0023_0002_0010.name: Method Head
tvmaze1589_0023_0002_0010.summary: Liv gets in touch with her inner actor when she finds herself investigating the murder of a genre star in a zombie TV show to track down the killer. Meanwhile, Vaughn decides to test Major's loyalty to Max Rager, and Ravi continues his search for the tainted Utopium.

tvmaze1589_0024_0002_0011.name: Fifty Shades of Grey Matter
tvmaze1589_0024_0002_0011.summary: Liv and Clive investigate the poisoning death of a librarian who wrote erotic literature. Meanwhile, Clive and Dale tie Blaine to the Meat Cute Massacre and the Chaos Killer... but Peyton gets him released because of his testimony against Boss.

tvmaze1589_0025_0002_0012.name: Physician, Heal Thy Selfie
tvmaze1589_0025_0002_0012.summary: Liv eats the brain of a social media maven after Seattle's three most recent murder victims turn up without any brains... or heads. While she and Clive try to solve the triple-homicide, Liv grows closer to Drake but realizes that he's not being honest. Meanwhile, Ravi comforts Peyton, and Vaughn questions Major's loyalty to Max Rager.

tvmaze1589_0026_0002_0013.name: The Whopper
tvmaze1589_0026_0002_0013.summary: Ravi and Major find a fresh corpse in the field where the Utopium-tainted bodies are hidden, and the dead man's brain provides Liv with a lead to find them. Meanwhile, Blaine has Major brought in and makes him a deal he can't refuse.

tvmaze1589_0027_0002_0014.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Caffeinated Mind
tvmaze1589_0027_0002_0014.summary: While Liv and Clive investigate the murder of an overly-positive coffee shop owner, Boss discovers who has been moving in on his business. Meanwhile, the police arrest Drake and bring him in for interrogation.

tvmaze1589_0028_0002_0015.name: He Blinded Me with Science
tvmaze1589_0028_0002_0015.summary: After eating the brain of a dead researcher with connections to Max Rager, Liv goes undercover to find out what Vaughn is up to. Meanwhile, Ravi creates a new cure and gives it to a newly rezombied Blaine, and Liv discovers that Drake is working for Boss.

tvmaze1589_0029_0002_0016.name: Pour Some Sugar, Zombie
tvmaze1589_0029_0002_0016.summary: To help Peyton get the goods on Boss, Liv eats the brain of a dead stripper who knew where a major stash house was. Meanwhile, Ravi breaks into Major's safe, and Blaine loses his memories after taking the zombie cure.

tvmaze1589_0030_0002_0017.name: Reflections of the Way Liv Used to Be
tvmaze1589_0030_0002_0017.summary: A college student turns up dead, and Liv discovers that she was a hyper-active overachieve... just like Liv was before she became a zombie. Liv eats the student's brain both to help solve her murder and to take her mind off of Drake's disappearance. Meanwhile, Major and Ravi work out a plan to determine if the zombie cure causes complete memory loss... by turning Vaughn into a zombie and then trying the cure on him.

tvmaze1589_0031_0002_0018.name: Dead Beat
tvmaze1589_0031_0002_0018.summary: Dale arrests Major for the Chaos Killer murders, but she doesn't have any forensic evidence to connect him to the crimes. Meanwhile, Major is running out of time before he goes Romero, and Liv is forced to tell someone the truth about zombies to get him out of jail before it's too late.

tvmaze1589_0032_0002_0019.name: Salivation Army
tvmaze1589_0032_0002_0019.summary: Liv, Major, and Clive infiltrate a Max Rager party to get to the secret basement and find the missing zombies... including Liv's boyfriend Drake. Meanwhile, Boss sends men after Blaine, who turns to Peyton and Ravi for help.

show_list.summary: Jack Bauer, agent of CTU (Counter Terrorist Unit) faces threats against his country and himself in this action packed show. Each season contains of one day, each episode shows one hour of Jack Bauer's day. 24 is the only action show in real time and gained alot of fans during the years with this concept.

tvmaze167_0074_0004_0002.name: Day 4: 8:00 A.M.-9:00 A.M.
tvmaze167_0074_0004_0002.summary: Eighteen months after the conclusion of Season 3, CTU has a new leader, Erin Driscoll, a steely government agent who made firing Jack one of her first priorities. After the explosion of a commuter train, Jack, who is now working for Secretary of Defense James Heller and also is romantically involved with Heller's married daughter, Audrey Raines, suddenly finds himself heading back to CTU for a meeting with Driscoll.

tvmaze167_0077_0004_0005.name: Day 4: 11:00 A.M.-12:00 P.M.
tvmaze167_0077_0004_0005.summary: Jack must track a new lead to Heller after the police make a crucial mistake with Kalil. Meanwhile, Omar threatens great harm to Audrey unless Heller signs the confession.

tvmaze167_0078_0004_0006.name: Day 4: 12:00 P.M.-1:00 P.M.
tvmaze167_0078_0004_0006.summary: In a race against time, Jack attempts to rescue Heller and Audrey before the military bombs the terrorist compound and kills everyone inside. Meanwhile, Behrooz faces a difficult order from his father.

tvmaze167_0079_0004_0007.name: Day 4: 1:00 P.M.-2:00 P.M.
tvmaze167_0079_0004_0007.summary: CTU races against time to prevent the terrorists from melting down nuclear power stations across the U.S. Meanwhile, Jack reaches out to an old friend for help; and Sarah gets suspicious about Marianne.

tvmaze167_0192_0009_0024S07.name: 24: Live Another Day: Jack Is Back

tvmaze167_0193_0009_0001.name: Day 9: 11:00 AM-12:00 PM
tvmaze167_0193_0009_0001.summary: Another eventful day in the life of Jack Bauer begins with the heroic agent-turned-fugitive in a race against the clock to save the world while simultaneously staying on the run from the CIA. Set four years after the "24" finale, the series opener finds Jack putting his freedom on the line by coming out of hiding in London to try and prevent a major terrorist attack.

tvmaze167_0194_0009_0002.name: Day 9: 12:00 PM-1:00 PM
tvmaze167_0194_0009_0002.summary: Jack and Chloe struggle to elude the CIA's grasp while searching for a rogue hacker named Derek Yates; Audrey and Mark worry that President Heller could be suffering from dementia.

tvmaze167_0195_0009_0003.name: Day 9: 1:00 PM-2:00 PM
tvmaze167_0195_0009_0003.summary: Kate's hunt for Jack continues as President Heller prepares to address Parliament after a devastating attack. Elsewhere, Margot Al-Harazi demonstrates how much she is willing to sacrifice for revenge.

tvmaze167_0196_0009_0004.name: Day 9: 2:00 PM-3:00 PM
tvmaze167_0196_0009_0004.summary: Terror threat concerns are escalating as the CIA closes in on Jack while he makes his way to the U.S. Embassy; President Heller delivers an impassioned speech to Parliament; Margot asserts her authority; and Kate takes matters into her own hands.

tvmaze167_0197_0009_0005.name: Day 9: 3:00 PM-4:00 PM
tvmaze167_0197_0009_0005.summary: An impending attack brings two unlikely people together to stop it; Margot makes her demands known; and President Heller's order for a military lockdown may be too late.

tvmaze167_0198_0009_0006.name: Day 9: 4:00 PM-5:00 PM
tvmaze167_0198_0009_0006.summary: Tensions between President Heller and Prime Minister Davies boil over, until one of them decides to take matters into his own hands. Meanwhile, Jack has a plan for tracking down Margot, but it involves using someone unexpected—and unsuspecting—as bait; and back at the CIA in London, Jordan raises suspicions about Kate's husband.

tvmaze167_0199_0009_0007.name: Day 9: 5:00 PM-6:00 PM
tvmaze167_0199_0009_0007.summary: President Heller tries to stop Margot from going through with any further attacks, while Jack and Kate race to save the life of a key player in the terror plot, and Jordan is ordered into the field on a perilious mission.

tvmaze167_0200_0009_0008.name: Day 9: 6:00 PM-7:00 PM
tvmaze167_0200_0009_0008.summary: Jack and President Heller put themselves through hell in order to stop Margot Al-Harazi from going through with any more attacks; at the same time, Kate takes drastic measures to find Margot's hideout, while Jordan finds himself in a life-or-death situation.

tvmaze167_0201_0009_0009.name: Day 9: 7:00 PM-8:00 PM
tvmaze167_0201_0009_0009.summary: True colors are revealed in the midst of some very intense circumstances. Meanwhile, Jack and Chloe launch a plan to eliminate the terrorist threat and keep London safe from any more attacks, but to do so first he and Kate need to track down some crucial leads with little time to spare.

tvmaze167_0202_0009_0010.name: Day 9: 8:00 PM-9:00 PM
tvmaze167_0202_0009_0010.summary: Jack remains laser-focused on pursuing his remaining leads; emotions escalate when Kate learns the truth about her husband; and Audrey confronts Mark about the duplicitous things that he has said and done. At the same time, the terror threat widens and the potential devastation becomes all too clear.

tvmaze167_0203_0009_0011.name: Day 9: 9:00 PM-10:00 PM
tvmaze167_0203_0009_0011.summary: Jack leads Kate and Mark on a mission to avert an international crisis, as Audrey tries diplomatic means to avoid full-scale war.

tvmaze167_0204_0009_0012.name: Day 9: 10:00 PM-11:00 AM
tvmaze167_0204_0009_0012.summary: The day comes to an end with Jack doing everything in his power to prevent a terror plot and an international crisis. But to save the world, he's faced with an unthinkable and grave decision.

show_list.name: Chuck
show_list.summary: Chuck Bartowski is a computer geek that gets catapulted into a new career as the government's most vital secret agent. When Chuck opens an e-mail subliminally encoded with government secrets, he unwittingly downloads an entire server of sensitive data into his brain. With the government's most precious secrets in Chuck's head, Major John Casey of the National Security Agency assumes the responsibility of protecting him. His partner is the CIA's top agent, Sarah Walker.

first_episode.name: Chuck Versus the Intersect
first_episode.summary: Chuck Bartowski is a computer geek that gets catapulted into a new career as the government's most vital secret agent. When Chuck opens an e-mail subliminally encoded with government secrets, he unwittingly downloads an entire server of sensitive data into his brain. With the government's most precious secrets in Chuck's head, Major John Casey of the National Security Agency assumes the responsibility of protecting him. His partner is the CIA's top agent, Sarah Walker.

last_episode.name: Chuck Versus the Goodbye
last_episode.summary: Chuck enlists his family, friend and some unexpected allies as he races to stop Nicholas Quinn from destroying everything Chuck has built over the past five years.

tvmaze168_0001_0001_0001.name: Chuck Versus the Intersect
tvmaze168_0001_0001_0001.summary: Chuck Bartowski is a computer geek that gets catapulted into a new career as the government's most vital secret agent. When Chuck opens an e-mail subliminally encoded with government secrets, he unwittingly downloads an entire server of sensitive data into his brain. With the government's most precious secrets in Chuck's head, Major John Casey of the National Security Agency assumes the responsibility of protecting him. His partner is the CIA's top agent, Sarah Walker.

tvmaze168_0002_0001_0002.name: Chuck Versus the Helicopter
tvmaze168_0002_0001_0002.summary: As Chuck Bartowski continues to come to grips with his newly adopted life as a spy, tension builds between his recently appointed partners Sarah Walker and John Casey. When a doctor who seems to have a solution to Chuck's problem is killed, Casey and Walker turn the blame at one another. Both agents persistently try to convince Chuck that the other one is responsible and now it is up to Chuck to decide which one to trust. Who will he choose?

tvmaze168_0003_0001_0003.name: Chuck Versus the Tango
tvmaze168_0003_0001_0003.summary: Chuck Bartowski is finding out that living two separate lives is not going to come easy. After being challenged by his boss at Buy More, Chuck needs the help of his best friend Morgan and the Nerd Herd, to prove that he is up to the task and ready to become assistant manager. Meanwhile, Sarah and John force Chuck to go undercover for his first real spy mission. It seems that Chuck's two different lives are learning to Tango, but which one will learn to take the lead?

tvmaze168_0004_0001_0004.name: Chuck Versus the Wookiee
tvmaze168_0004_0001_0004.summary: Chuck faces an unusual task, when Sarah's hot colleague from the CIA shows up requesting help for a mission. Morgan tries to get Chuck to set him up with Sarah's new friend. When Chuck finds out that a million dollar diamond hidden in a Malibu mansion is being used to help fund terrorists, he must help these two beautiful women steal it back. Chuck is finding out that Sarah's job of living a double life, which she is all too good at, is really preventing him from getting to know who she really is.

tvmaze168_0005_0001_0005.name: Chuck Versus the Sizzling Shrimp
tvmaze168_0005_0001_0005.summary: Chuck faces his first moral dilemma as a spy. When agents Sarah and Casey refuse to help an unauthorized mission that is taking place in Chinatown by a top Chinese spy, Chuck is faced with a tough decision. Either go against the U.S. government and his friends, or do what he believes is right? Meanwhile, Morgan is caught in a dilemma of his own when Buy More forces him into a sales competition that could cost him his job.

tvmaze168_0006_0001_0006.name: Chuck Versus the Sandworm
tvmaze168_0006_0001_0006.summary: Chuck accidentally runs into a fellow government agent who seems to be living a similar life. It turns out this agent is a gadget whiz, whose brain makes him a national security asset and a dangerous liability, much like Chuck. Chuck faces a predicament whether he should help turn this agent into Sarah and Casey or help this agent escape his handlers. Meanwhile, Halloween, a holiday that means a lot to Chuck and Morgan as buddies, proves to be a little different this year as Morgan feels that Chuck is neglecting both their childhood and friendship.

tvmaze168_0007_0001_0007.name: Chuck Versus the Alma Mater
tvmaze168_0007_0001_0007.summary: Chuck has to return to Stanford University, the institute that expelled him, on homecoming weekend to help a former professor. Chuck finds out that his former professor is also a government operative who is being hunted out for a sensitive top-secret file. Chuck must use his past experiences to find his Professor's hidden secret, while at the same time discovering shocking secrets about his own life. More importantly, Chuck discovers the truth about his former friend, Bryce Larkin, the one who got him kicked out of Stanford. Meanwhile, Morgan has problems with the new assistant manager at Buy More.

tvmaze168_0008_0001_0008.name: Chuck Versus the Truth
tvmaze168_0008_0001_0008.summary: Chuck battles with his cover love life and real love life when he meets a very pretty girl named Lou, who seems interested in the real Chuck. On the other hand, his relationship with Sarah heats up as they go on a double date with Ellie and Captain Awesome and try to explain their sex life. Meanwhile, a poison specialist is trying to obtain codes to nuclear facilities and is using a "truth" poison to help get his answers. After all are exposed to the truth, Chuck soon discovers a lot about his partners.

tvmaze168_0009_0001_0009.name: Chuck Versus the Imported Hard Salami
tvmaze168_0009_0001_0009.summary: Chuck starts dating Lou, a sandwich maker, and things seem to be going really well. This incites some jealousy on the behalf of Chuck's ex-girlfriend, Sarah, as she may be discovering that her feelings were not all just a cover. However, things seem to get complicated when Lou is discovered to be a part of a smuggling group. Is the relationship with Chuck another phony or is this relationship for real? Meanwhile, Morgan starts developing a new relationship with an unlikely girl.

tvmaze168_0010_0001_0010.name: Chuck Versus the Nemesis
tvmaze168_0010_0001_0010.summary: It's Thanksgiving and Chuck's nemesis, Bryce Larkin, returns to his life after being ruled dead earlier in Chuck's life. Secret internal committees trying to destroy the intersect, now better known as Chuck's brain, saved Bryce in hopes he would be able to help them locate it. Bryce needs Chuck to help prove to Sarah, Casey and the rest of the CIA that he is not rogue. Upon seeing Bryce and Sarah back together, former lovers and partners, Chuck grows jealous and doubts any future with Sarah. Meanwhile, Buy More is prepping for the biggest shopping day of the year and Morgan is left in charge to ensure all runs well.

tvmaze168_0011_0001_0011.name: Chuck Versus the Crown Vic
tvmaze168_0011_0001_0011.summary: Still licking his wounds after realizing Sarah continues to have feelings for Bryce, Chuck must assume the cover of being Sarah's husband on a mission to foil a politically connected counterfeiter and yachtsman. Emotions and sea legs are tested when Chuck, Sarah and Casey have to head to the marina to scuttle a plot that also puts an unwitting Morgan and Anna squarely in the crosshairs. Meanwhile, It's time for the annual Buy More holiday party, but the party comes with lots of rules from Big Mike.

tvmaze168_0012_0001_0012.name: Chuck Versus the Undercover Lover
tvmaze168_0012_0001_0012.summary: Chuck discovers that many Russian arms dealers are secretly meeting in Los Angeles. One particular Russian woman catches his attention, and he flashes on her as being Agent Casey's ex-girlfriend. Chuck grows very intrigued and begins to pester Casey about their history. After learning this woman is to set marry one of the Russian arms dealers, Chuck insists that Casey fights for his woman. Will Casey fight for his true love without compromising his identity? Meanwhile, Captain Awesome and Ellie reach a tough point in their relationship.

tvmaze168_0013_0001_0013.name: Chuck Versus the Marlin
tvmaze168_0013_0001_0013.summary: Captain Awesome asks Chuck if he can have Ellie's hand in marriage, and then insists Chuck holds on to the ring until he plans it all out. Chuck decides to lock it in his Buy-More locker, and returns the next day to discover everything had been stolen from the store. Meanwhile, Agent Casey and Agent Walker discover that the CIA has been spying on them in hopes of discovering "the intersect." With Chuck's identity and life on the line, NSA has no other option than to relocate Chuck into a permanent holding cell. Will Chuck lose his family and friends forever?

tvmaze168_0014_0002_0001.name: Chuck Versus the First Date
tvmaze168_0014_0002_0001.summary: Chuck prevents Colt from obtaining the Cipher -- a device that would ultimately lead to a new Intersect. Chuck is told that this successful mission marks the end of his espionage career and the beginning of a normal life. Free from bullets and bombs, Chuck finally asks Sarah out on a real first date. But Chuck's role as the old Intersect is not good news for everyone as Casey deals with a difficult order assigned to him. Meanwhile at Buy More, Morgan devises an eccentric way to hire a new assistant manager.

tvmaze168_0015_0002_0002.name: Chuck Versus the Seduction
tvmaze168_0015_0002_0002.summary: Chuck must go undercover to retrieve the Cipher from the Black Widow. But in order to get close to his target, Chuck must learn the art of seduction from the suave and sophisticated Roan. Unfortunately for Chuck, Sarah and Casey, Roan is no longer the world's greatest spy. Meanwhile, Morgan offers Captain Awesome some advice for a romantic night with Ellie, and Lester struggles to gain respect at Buy More as the new assistant manager.

tvmaze168_0016_0002_0003.name: Chuck Versus the Break-Up
tvmaze168_0016_0002_0003.summary: Chuck is overcome with jealousy when his nemesis Bryce Larkin -- and Sarah's ex-lover and partner -- makes an unexpected return. Chuck and Sarah's growing feelings for each other are tested when their latest mission requires Sarah and Bryce to pose as an extremely affectionate couple. Meanwhile, Morgan faces his own challenge at Buy More when he must deal with a gang of bullies, from a neighboring sporting goods store in the strip mall called, the Mighty Jocks led by the fearful Mitt.

tvmaze168_0017_0002_0004.name: Chuck Versus the Cougars
tvmaze168_0017_0002_0004.summary: Chuck learns more about Sarah's past when they run into her old high school nemesis Heather Chandler. Sarah's teenage insecurities come to surface and she tries to avoid Heather at all costs. Chuck, on the other hand, does everything he can to hear more about Sarah's hidden life. When Heather's nerdy husband Mark turns out to be a key player in a new mission, the agents must attend Sarah's high school reunion to prevent the sale of potentially dangerous super-bomber plans -- all the action ends with the ultimate cat fight. Meanwhile, Big Mike leaves town for a day and Buy More's new assistant manager Lester decides to implement a new sales policy.

tvmaze168_0018_0002_0005.name: Chuck Versus Tom Sawyer
tvmaze168_0018_0002_0005.summary: Life in espionage takes its toll on Chuck and everyone is taking notice. Chuck tries to explain his unusual behavior to Ellie and to the quirky Buy More efficiency expert Emmett Milbarge, but a new assignment only complicates things. After a global terrorist comes searching for Jeff, Chuck is forced to socialize with Jeff in order to find out what role the oddball plays in the mission. Sarah, Casey and Chuck are all shocked when they discover that the fate of the world and the prevention of World War III rest in Jeff's hands.

tvmaze168_0019_0002_0006.name: Chuck Versus the Ex
tvmaze168_0019_0002_0006.summary: Chuck runs into his ex-girlfriend Jill while on a Nerd Herd call. In an attempt to save face, he lies to the girl who broke his heart and tells her that he is more successful than he really is. When Chuck flashes on Jill's boss - a research scientist who may have developed a deadly bio-weapon, he, Sarah and Casey must find out if Jill is involved. Meanwhile at the Buy More, Big Mike nearly chokes to death, which leads company efficiency expert Emmett to implement a mandatory CPR course taught by Captain Awesome.

tvmaze168_0020_0002_0007.name: Chuck Versus the Fat Lady
tvmaze168_0020_0002_0007.summary: Chuck and Jill are enjoying the honeymoon stage of their rekindled relationship. The two lovebirds plan a weekend getaway but have to cancel at the last minute when Casey and Sarah inform Chuck that he is needed for an immediate mission to find corrupt agents in the CIA. Jealousy erupts when Jill finally meets Sarah and learns that Chuck and his handler must pose as a couple. Chuck does his best to reassure Jill that his relationship with Sarah is purely business but only finds himself in more trouble when his mission does not go as planned. Meanwhile, corporate efficiency expert Emmett is out to get Chuck and interrogates Morgan to get some dirt on his best friend.

tvmaze168_0021_0002_0008.name: Chuck Versus the Gravitron
tvmaze168_0021_0002_0008.summary: Chuck, Sarah and Casey make a shocking discovery about Jill. In the wake of his disbelief, Chuck is asked to find an agent called Leader and he willingly agrees. Meanwhile, Captain Awesome's parents are coming for Thanksgiving and Ellie is determined to have the perfect Thanksgiving dinner. To make sure everything goes smoothly, she tells Morgan that he cannot come to dinner this year. Without any holiday plans to fall back on, Morgan is recruited by Big Mike to stand guard at the Buy More with Lester and Jeff.

tvmaze168_0022_0002_0009.name: Chuck Versus the Sensei
tvmaze168_0022_0002_0009.summary: Chuck is still reeling from his relationship with Jill and is sent on a mission to take his mind off her. Casey gets a shock of his own when he finds out that his sensei Ty Bennett, who taught him everything he knows, is now one of the most wanted rogue agents. While on the search for Bennett, it becomes clear that Casey may be too emotionally involved to continue with the mission. Meanwhile, Awesome's parents Honey and Woody make a surprise visit to help Ellie and Awesome plan their wedding. At the Buy More, Emmett reinstates the employee of the month contest, but Morgan, Jeff and Lester have other plans.

tvmaze168_0023_0002_0010.name: Chuck Versus the Delorean
tvmaze168_0023_0002_0010.summary: Chuck spies on Sarah and sees her on a date with an older man. Chuck frantically tries to warn Sarah after he has an Intersect flash, but she assures Chuck that she is not in danger and reveals the identity of the mystery man. Meanwhile, Anna wants to move into an apartment with Morgan forcing him to finally act like an adult. Awesome offers to help Morgan pay for the apartment, but a relic from the past causes Morgan to lose focus on his new grown-up responsibilities.

tvmaze168_0024_0002_0011.name: Chuck Versus Santa Claus
tvmaze168_0024_0002_0011.summary: Christmas Eve does not go as planned when an amateur criminal on the run from the police crashes into the Buy More and takes Chuck, Ellie, Awesome and the rest of the Buy More gang hostage. In order to protect Chuck's cover and the safety of the other hostages, Sarah and Casey secretly go in to the store to remove Chuck, but the mission quickly falls apart when Chuck refuses to leave his friends and family behind.

tvmaze168_0025_0002_0012.name: Chuck Versus the Third Dimension
tvmaze168_0025_0002_0012.summary: Chuck foils a plan to kill international rock star Tyler Martin leading Sarah and Casey to kidnap the musician to find out who wants him dead. When Chuck is left unattended with Tyler, the party animal rocker convinces Chuck to go out on the town, which only ends in a night of trouble. Meanwhile, Big Mike enlists Morgan to look out for his old football buddy Jimmy who was just released from jail and hired at the Buy More. In the midst of Morgan's newly assigned duties, he wins a pair of backstage passes to Tyler's show and holds a contest in true Super Bowl fashion that pits Jeff against the formidable ex-con Jimmy.

tvmaze168_0026_0002_0013.name: Chuck Versus the Suburbs
tvmaze168_0026_0002_0013.summary: Chuck and Sarah's latest assignment forces them to pose as a happily married couple living in the suburbs. They meet some interesting characters including Brad, a cheerful next-door neighbor in the stationary business, and Sylvia, a seductive and attractive woman who lives across the street and has her eye on Chuck. Meanwhile, Big Mike is on a work rampage after his wife files for divorce, so the Buy More gang sets him up on a dating website to keep him distracted.

tvmaze168_0027_0002_0014.name: Chuck Versus the Best Friend
tvmaze168_0027_0002_0014.summary: Chuck helps a heartbroken Morgan spy on Anna. After he flashes on Anna's new boyfriend, Chuck, along with Sarah and Casey, is sent to discover his connection to a dangerous gang. Meanwhile, Jeff and Lester try to convince Ellie and Awesome to hire their band Jeffster! for the wedding.

tvmaze168_0028_0002_0015.name: Chuck Versus the Beefcake
tvmaze168_0028_0002_0015.summary: Chuck breaks up with Sarah after Ellie's urging, but jealousy strikes when Sarah must seduce a handsome agent in order to retrieve Fulcrum intelligence. Morgan deals with his mother's relationship with Big Mike by crashing at Chuck's apartment much to Ellie and Awesome's chagrin. Meanwhile, Jeff and Lester talk their way into hiring the new Buy More employee but decide to search for the "Buy More Babe."

tvmaze168_0029_0002_0016.name: Chuck Versus the Lethal Weapon
tvmaze168_0029_0002_0016.summary: Chuck, Sarah and Casey learn about a man called "Perseus" who is behind Fulcrum's plans to build their own Intersect. While Sarah and Casey are sent to find Perseus, Chuck and Agent Cole Barker are forced to stay in a safety bunker. When the mission takes a dangerous turn, their orders to stay out of harm's way go out the window. Meanwhile, Morgan tries to convince Anna that moving in with him would be a bad idea.

tvmaze168_0030_0002_0017.name: Chuck Versus the Predator
tvmaze168_0030_0002_0017.summary: After Chuck is contacted by the mastermind behind the Intersect Computer, he must decide who he can trust; Sarah and Casey or the mysterious scientist who might be able to erase the Intersect from his mind. Meanwhile, a conflict breaks out between the Burbank Buy More and the more prestigious Beverly Hills branch.

tvmaze168_0031_0002_0018.name: Chuck Versus the Broken Heart
tvmaze168_0031_0002_0018.summary: When Chuck expresses his feelings about his complicated relationship with Sarah, a heartless female agent named Alex Forrest is sent to evaluate Sarah's performance as Chuck's handler. Morgan, Jeff and Lester try to weasel their way into getting invited to Awesome's bachelor party.

tvmaze168_0032_0002_0019.name: Chuck Versus the Dream Job
tvmaze168_0032_0002_0019.summary: Chuck's life seems to be coming together: his long-absent father Steve has returned and he's landed his dream job with his hero Ted Roark. Unfortunately for Chuck, neither turns out to be quite what he expected.

tvmaze168_0033_0002_0020.name: Chuck Versus the First Kill
tvmaze168_0033_0002_0020.summary: After Chuck's father Steve is kidnapped by Fulcrum, Chuck learns the only chance he has to find him is by putting his trust and life into the hands of the person he trusts the least; his ex-girlfriend Jill Roberts. Meanwhile, the Buy More team tries to sabotage Emmett's corporate evaluation.

tvmaze168_0034_0002_0021.name: Chuck Versus the Colonel
tvmaze168_0034_0002_0021.summary: When Chuck and Sarah go AWOL to rescue Chuck's father Steve, they discover that spending time together without any surveillance allows for unchartered chemistry. But as the two get closer, Casey zeroes in on their hidden location. Meanwhile, Morgan becomes the pariah of the Buy More after mistakenly getting Emmett promoted.

tvmaze168_0035_0002_0022.name: Chuck Versus the Ring (1)
tvmaze168_0035_0002_0022.summary: When Ellie and Awesome's wedding day finally arrives, Chuck must save Ellie's life and her big day from being ruined by Ted Roark and Fulcrum.

tvmaze168_0036_0003_0001.name: Chuck Versus the Pink Slip
tvmaze168_0036_0003_0001.summary: As  the upgraded Intersect, Chuck trains to become a full-fledged spy  but hits rock bottom when he flunks out of spy school and loses Sarah in the process. Meanwhile, Morgan  comes home from  Benihana School to help Chuck get over Sarah.

tvmaze168_0037_0003_0002.name: Chuck Versus the Three Words
tvmaze168_0037_0003_0002.summary: Chuck gets a new mission when Sarah's best friend Carina comes through town with her fiancé Karl. Things get complicated when Chuck wants to hash out his and Sarah's relationship problems while they're on the mission. Meanwhile, Morgan finds himself in trouble when he lies to Jeff and Lester.

tvmaze168_0038_0003_0003.name: Chuck Versus the Angel de la Muerte
tvmaze168_0038_0003_0003.summary: Chuck must use his relationship with Awesome to protect a visiting dictator, Premier Goya, who is the target of an assassination. While Awesome is excited about the prospect of being a spy, Chuck is more concerned about Awesome and Ellie's safety.

tvmaze168_0039_0003_0004.name: Chuck Versus Operation Awesome
tvmaze168_0039_0003_0004.summary: When Awesome is mistaken for a super spy by the evil Sydney Price, Chuck must become his handler and show him the spy ropes. While on a mission for The Ring, they meet the mysterious Daniel Shaw. Meanwhile, Morgan gets promoted to assistant manager and must deal with Jeff and Lester's latest hijinks.

tvmaze168_0040_0003_0005.name: Chuck Versus First Class
tvmaze168_0040_0003_0005.summary: Agent Daniel Shaw assigns Chuck to his first solo mission in Paris, ignoring Sarah and Casey's wishes. During the flight to France, Chuck befriends Hannah and flashes on another passenger - the imposing Hugo Panzer. Meanwhile, Casey helps Morgan battle Jeff and Lester for control of the Buy More.

tvmaze168_0041_0003_0006.name: Chuck Versus the Nacho Sampler
tvmaze168_0041_0003_0006.summary: Chuck juggles his two lives as he trains new Nerd Herder Hannah and gets his very own asset who is caught up with The Ring. Chuck thinks he can handle his asset all on his own but Sarah and Casey feel the need to intercede. Meanwhile, Awesome must lie to Ellie when she starts to ask questions about Chuck and Morgan, Jeff and Lester do some recon work to learn more about Hannah.

tvmaze168_0042_0003_0007.name: Chuck Versus the Mask
tvmaze168_0042_0003_0007.summary: Chuck and Hannah unexpectedly become part of agent Daniel Shaw's latest mission. Much to Sarah's chagrin, she gets paired with Shaw, who seems to be trying to get close to her. Meanwhile, Morgan and Ellie continue their mission to get to the bottom of Chuck's secretive and strange behavior.

tvmaze168_0043_0003_0008.name: Chuck Versus the Fake Name
tvmaze168_0043_0003_0008.summary: Chuck promises to cook dinner for Hannah, Ellie and Awesome but must first assume the identity of the world's most dangerous assassin for his latest mission. Meanwhile, Sarah is determined to keep her relationship with Shaw strictly professional.

tvmaze168_0044_0003_0009.name: Chuck Versus the Beard
tvmaze168_0044_0003_0009.summary: Chuck feels like his life is falling apart when he can't flash and gets left behind for a mission. While Shaw, Sarah and Casey go on without him, Chuck finds himself in a sticky situation back at the base.

tvmaze168_0045_0003_0010.name: Chuck Versus the Tic Tac
tvmaze168_0045_0003_0010.summary: Casey carries out a side mission for his old commanding officer James Keller that leads to him committing treason. When Chuck learns the dark truth about Col. Keller, he and Sarah set out to break Casey out of jail and clear his name. Meanwhile, Awesome's plan to keep Ellie out of danger gets more difficult when she gets her dream fellowship.

tvmaze168_0046_0003_0011.name: Chuck Versus the Final Exam
tvmaze168_0046_0003_0011.summary: Chuck learns that his latest solo mission will be a final test to see if he is ready to be a spy. Chuck needs to put everything he has learned into action to avoid going back to his old life while Sarah and Shaw observe his every move.

tvmaze168_0047_0003_0012.name: Chuck Versus the American Hero
tvmaze168_0047_0003_0012.summary: Chuck has his pick of the best CIA agents for an undercover operation, but he has only one girl in mind for the job; Sarah. Casey, Morgan and Awesome team up to help Chuck win her back.

tvmaze168_0048_0003_0013.name: Chuck Versus the Other Guy
tvmaze168_0048_0003_0013.summary: Chuck, Sarah and Shaw reunite to find the Ring operative behind the death of Shaw's wife. Sarah has faith that Shaw is ready for the mission but Chuck is worried about his emotional stability. Meanwhile, Morgan considers leaving the Buy More.

tvmaze168_0049_0003_0014.name: Chuck Versus the Honeymooners
tvmaze168_0049_0003_0014.summary: While in Europe, Sarah and Chuck realize they're traveling on a train with Spanish spies. Even though they're all alone, they decide to take on these rogue agents. Of course, this impromptu mission doesn't go smoothly. Meanwhile, Beckman orders her newest "unlikely" spy team - John Casey and Morgan Grimes - to track down the missing couple.

tvmaze168_0050_0003_0015.name: Chuck Versus the Role Models
tvmaze168_0050_0003_0015.summary: Chuck and Sarah are assigned to train under Craig and Laura Turner, a married CIA team who, despite their impeccable record, hate one another. The Turners' stormy relationship forces Chuck and Sarah to wonder if they're doomed with the same fate. Meanwhile, Casey must train the newest member of the team - Morgan.

tvmaze168_0051_0003_0016.name: Chuck Versus the Tooth
tvmaze168_0051_0003_0016.summary: Chuck struggles with disturbing dreams and now he believes his most recent dream predicts danger for a visiting head of state. General Beckman, however, is unconvinced and assigns Chuck to meet with a CIA psychiatrist Dr. Leo Dreyfus. Meanwhile, Ellie gets surprising news and Anna returns to the Buy More to talk to Morgan.

tvmaze168_0052_0003_0017.name: Chuck Versus the Living Dead
tvmaze168_0052_0003_0017.summary: After his last dream, Chuck asks Morgan to help him on a side mission. Their investigation becomes complicated when Stephen J. Bartowski returns and learns that Chuck downloaded the Intersect 2.0. Luckily, Chuck's father may be able to help his son.

tvmaze168_0053_0003_0018.name: Chuck Versus the Subway
tvmaze168_0053_0003_0018.summary: The Ring is closing in on Chuck and Operation Bartowski. Fortunately, Chuck's dad Steven is working hard to save his son. Meanwhile, Casey must secretly protect his daughter from the Ring, and Big Mike receives some serious news about the Buy More.

tvmaze168_0055_0004_0001.name: Chuck Versus the Anniversary
tvmaze168_0055_0004_0001.summary: Chuck and Morgan go on a rogue globe-spanning mission to find Chuck's mom. Meanwhile, Sarah and Casey follow a trail to Russia as they investigate the mysterious Volkoff Industries and its operative, Marco. Back at home, Ellie delivers big news to her family.

tvmaze168_0056_0004_0002.name: Chuck Versus the Suitcase
tvmaze168_0056_0004_0002.summary: When Chuck and Sarah go undercover in Milan, Chuck realizes the "Achilles' Heel" in their relationship, but must set personal issues aside for the mission. Meanwhile, Morgan recognizes a fatal flaw that compromises the new Buy More. Elsewhere, Casey struggles to put down roots in Burbank.

tvmaze168_0057_0004_0003.name: Chuck Versus the Cubic Z
tvmaze168_0057_0004_0003.summary: Chuck and Sarah's romantic mission is cancelled with the arrival of Hugo Panzer and Heather Chandler. But Chuck grows more interested when the manipulative Heather claims to know a secret about his mom. Meanwhile, as Morgan prepares the Buy More for a huge video game release, he gets a surprise from Big Mike.

tvmaze168_0058_0004_0004.name: Chuck Versus the Coup D'Etat
tvmaze168_0058_0004_0004.summary: Chuck and Sarah work on becoming better communicators as they join Awesome and Ellie for a getaway to Costa Gravas. There, the gang is reunited with Generalissimo Goya who finds himself in a dangerous situation once again. Back at home, Morgan embarks on a forbidden romance that may put him at odds with Colonel John Casey.

tvmaze168_0059_0004_0005.name: Chuck Versus the Couch Lock
tvmaze168_0059_0004_0005.summary: When Colonel Casey's former team returns looking for him, Chuck must decide what he's willing to sacrifice in order to find his mom. Elsewhere, Morgan works up the nerve to reveal a potentially dangerous secret to Casey.

tvmaze168_0060_0004_0006.name: Chuck Versus the Aisle of Terror
tvmaze168_0060_0004_0006.summary: When Chuck, Sarah, Casey, and Morgan are tasked to stop Dr. Stanley Wheelright from releasing a nightmare-inducing toxin, they're also lead to question the allegiances of Chuck's mom. Meanwhile, Jeff and Lester use their unique sensibilities to celebrate Halloween at the Buy More, and Ellie and Awesome get a visit from Dr. Honey Woodcomb.

tvmaze168_0061_0004_0007.name: Chuck Versus the First Fight
tvmaze168_0061_0004_0007.summary: After their first real fight, Chuck avoids confronting Sarah by going on a rogue mission that leads him to his mom's MI-6 handler, Gregory Tuttle, and a mysterious Russian agent. Meanwhile, Ellie is on her own mission to uncover the Bartowski family's long-buried past.

tvmaze168_0062_0004_0008.name: Chuck Versus the Fear of Death
tvmaze168_0062_0004_0008.summary: Afraid that his latest setback is driving a wedge between him and Sarah, Chuck resolves to prove himself by going on a dangerous mission with the overeager Agent Rye. Meanwhile, Morgan and Casey scramble as the "Buy Morons" attempt to uncover the true identity of Greta.

tvmaze168_0063_0004_0009.name: Chuck Versus Phase Three
tvmaze168_0063_0004_0009.summary: Chuck, Sarah, Casey and Morgan venture into the jungles of Southeast Asia when The Belgian attempts to unravel the secrets of the Intersect. Meanwhile, Captain Awesome and Ellie try to decipher a secret left behind by her father.

tvmaze168_0064_0004_0010.name: Chuck Versus the Leftovers
tvmaze168_0064_0004_0010.summary: It's the day after Thanksgiving and Chuck faces the most awkward of family reunions when mom comes over for dinner - along with the dangerous Alexei Volkoff. Back at the Buy More, Morgan deals with the busiest shopping day of the year as Jeff and Lester hatch their latest scheme.

tvmaze168_0065_0004_0011.name: Chuck Versus the Balcony
tvmaze168_0065_0004_0011.summary: When an assignment brings him to a French vineyard, Chuck juggles tracking down a nano-chip with trying to create the perfect romantic getaway for Sarah. Back at the Buy More, Lester comes to Big Mike for his own romantic problems.

tvmaze168_0066_0004_0012.name: Chuck Versus the Gobbler
tvmaze168_0066_0004_0012.summary: Sarah takes dangerous measures to help Mary Bartowski bring down Alexei Volkoff, as Chuck worries that she may be getting in too deep. Sarah, though, must enlist the help of Chuck, Morgan and Casey to complete her undercover mission. Meanwhile, Ellie and Awesome are at odds over what to name the baby.

tvmaze168_0067_0004_0013.name: Chuck Versus the Push Mix
tvmaze168_0067_0004_0013.summary: As Sarah works to free Chuck's mom, Chuck and Morgan embark on their own mission to take down Alexei Volkoff. Meanwhile, Casey bonds with his daughter, Alex, while Ellie tries to ease Awesome's anxieties over fatherhood.

tvmaze168_0068_0004_0014.name: Chuck Versus the Seduction Impossible
tvmaze168_0068_0004_0014.summary: In need of an exciting new mission, Chuck, Sarah and Casey are sent to Morocco to rescue Roan Montgomery. Meanwhile, Chuck and Sarah are at odds over their future plans. Back at home, Morgan prepares to meet Alex's mom, as Mary bonds with her family.

tvmaze168_0069_0004_0015.name: Chuck Versus the C.A.T. Squad
tvmaze168_0069_0004_0015.summary: Chuck surprises Sarah with her old spy team, The C.A.T. Squad, leading to a mission in Rio. As The C.A.T. Squad works to settle a score with Augusto Gaez, old secrets and grudges come to light. Back at the Buy More, Morgan fends off the advances of Carina, a former flame and frisky member of The C.A.T Squad.

tvmaze168_0070_0004_0016.name: Chuck Versus the Masquerade
tvmaze168_0070_0004_0016.summary: Valentine's Day is interrupted when Chuck and the team are sent on a mission to England to protect a reclusive young heiress, Vivian McArthur. Meanwhile, Casey gets an offer from the mysterious Jane Bentley. Back at home, Ellie and Awesome find an unlikely solution to a parenting problem, as Morgan ponders a big move.

tvmaze168_0071_0004_0017.name: Chuck Versus The First Bank Of Evil
tvmaze168_0071_0004_0017.summary: Chuck pushes Vivian McArthur to get in touch with her inner villain for a mission. Elsewhere, Sarah tries to get in touch with her inner bride as wedding plans ramp up. Meanwhile, Morgan's search for a new roommate takes an unexpected turn.

tvmaze168_0072_0004_0018.name: Chuck Versus the A-Team
tvmaze168_0072_0004_0018.summary: Chuck and Sarah investigate when they suspect that Casey is carrying out private missions. Meanwhile, Chuck fears that the CIA's seemingly-perfect new operatives will render him obsolete. Elsewhere, Morgan settles in with a new roommate, and Awesome panics when Ellie embarks on a potentially dangerous line of research.

tvmaze168_0073_0004_0019.name: Chuck Versus the Muuurder
tvmaze168_0073_0004_0019.summary: Chuck is put in charge of a top-priority mission, but his leadership skills are pushed to the limit when there is a murder in Castle. Meanwhile, Awesome takes on a mission of his own when Ellie finds an alarming new hobby. Elsewhere, Morgan's leadership is also tested when his Buy More troops wage war against Large Mart.

tvmaze168_0074_0004_0020.name: Chuck Versus the Family Volkoff
tvmaze168_0074_0004_0020.summary: Bad day gets worse when Sarah throws Chuck a surprising relationship curveball as the CIA orders Vivian Volkoff assassinated. In order to prove Vivian's innocence, Chuck must put his trust in a dangerous ally her father Alexei Volkoff. Meanwhile, Ellie suspects that her mother is interfering with the search into her father's past.

tvmaze168_0075_0004_0021.name: Chuck Versus The Wedding Planner
tvmaze168_0075_0004_0021.summary: When Chuck and Sarah get conned out of their wedding money, there is only one man they can turn to for help -- Sarah's conman father, Jack Burton. Meanwhile, Morgan pressures Casey to face Alex's mother.

tvmaze168_0076_0004_0022.name: Chuck Versus Agent X
tvmaze168_0076_0004_0022.summary: Chuck and Sarah put aside spy work to have a weekend of debauchery, but Awesome's plans for Chuck's big night don't go quite as expected. Meanwhile, Ellie's investigation into her father's computer leads to a life-changing discovery.

tvmaze168_0077_0004_0023.name: Chuck Versus the Last Details
tvmaze168_0077_0004_0023.summary: Chuck and Sarah's wedding prep includes one final detail: ensuring that the mother-of-the-groom makes it to the ceremony alive. Meanwhile, Morgan's responsibilities as Best Man include his most dangerous mission yet, as he faces Vivian Volkoff. Elsewhere, Ellie tends to the last details of the rehearsal dinner and seeks help from an unlikely source.

tvmaze168_0078_0004_0024.name: Chuck Versus the Cliffhanger
tvmaze168_0078_0004_0024.summary: Before he can kiss the bride, Chuck must enlist his wedding party to take down Vivian Volkoff and stop her from destroying the big day. When he turns to Alexei Volkoff for help, the CIA sends its toughest agent, Clyde Decker, to stop them.

tvmaze168_0078_0004_0024S01.name: Buy Hard: The Jeff and Lester Story

tvmaze168_0079_0005_0001.name: Chuck Versus the Zoom
tvmaze168_0079_0005_0001.summary: Without the Intersect in his head or the support of the CIA, the world of espionage is a much more dangerous place for Chuck Bartowski and his team of freelance spies. To start, Carmichael Industries takes on a slick, rich thief named Jean Claude, and a conniving investor, Roger Bale, who has stolen money from some of the world's most dangerous people. Meanwhile, Morgan helps Chuck with a special surprise for Sarah. Back in the Buy More, Jeff and Lester have taken things to another level with their latest scheme.

tvmaze168_0080_0005_0002.name: Chuck Versus the Bearded Bandit
tvmaze168_0080_0005_0002.summary: As the team takes on a missing persons case, Chuck and company struggle to establish themselves as Carmichael Industries in the face of a rival security firm led by the tough and efficient Gertrude Verbanski. Meanwhile, Morgan continues to adjust to the Intersect while Chuck adjusts to being his handler. Also, the Buy More finds an unlikely spokesperson to help drum up business.

tvmaze168_0081_0005_0003.name: Chuck Versus The Frosted Tips
tvmaze168_0081_0005_0003.summary: As the team is tasked with finding one of the CIAs most wanted, Chuck fears that the Intersect may be going to Morgan's head. Meanwhile Sarah helps Casey navigate his relationship with Gertrude. Elsewhere, Captain Awesome makes a startling revelation about Jeff and Lester.

tvmaze168_0082_0005_0004.name: Chuck Versus the Business Trip
tvmaze168_0082_0005_0004.summary: Chuck and Sarah go undercover at a Buy More convention to hunt down an assassin whose mission is to take down the new Intersect. Meanwhile, Morgan must deal with the consequences of having the Intersect. At the Buy More, Jeff begins to show a very different side of himself.

tvmaze168_0083_0005_0005.name: Chuck Versus The Hack Off
tvmaze168_0083_0005_0005.summary: Mission to track down a computer super virus leads Chuck to return to his roots as a hacker -- and to call on his biggest competition, Gertrude Verbanksi, for help. Elsewhere, a new Buy More employee complicates Jeff and Lester's friendship.

tvmaze168_0084_0005_0006.name: Chuck Versus The Curse
tvmaze168_0084_0005_0006.summary: Chuck and Sarah race against time to take down a dangerous computer virus, pitting them against Robyn Cunnings, a ruthless spy who will stop at nothing to get what she needs. Meanwhile, Ellie and Awesome's date night takes a dangerous turn and Morgan is sent on a special mission to recover Chuck's P.A.N.T.S.

tvmaze168_0085_0005_0007.name: Chuck Versus the Santa Suit
tvmaze168_0085_0005_0007.summary: Chuck and Sarah discover who's behind the plot to destroy Carmichael Industries. Meanwhile, Ellie's plans for a perfect Christmas begin to come apart. At the Buy More, Morgan and the gang must fend off angry customers as a computer virus threatens to ruin Christmas.

tvmaze168_0086_0005_0008.name: Chuck Versus The Baby
tvmaze168_0086_0005_0008.summary: Sarah is forced to confront a secret from her past and feels she must do so alone, while Chuck urges her to let him help. When Sarah encounters her original handler, Kieran Ryker, she fears that he will harm those closest to her, including her mom.

tvmaze168_0087_0005_0009.name: Chuck Versus the Kept Man
tvmaze168_0087_0005_0009.summary: While Chuck and Sarah contemplate the next step for Carmichael Industries, Casey's forbidden love, Gertrude Verbanski, walks back into his life with a questionable mission in South Beach. Meanwhile, Jeff's enhanced intelligence leads he and Lester to suspect that something unusual may be happening at the Buy More.

tvmaze168_0088_0005_0010.name: Chuck Versus Bo
tvmaze168_0088_0005_0010.summary: As Chuck and Sarah try to realize a new, safer future, Morgan's past as the Intersect sends them to Vail on one last mission, where they enlist the help of an unlikely source -- the legendary Bo Derek. Elsewhere, Jeff and Lester continue their own spy mission.

tvmaze168_0089_0005_0011.name: Chuck Versus The Bullet Train
tvmaze168_0089_0005_0011.summary: When a mission in Japan becomes a hostage situation, Sarah and Chuck must face the merciless Nicholas Quinn aboard a speeding Japanese bullet train. Meanwhile, the mission leaves Casey with an impossible decision.

tvmaze168_0090_0005_0012.name: Chuck Versus Sarah
tvmaze168_0090_0005_0012.summary: After a harrowing mission, Sarah returns to Chuck with a huge secret. Meanwhile, Ellie and Awesome are presented with a new opportunity that could change their lives.

tvmaze168_0091_0005_0013.name: Chuck Versus the Goodbye
tvmaze168_0091_0005_0013.summary: Chuck enlists his family, friend and some unexpected allies as he races to stop Nicholas Quinn from destroying everything Chuck has built over the past five years.

show_list.name: Orange is the New Black
show_list.summary: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money for her drug-dealing girlfriend.

first_episode.name: I Wasn't Ready
first_episode.summary: Prison enemies are quickly made in the opener of this series, in which a New York woman struggles to adjust to life in a federal penitentiary.

previous_episode.name: Trust No Bitch
previous_episode.summary: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.

tvmaze170_0005_0001_0005.name: The Chickening

tvmaze170_0007_0001_0007.name: Blood Donut

tvmaze170_0008_0001_0008.name: Moscow Mule
