tvmaze170_0010_0001_0010.name: Bora Bora Bora
tvmaze170_0010_0001_0010.summary: A rash decision by Pornstache causes unintended consequences.

tvmaze170_0011_0001_0011.name: Tall Men With Feelings
tvmaze170_0011_0001_0011.summary: Larry's revelations on a radio show jeopardize Piper's reputation.

tvmaze170_0013_0001_0013.name: Can't Fix Crazy
tvmaze170_0013_0001_0013.summary: Piper reaches her breaking point and Larry takes matters into his own hands in the Season 1 finale.

tvmaze170_0014_0002_0001.name: Thirsty Bird
tvmaze170_0014_0002_0001.summary: Piper is forced to face the consequences of her actions in the Season 2 premiere.

tvmaze170_0015_0002_0002.name: Looks Blue, Tastes Red
tvmaze170_0015_0002_0002.summary: Taystee shows off her business skills. Meanwhile, Red feels isolated.

tvmaze170_0016_0002_0003.name: Hugs Can Be Deceiving
tvmaze170_0016_0002_0003.summary: Morello gets her heart broken. Later, someone from Taystee's past shows up.

tvmaze170_0017_0002_0004.name: A Whole Other Hole
tvmaze170_0017_0002_0004.summary: Sophia gives the women a lesson in female anatomy. Meanwhile, Larry makes changes to his life.

tvmaze170_0018_0002_0005.name: Low Self Esteem City
tvmaze170_0018_0002_0005.summary: Gloria and Vee face off. Later, Piper receives devastating news.

tvmaze170_0019_0002_0006.name: You Also Have a Pizza
tvmaze170_0019_0002_0006.summary: The inmates prepare for a Valentine's Day party. Later, Red makes an interesting discovery.

tvmaze170_0020_0002_0007.name: Comic Sans
tvmaze170_0020_0002_0007.summary: Piper starts a prison newsletter. Meanwhile, Vee launches an entrepreneurial venture.

tvmaze170_0021_0002_0008.name: Appropriately Sized Pots
tvmaze170_0021_0002_0008.summary: Piper faces backlash over special privileges. Meanwhile, Caputo feels pressure to toughen up.

tvmaze170_0022_0002_0009.name: 40 OZ of Furlough
tvmaze170_0022_0002_0009.summary: Piper's relationship with Larry is tested. Meanwhile, Red attempts to redeem herself.

tvmaze170_0023_0002_0010.name: Little Mustachioed Shit
tvmaze170_0023_0002_0010.summary: The guards crack down on prison contraband. Later, a secret is revealed.

tvmaze170_0024_0002_0011.name: Take a Break from Your Values
tvmaze170_0024_0002_0011.summary: Piper is surprised by an unexpected change in her status. Meanwhile, Soso's hunger strike attracts support.

tvmaze170_0025_0002_0012.name: It Was the Change
tvmaze170_0025_0002_0012.summary: A power outage at the prison causes tensions to rise.

tvmaze170_0026_0002_0013.name: We Have Manners. We're Polite.
tvmaze170_0026_0002_0013.summary: The inmates face their worst nightmares in the Season 2 finale.

tvmaze170_0027_0003_0001.name: Mother's Day
tvmaze170_0027_0003_0001.summary: Caputo's kinder, gentler new regime includes organizing a Mother's Day fair for the inmates that brings up a LOT of mixed feelings about family.

tvmaze170_0028_0003_0002.name: Bed Bugs and Beyond
tvmaze170_0028_0003_0002.summary: Tempers flare when bed bugs invade, as Alex cracks, Red lashes out at Piper, Aleida interferes with Daya and Bennett, and Caputo gets bad news.

tvmaze170_0029_0003_0003.name: Empathy Is a Boner Killer
tvmaze170_0029_0003_0003.summary: Nicky's stash situation gets complicated. Alex and Crazy Eyes try a new drama class. Red assists Healy with a personal matter.

tvmaze170_0030_0003_0004.name: Finger In The Dyke
tvmaze170_0030_0003_0004.summary: Big Boo comes up with a scheme to make money. Daya, Taystee and Crazy Eyes confront reality. Caputo tries to make a good impression on some visitors.

tvmaze170_0031_0003_0005.name: Fake It Till You Fake It Some More
tvmaze170_0031_0003_0005.summary: Rumors fly among the inmates about a new, higher-paying job assignment, especially when they have to take a test for it.

tvmaze170_0032_0003_0006.name: Ching Chong Chang
tvmaze170_0032_0003_0006.summary: Regime change isn't going over well with the staff, but Red makes it work for her. Lorna finds a way to meet men. Chang shows her private side.

tvmaze170_0033_0003_0007.name: Tongue-Tied
tvmaze170_0033_0003_0007.summary: Norma's healing powers draw more believers. Piper creates a new business venture. Caputo breaks in the new hires.

tvmaze170_0034_0003_0008.name: Fear, and Other Smells
tvmaze170_0034_0003_0008.summary: Piper gets creative in order to grow her business. Crazy Eyes's sci-fi sex story for drama class is a hit. Alex doesn't trust new inmate Lolly.

tvmaze170_0035_0003_0009.name: Where My Dreidel At
tvmaze170_0035_0003_0009.summary: Too many inmates seem to be getting religion, so a rabbi comes to visit and Leanne tries to organize Norma's followers.

tvmaze170_0036_0003_0010.name: A Tittin' and A Hairin'
tvmaze170_0036_0003_0010.summary: Pennsatucky, Piper, Crazy Eyes and Lorna get closer with their new admirers. Tensions between Sophia and Gloria, and Alex and Lolly escalate.

tvmaze170_0037_0003_0011.name: We Can Be Heroes
tvmaze170_0037_0003_0011.summary: Caputo and Piper confront labor issues. A miracle occurs in Norma's group. Crazy Eyes's erotica winds up in the hands of the staff.

tvmaze170_0038_0003_0012.name: Don't Make Me Come Back There
tvmaze170_0038_0003_0012.summary: Daya goes into labor. Sophia suffers a hate crime. Stella helps Piper with a business snag. Taystee takes on a new role.

tvmaze170_0039_0003_0013.name: Trust No Bitch
tvmaze170_0039_0003_0013.summary: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.

show_list.name: House of Cards
show_list.summary: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

first_episode.name: Chapter 1
first_episode.summary: Allegiances are abandoned after a promise is broken in the opener of this drama, which follows a ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife as they navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C.

last_episode.name: Chapter 52
last_episode.summary: As the hostage situation continues, Claire secretly negotiates with Yusuf al Ahmadi. Frank confronts Hammerschmidt.

tvmaze175_0001_0001_0001.name: Chapter 1
tvmaze175_0001_0001_0001.summary: Allegiances are abandoned after a promise is broken in the opener of this drama, which follows a ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife as they navigate the corridors of power in Washington, D.C.

tvmaze175_0002_0001_0002.name: Chapter 2
tvmaze175_0002_0001_0002.summary: Francis attacks the White House through the media; Claire makes a cruel decision.

tvmaze175_0003_0001_0003.name: Chapter 3
tvmaze175_0003_0001_0003.summary: Francis deals with a crisis in his home district; Zoe experiences the politics of journalism.

tvmaze175_0004_0001_0004.name: Chapter 4
tvmaze175_0004_0001_0004.summary: Francis takes on leaders in Congress; Peter Russo is forced to choose between politics and family.

tvmaze175_0005_0001_0005.name: Chapter 5
tvmaze175_0005_0001_0005.summary: Francis' fight over an education bill creates unfortunate side effects.

tvmaze175_0006_0001_0006.name: Chapter 6
tvmaze175_0006_0001_0006.summary: Francis battles striking teachers; Claire receives a surprise confession.

tvmaze175_0007_0001_0007.name: Chapter 7
tvmaze175_0007_0001_0007.summary: Francis wins a major victory; Peter faces his past; and Stamper attempts to bury a secret.

tvmaze175_0008_0001_0008.name: Chapter 8
tvmaze175_0008_0001_0008.summary: Francis receives an honor; Peter returns to Philadelphia.

tvmaze175_0009_0001_0009.name: Chapter 9
tvmaze175_0009_0001_0009.summary: Francis and Stamper seek support in Congress.

tvmaze175_0010_0001_0010.name: Chapter 10
tvmaze175_0010_0001_0010.summary: Claire defies Francis; Peter presents an ultimatum.

tvmaze175_0011_0001_0011.name: Chapter 11
tvmaze175_0011_0001_0011.summary: Peter battles personal demons; Francis enters dangerous territory.

tvmaze175_0013_0001_0013.name: Chapter 13
tvmaze175_0013_0001_0013.summary: Francis desperately tries to keep his plan on track in the Season 1 finale. Later, Claire suffers the consequences of her decisions.

tvmaze175_0014_0002_0001.name: Chapter 14
tvmaze175_0014_0002_0001.summary: The Underwoods face two threats in the Season 2 premiere. Later, Francis grooms his replacement; and Claire goes on the offensive.

tvmaze175_0015_0002_0002.name: Chapter 15
tvmaze175_0015_0002_0002.summary: Francis targets China. Meanwhile, Claire confronts a painful trauma from her past; and Lucas Goodwin presses for the truth.

tvmaze175_0016_0002_0003.name: Chapter 16
tvmaze175_0016_0002_0003.summary: Tensions rise between Francis and Raymond Tusk. Later, a battle in the Senate pits Francis against the Republicans.

tvmaze175_0017_0002_0004.name: Chapter 17
tvmaze175_0017_0002_0004.summary: A terror scare at the Capitol traps Francis with a resentful Donald Blythe. Meanwhile, Claire gives an attention-grabbing live interview.

tvmaze175_0018_0002_0005.name: Chapter 18
tvmaze175_0018_0002_0005.summary: Lucas goes to extreme measures to expose Francis.

tvmaze175_0019_0002_0006.name: Chapter 19
tvmaze175_0019_0002_0006.summary: Francis and Tusk end their alliance. Meanwhile, Lucas must make a difficult choice; and Stamper grows closer to Rachel.

tvmaze175_0020_0002_0007.name: Chapter 20
tvmaze175_0020_0002_0007.summary: The Walkers deepen their friendship with the Underwoods.

tvmaze175_0021_0002_0008.name: Chapter 21
tvmaze175_0021_0002_0008.summary: Claire influences Tricia Walker politically and domestically. Later, Francis has a showdown with Linda Vasquez.

tvmaze175_0023_0002_0010.name: Chapter 23
tvmaze175_0023_0002_0010.summary: Francis tries to finish off Tusk for good. Later, Claire and Jackie Sharp collide.

tvmaze175_0024_0002_0011.name: Chapter 24
tvmaze175_0024_0002_0011.summary: Francis is interrogated. Meanwhile, Stamper wrestles with personal demons.

tvmaze175_0025_0002_0012.name: Chapter 25
tvmaze175_0025_0002_0012.summary: Francis finds himself shut out. Later, Claire makes a difficult sacrifice; and Stamper tries to regain control.

tvmaze175_0026_0002_0013.name: Chapter 26
tvmaze175_0026_0002_0013.summary: Francis faces annihilation in the Season 2 finale. Meanwhile, Stamper ties up loose ends; and Claire feels the repercussions of ruthlessness.

tvmaze175_0027_0003_0001.name: Chapter 27
tvmaze175_0027_0003_0001.summary: A rocky start for the Underwoord Presidency. Frank wants to introduce an ambitious jobs program, while Claire sets her sights on the United Nations.

tvmaze175_0028_0003_0002.name: Chapter 28
tvmaze175_0028_0003_0002.summary: Claire's U.N. bid runs into trouble. Frank fights off mutiny with a bold address to the country.

tvmaze175_0029_0003_0003.name: Chapter 29
tvmaze175_0029_0003_0003.summary: The Russian President's state visit becomes a Cold War of wills and some punks heat things up.

tvmaze175_0030_0003_0004.name: Chapter 30
tvmaze175_0030_0003_0004.summary: Claire bypasses Russia at the U.N. Frank tries to outmaneuver a potential challenger and ends up face to face with a higher power.

tvmaze175_0031_0003_0005.name: Chapter 31
tvmaze175_0031_0003_0005.summary: Frank declares war on Congress to jump-start his jobs program. Claire spars with the Russian ambassador.

tvmaze175_0032_0003_0006.name: Chapter 32
tvmaze175_0032_0003_0006.summary: Frank and Claire travel to Moscow to negotiate the return of an imprisoned U.S. citizen. Claire takes a stand that jeopardizes their plans.

tvmaze175_0033_0003_0007.name: Chapter 33
tvmaze175_0033_0003_0007.summary: The damage is done, and the Underwoods must repair it. But deep wounds don't heal fast and sometimes not at all.

tvmaze175_0034_0003_0008.name: Chapter 34
tvmaze175_0034_0003_0008.summary: A hurricane endangers more than just the entire East Coast, and Frank must make a difficult choice.

tvmaze175_0035_0003_0009.name: Chapter 35
tvmaze175_0035_0003_0009.summary: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos just as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets disturbing intel and counsels him.

tvmaze175_0036_0003_0010.name: Chapter 36
tvmaze175_0036_0003_0010.summary: Frank needs to deal with Petrov one on one, while Claire tries to preserve the peacekeeping mission. Sacrifices must be made.

tvmaze175_0037_0003_0011.name: Chapter 37
tvmaze175_0037_0003_0011.summary: Things turn ugly when Frank, Jackie, and Heather square off during their first debate. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

tvmaze175_0038_0003_0012.name: Chapter 38
tvmaze175_0038_0003_0012.summary: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos just as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets disturbing intel and counsels him.

tvmaze175_0039_0003_0013.name: Chapter 39
tvmaze175_0039_0003_0013.summary: In the midst of the Iowa caucuses, Frank and Claire must confront hard truths about each other.

tvmaze175_0040_0004_0001.name: Chapter 40
tvmaze175_0040_0004_0001.summary: Claire's absence causes problems for Frank on the campaign trail amid rumors of a marital rift. Claire tries to strike out on her own.

tvmaze175_0041_0004_0002.name: Chapter 41
tvmaze175_0041_0004_0002.summary: As Claire begins exploring a campaign of her own, she and Frank engage in backdoor political maneuvering. But this time they're not on the same side.

tvmaze175_0042_0004_0003.name: Chapter 42
tvmaze175_0042_0004_0003.summary: Claire joins Frank as he stumps in South Carolina, but he doesn't trust her. A disastrous scandal blindsides Frank's campaign on primary day.

tvmaze175_0043_0004_0004.name: Chapter 43
tvmaze175_0043_0004_0004.summary: Claire threatens Frank. Frank makes a politically bold move that may provoke Russia. An event at a campaign stop changes everything.

tvmaze175_0044_0004_0005.name: Chapter 44
tvmaze175_0044_0004_0005.summary: Claire advises Donald Blythe on dealing with Petrov. Further investigations of Lucas Goodwin dredges up his accusations against Frank.

tvmaze175_0045_0004_0006.name: Chapter 45
tvmaze175_0045_0004_0006.summary: Claire clashes with the Secretary of State over her involvement in negotiations with Russia. Dunbar must choose between her campaign and her ethics.

tvmaze175_0046_0004_0007.name: Chapter 46
tvmaze175_0046_0004_0007.summary: Frank and Claire adjust to their new reality. The search for Frank's running mate begins. Frank starts a campaign to weaken Conway's strong support.

tvmaze175_0047_0004_0008.name: Chapter 47
tvmaze175_0047_0004_0008.summary: Formidable as ever, both Underwoods have their eyes on the big picture as they manipulate a potential running mate and push the gun bill.

tvmaze175_0048_0004_0009.name: Chapter 48
tvmaze175_0048_0004_0009.summary: At the convention, Frank and his team publicly push for Catherine Durant to be chosen as his running mate, but privately pursue a different agenda.

tvmaze175_0049_0004_0010.name: Chapter 49
tvmaze175_0049_0004_0010.summary: As Frank deals with a new threat to his candidacy, Claire has doubts about their plan. Claire faces a difficult decision concerning her mother.

tvmaze175_0050_0004_0011.name: Chapter 50
tvmaze175_0050_0004_0011.summary: Frank ups the ante on the war on terror to counter Conway's public show of strength. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

tvmaze175_0051_0004_0012.name: Chapter 51
tvmaze175_0051_0004_0012.summary: Frank asks Will to help deal with extremists threatening to murder hostages. Hammerschmidt digs deeper into the allegations against Frank.

tvmaze175_0052_0004_0013.name: Chapter 52
tvmaze175_0052_0004_0013.summary: As the hostage situation continues, Claire secretly negotiates with Yusuf al Ahmadi. Frank confronts Hammerschmidt.

show_list.name: Supergirl
show_list.summary: Born on the planet Krypton, Kara Zor-El escaped amid its destruction years ago. Since arriving on Earth, she's been hiding the powers she shares with her famous cousin. But now at age 24, she decides to embrace her superhuman abilities and become the hero she was destined to be.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Twenty-four-year-old Kara Zor-El, cousin of Superman, who was taken in by the Danvers family when she was 12 after being sent away from Krypton, must learn to embrace her powers after previously hiding them.

last_episode.name: Better Angels
last_episode.summary: To stop Non from wiping out Earth's population, Supergirl has no choice but to sacrifice her life. Before she does so, Kara says goodbye as best she can to her friends without telling them the truth and inciting a panic.

tvmaze1850_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze1850_0001_0001_0001.summary: Twenty-four-year-old Kara Zor-El, cousin of Superman, who was taken in by the Danvers family when she was 12 after being sent away from Krypton, must learn to embrace her powers after previously hiding them.

tvmaze1850_0002_0001_0002.name: Stronger Together
tvmaze1850_0002_0001_0002.summary: A new Fort Rozz prisoner, Hellgrammite, commits a series of robberies of chemical manufacturing plants. While the DEO goes after him, Supergirl discovers that fame is fickle when the public turns against her after a series of mishaps.

tvmaze1850_0003_0001_0003.name: Fight or Flight
tvmaze1850_0003_0001_0003.summary: Supergirl faces her first non-alien nemesis when one of her cousin's enemies--the nuclear-powered Reactron--comes looking to kill her. Meanwhile, Cat runs a derogatory exposé on Supergirl after interviewing the superhero.

tvmaze1850_0004_0001_0004.name: Livewire
tvmaze1850_0004_0001_0004.summary: Kara has her hands full dealing with her foster mother Eliza's visit as well as a new super-villain, Livewire, who is out for revenge against Cat.

tvmaze1850_0005_0001_0005.name: How Does She Do It?
tvmaze1850_0005_0001_0005.summary: Kara finds herself juggling her personal and public lives when she offers to take care of Cat's son Carter, deal with James' relationship with Lucy, and try to stop a bomber who is targeting Maxtech properties.

tvmaze1850_0006_0001_0006.name: Red Faced
tvmaze1850_0006_0001_0006.summary: While Kara deals with personal pressures as both office assistant and superhero, General Sam Lane arrives in National City to field-test his new anti-insurgent android, Red Tornado... and to tell James that he's not good enough for his daughter Lucy. Meanwhile, Alex and Kara ask Winn to hack the DEO mainframe to find out how Jeremiah died, and Cat deals with her domineering mother.

tvmaze1850_0007_0001_0007.name: Human for a Day
tvmaze1850_0007_0001_0007.summary: Kara is still without her powers when an earthquake rocks National City. Now she and her friends must rise to the occasion. Meanwhile, the DEO's attempts to restrain an escaped prisoner are threatened by Alex's mistrust of Hank after she learns of his role in Jeremiah's death.

tvmaze1850_0008_0001_0008.name: Hostile Takeover
tvmaze1850_0008_0001_0008.summary: Astra calls Supergirl out to fight, but soon loses. However, Hank and Alex suspect that the Kryptonian general lost too easily. Meanwhile, an email hack threatens Cat's position as CEO of CatCo, and Kara learns that someone is trying to force her boss out of the company.

tvmaze1850_0009_0001_0009.name: Blood Bonds
tvmaze1850_0009_0001_0009.summary: Supergirl tries to convince her aunt to help them recover Hank from the Kryptonians and is forced to rely on blind faith. Meanwhile, Max continues his campaign to bring down Supergirl, and Kara tries to convince Cat that she and Supergirl are not one and the same.

tvmaze1850_0010_0001_0010.name: Childish Things
tvmaze1850_0010_0001_0010.summary: The Toyman--Winn's father--breaks out of prison and begins a new criminal rampage on a quest to be reunited with his son. Meanwhile, Lucy accepts a job at CatCo, much to Jimmy's discomfort.

tvmaze1850_0011_0001_0011.name: Strange Visitor from Another Planet
tvmaze1850_0011_0001_0011.summary: Kara must help Hank face his painful past when a White Martian, a member of the alien race that wiped out his people, kidnaps Senator Miranda Crane, an anti-alien politician. Also, Cat's estranged son, Adam, arrives in National City.

tvmaze1850_0012_0001_0012.name: Bizarro
tvmaze1850_0012_0001_0012.summary: Max creates a reverse image of Supergirl using her DNA, and sets it to fight the Woman of Steel. Meanwhile, James and Winn share a drink, and Max reveals to Alex how much he knows about her connection to Supergirl.

tvmaze1850_0013_0001_0013.name: For the Girl Who Has Everything
tvmaze1850_0013_0001_0013.summary: Supergirl is ensnared by an alien plant that forces her into her deepest desire, and her friends and sister must free her before it's too late. Meanwhile, the Kryptonians launch their plan to bring humanity to its knees and save Earth.

tvmaze1850_0014_0001_0014.name: Truth, Justice and the American Way
tvmaze1850_0014_0001_0014.summary: An armored alien with advanced tech is hunting down the Fort Rozz prisoners... and executing them. While Supergirl tries to find him, James questions whether the DEO has the right to lock up Max without charges or a trial. Meanwhile, Kara tries to deal with Cat's new assistant at work, who is intent on upstaging Kara.

tvmaze1850_0015_0001_0015.name: Solitude
tvmaze1850_0015_0001_0015.summary: A new enemy emerges to threaten Supergirl and National City... and has a connection to Krypton. Meanwhile, Lucy demands the truth from James, and Kara continues refusing to work with Hank, unaware that Alex is the one who killed Astra.

tvmaze1850_0016_0001_0016.name: Falling
tvmaze1850_0016_0001_0016.summary: After defending Supergirl to the public, Cat is forced to issue a public warning after exposure to Red Kryptonite turns Supergirl into a power-mad villain.

tvmaze1850_0017_0001_0017.name: Manhunter
tvmaze1850_0017_0001_0017.summary: A captive Hank tells the U.S government how he came to lead the DEO, but receives a less than sympathetic ear. Meanwhile, Kara reveals her identity to someone close to the investigation, and Siobhan plans revenge Kara for getting her fired from CatCo.

tvmaze1850_0018_0001_0018.name: Worlds Finest
tvmaze1850_0018_0001_0018.summary: Supergirl finds herself in a super team-up when a new superhero, The Flash, accidentally crosses dimensions and finds himself in Kara's universe. Together they have to battle Livewire and a new villainess, Silver Banshee.

tvmaze1850_0019_0001_0019.name: Myriad
tvmaze1850_0019_0001_0019.summary: Kara must find a way to free her friends when Non and Indigo use mind control to turn National City's citizens into their own army.

tvmaze1850_0020_0001_0020.name: Better Angels
tvmaze1850_0020_0001_0020.summary: To stop Non from wiping out Earth's population, Supergirl has no choice but to sacrifice her life. Before she does so, Kara says goodbye as best she can to her friends without telling them the truth and inciting a panic.

show_list.name: Minority Report
show_list.summary:
The future is coming.

Based on the international blockbuster film by executive producer Steven Spielberg and the first of his films to be adapted for television, MINORITY REPORT follows the unlikely partnership between a man haunted by the future and a cop haunted by her past, as they race to stop the worst crimes of the year 2065 before they happen.

Set in Washington, D.C., it is 10 years after the demise of Precrime, a law enforcement agency tasked with identifying and eliminating criminals…before their crimes were committed. To carry out this brand of justice, the agency used three precogs – "precognitives" Dash, Arthur and Agatha – who were able to see the future. Now, in 2065, crime-solving is different, and justice leans more on sophisticated and trusted technology than on the instincts of the precogs.

first_episode.name: Preview #1
first_episode.summary: A man haunted by the future and a cop haunted by her past race to stop the worst crimes before they happen in this very special preview of the new Fall show MINORITY REPORT!

last_episode.name: Everybody Runs
last_episode.summary: The precogs and Vega must come together to thwart a chemical attack by Memento Mori, meanwhile Blomfeld (guest star Reed Diamond) is determined to get the precogs back in the milk bath.

tvmaze1858_0000_0001_0000S01.name: Preview #1
tvmaze1858_0000_0001_0000S01.summary: A man haunted by the future and a cop haunted by her past race to stop the worst crimes before they happen in this very special preview of the new Fall show MINORITY REPORT!

tvmaze1858_0000_0001_0000S02.name: Preview #2
tvmaze1858_0000_0001_0000S02.summary: Based on Steven Spielberg's international blockbuster film and the first of his films to be adapted for television, MINORITY REPORT follows the partnership between a man (Stark Sands, "Inside Llewyn Davis") haunted by the future and a cop (Meagan Good, "Think Like A Man" franchise, "Californication") haunted by her past, as they race to stop the worst crimes before they happen.

tvmaze1858_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze1858_0001_0001_0001.summary: Ten years ago Precrime ended in Washington D.C., one of the three Pre-Cogs is still haunted by his visions of crimes about to happen and is struggling to lead a normal life.

tvmaze1858_0002_0001_0002.name: Mr. Nice Guy
tvmaze1858_0002_0001_0002.summary: Dash and Vega team up again to find a killer who is currently down on love. Meanwhile, Dash continues to reach out to his siblings for help.

tvmaze1858_0003_0001_0003.name: Hawk-Eye
tvmaze1858_0003_0001_0003.summary: With the initiation of Hawk-Eye, a new police program monitoring suspicious behavior, Vega seeks help from Akeela to get Dash in as the new program analyst. Meanwhile, Vega and Dash begin to suspect that Arthur may have a bigger plan up his sleeve.

tvmaze1858_0004_0001_0004.name: Fredi
tvmaze1858_0004_0001_0004.summary: Dash goes undercover to catch a woman suspected of having a vendetta against her sister's killers. Meanwhile, Agatha begins to set her own plans in motion.

tvmaze1858_0005_0001_0005.name: The Present
tvmaze1858_0005_0001_0005.summary: After Dash and Vega realize that Vega is the victim in Dash's latest vision, they team up with someone who played a key role in the murder of Vega's father many years ago. Meanwhile, Arthur digs further into his and his siblings' memories.

tvmaze1858_0006_0001_0006.name: Fiddler's Neck
tvmaze1858_0006_0001_0006.summary: Arthur and Dash team up to help a young girl in poor health whom they fear is the victim they see in their next vision. Although modern technology could save her, the community in which she lives prohibits the use of such equipment. When Vega and Agatha jump into the case, everyone must work together.

tvmaze1858_0007_0001_0007.name: Honor Among Thieves
tvmaze1858_0007_0001_0007.summary: Dash endeavors to investigate a murder on his own, but when things don't go as planned, Vega is forced to reluctantly recruit Arthur and his underworld connections to help out Dash. Meanwhile, details of Agatha, Arthur and Dash's pasts are uncovered.

tvmaze1858_0008_0001_0008.name: The American Dream
tvmaze1858_0008_0001_0008.summary: Dash and Vega follow a vision to the Southside, encountering distrust from the community. Meanwhile, Blake's suspicion of Vega and Dash intensifies.

tvmaze1858_0009_0001_0009.name: Memento Mori
tvmaze1858_0009_0001_0009.summary: Blake withholds information from the Defense Intelligence Agency when he learns they are on the precogs' trail, and Arthur takes matters into his own hands to save them. Meanwhile, Dash gets a vision of a political assassination that intrudes into Vega's personal life.

tvmaze1858_0010_0001_0010.name: Everybody Runs
tvmaze1858_0010_0001_0010.summary: The precogs and Vega must come together to thwart a chemical attack by Memento Mori, meanwhile Blomfeld (guest star Reed Diamond) is determined to get the precogs back in the milk bath.

show_list.name: Lucifer
show_list.summary:
The Devil has come to Los Angeles…

Based upon the characters created by Neil Gaiman, Sam Kieth and Mike Dringenberg for DC Entertainment's Vertigo imprint, Lucifer is the story of the original fallen angel. Bored and unhappy as the Lord of Hell, Lucifer Morningstar has abandoned his throne and retired to L.A., where he owns Lux, an upscale nightclub.

Charming, charismatic and devilishly handsome, Lucifer is enjoying his retirement, indulging in a few of his favorite things--wine, women and song-–when a beautiful pop star is brutally murdered outside of Lux. For the first time in roughly 10 billion years, he feels something awaken deep within him as a result of this murder. Compassion? Sympathy? The very thought disturbs him--as well as his best friend and confidante, Mazkeen aka Maze, a fierce demon in the form of a beautiful young woman.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Lucifer has decided to take a vacation from Hell. When a former "client" turns up on his doorstep and is soon murdered, Lucifer vows to make the person responsible pay... and joins forces with a police detective to make it happen.

last_episode.name: Take Me Back to Hell
last_episode.summary: Chloe and Dan both realize that Lucifer is innocent of murder, but Dan has to sacrifice his career and his freedom to clear Lucifer's name. Meanwhile, Amenadiel is mortally wounded, and Lucifer makes a deal with his Father.

tvmaze1859_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze1859_0001_0001_0001.summary: Lucifer has decided to take a vacation from Hell. When a former "client" turns up on his doorstep and is soon murdered, Lucifer vows to make the person responsible pay... and joins forces with a police detective to make it happen.

tvmaze1859_0002_0001_0002.name: Lucifer, Stay. Good Devil.
tvmaze1859_0002_0001_0002.summary: As Lucifer begins realizing that he's changing because of his time on Earth, Chloe unofficially investigates the case of a paparazzo who drove an actor's son to his death.

tvmaze1859_0003_0001_0003.name: The Would-Be Prince of Darkness
tvmaze1859_0003_0001_0003.summary: Lucifer encourages a young quarterback to lose his virginity with an attractive woman at a party. However, the woman turns up dead the next day in the quarterback's swimming pool, and Lucifer sets out to find the guilty party and punish them.

tvmaze1859_0004_0001_0004.name: Manly Whatnots
tvmaze1859_0004_0001_0004.summary: Lucifer misunderstands Linda's suggestion that he demystify Chloe and decides to try sleeping with her. Meanwhile, Chloe pursues the case of a missing girl who disappeared after meeting the head of a "Player" organization.

tvmaze1859_0005_0001_0005.name: Sweet Kicks
tvmaze1859_0005_0001_0005.summary: Lucifer becomes mixed up with a gang war when a woman belonging to one gang gets killed at a fashion show, and the designer is a former member of a rival gang. Meanwhile, Dan asks Lucifer to look after Chloe, and Amenadiel starts infiltrating Lucifer's life by approaching Linda.

tvmaze1859_0006_0001_0006.name: Favorite Son
tvmaze1859_0006_0001_0006.summary: A "simple" robbery and murder holds no interest for Lucifer... until he discovers that he was the one who was robbed. Dan has to choose between his family and his job, and has an unfortunate encounter with Maze. Meanwhile, Amenaziel gives Linda advise on how to deal with her patient Lucifer.

tvmaze1859_0007_0001_0007.name: Wingman
tvmaze1859_0007_0001_0007.summary: Unable to reveal the truth without admitting to Chloe that he lied, Lucifer asks Amenadiel to help him recover his stolen wings. Meanwhile, Chloe and Dan try to determine what really happened in the Palmetto case.

tvmaze1859_0008_0001_0008.name: Et Tu, Doctor?
tvmaze1859_0008_0001_0008.summary: Lucifer tries to deal with his jealousy when it looks like Chloe and Dan are trying to get back together. He wants Linda to "fix" Chloe, and convinces a judge to appoint Linda to go through a murdered therapist's files. Meanwhile, Malcolm plays Chloe a visit.

tvmaze1859_0009_0001_0009.name: A Priest Walks Into a Bar
tvmaze1859_0009_0001_0009.summary: A priest, Father Frank, asks Lucifer for help stopping a teenager from getting involved in a local drug ring. Lucifer questions whether Frank is sincere, and whether the boy can be saved. Meanwhile, Malcolm pressures Dan to get a gun for him out of Evidence.

tvmaze1859_0010_0001_0010.name: Pops
tvmaze1859_0010_0001_0010.summary: Lucifer and Chloe try to solve the case of a poisoned restaurant owner, and suspect that his son is the killer. Meanwhile, Maze asks Linda for advice, and Chloe's actress mother pays a visit.

tvmaze1859_0011_0001_0011.name: St. Lucifer
tvmaze1859_0011_0001_0011.summary: When a former NBA player and current philanthropist is murdered, Chloe suspects that he wasn't as benevolent as he seemed. Meanwhile, Lucifer explores his own benevolence after he refuses to sleep with Chloe, and comes to a realization about his bouts of vulnerability.

tvmaze1859_0012_0001_0012.name: #TeamLucifer
tvmaze1859_0012_0001_0012.summary: When a woman is found dead in a theater, "Hail Lucifer" carved in her back, the trail leads to a Satanic cult... and a killer who is possibly trying to impress Lucifer. Meanwhile, Maze finds herself torn between her duty and her feelings, and Amenadiel pays Lucifer a visit.

tvmaze1859_0013_0001_0013.name: Take Me Back to Hell
tvmaze1859_0013_0001_0013.summary: Chloe and Dan both realize that Lucifer is innocent of murder, but Dan has to sacrifice his career and his freedom to clear Lucifer's name. Meanwhile, Amenadiel is mortally wounded, and Lucifer makes a deal with his Father.

show_list.name: Mr. Robot
show_list.summary: "Mr. Robot" follows Elliot, a young programmer who works as a cyber-security engineer by day and as a vigilante hacker by night. Elliot finds himself at a crossroads when the mysterious leader of an underground hacker group recruits him to destroy the firm he is paid to protect. Compelled by his personal beliefs, Elliot struggles to resist the chance to take down the multinational CEOs he believes are running (and ruining) the world.

first_episode.name: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
first_episode.summary: In MR. ROBOT, Elliot, a cyber-security engineer by day and vigilante hacker by night, is recruited by a mysterious underground group to destroy the firm he's paid to protect. Elliot must decide how far he'll go to expose the forces he believes are running (and ruining) the world.

previous_episode.name: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
previous_episode.summary: In the Season 1 finale, Mr. Robot and Tyrell are MIA; and a past hack haunts Elliot.

tvmaze1871_0001_0001_0001.name: eps1.0_hellofriend.mov
tvmaze1871_0001_0001_0001.summary: In MR. ROBOT, Elliot, a cyber-security engineer by day and vigilante hacker by night, is recruited by a mysterious underground group to destroy the firm he's paid to protect. Elliot must decide how far he'll go to expose the forces he believes are running (and ruining) the world.

tvmaze1871_0002_0001_0002.name: eps1.1_ones-and-zer0es.mpeg
tvmaze1871_0002_0001_0002.summary: Tyrell Wellick, now Evil Corp's acting CTO since Elliot helped get Terry Colby arrested, makes Elliot an offer he can (and does) refuse: a position as Evil Corp's head of Cyber Security and a big bank account to match. By saying no, has Elliot made himself a mark for Wellick?

tvmaze1871_0003_0001_0003.name: eps1.2_d3bug.mkv
tvmaze1871_0003_0001_0003.summary: After being shoved off the railing in Coney Island by Mr. Robot, Elliot wakes up in a hospital room, badly banged up. Krista, his psychiatrist, is inclined to send him to rehab unless he's willing to be regularly drug tested. Elliot complies, knowing that he can easily change the hospital records for the tests since he hacked their system long ago.

tvmaze1871_0004_0001_0004.name: eps1.3_da3m0ns.mp4
tvmaze1871_0004_0001_0004.summary: At fsociety, Elliot lays out his plan to hack Steel Mountain's climate control system and raise the heat high enough to melt all the tapes that record the data. Romero points out the plan's many flaws but when Elliot remembers that they only have a few days left before Evil Corp switches over to their new redundant security protocols based on what Tyrell Wellick told him, they reluctantly agree it's now or never.

tvmaze1871_0005_0001_0005.name: eps1.4_3xpl0its.wmv
tvmaze1871_0005_0001_0005.summary: Fsociety attempts to penetrate Steel Mountain, the most secure data facility in America.

tvmaze1871_0006_0001_0006.name: eps1.5_br4ve-trave1er.asf
tvmaze1871_0006_0001_0006.summary: Elliot attempts to hack Vera out of jail in order to save someone he cares about; Tyrell's "game" gets crazy; and Angela digs deeper into her mother's death.

tvmaze1871_0007_0001_0007.name: eps1.6_v1ew-s0urce.flv
tvmaze1871_0007_0001_0007.summary: Elliott goes missing; Mr. Robot tries to pull fsociety back together; Angela goes head-to-head with an old nemesis.

tvmaze1871_0008_0001_0008.name: eps1.7_wh1ter0se.m4v
tvmaze1871_0008_0001_0008.summary: Allsafe is controlled; the Dark Army is ready to meet Elliot; and Tyrell and Joanna's plan goes into effect.

tvmaze1871_0009_0001_0009.name: eps1.8_m1rr0r1ng.qt
tvmaze1871_0009_0001_0009.summary: The Evil Corp hack is threatened by a mystery man from Elliot's past.

tvmaze1871_0010_0001_0010.name: eps1.9_zer0-day.avi
tvmaze1871_0010_0001_0010.summary: In the Season 1 finale, Mr. Robot and Tyrell are MIA; and a past hack haunts Elliot.

show_list.name: Quantico
show_list.summary: A diverse group of recruits has arrived at the FBI Quantico Base for training. They are the best, the brightest and the most vetted, so it seems impossible that one of them is suspected of masterminding the biggest attack on New York City since 9/11.

first_episode.name: Run
first_episode.summary: A diverse group of recruits has arrived at the FBI Quantico Base for training. They are the best, the brightest and the most vetted, so it seems impossible that one of them is suspected of masterminding the biggest attack on New York City since 9/11.

previous_episode.name: Closure
previous_episode.summary: The NATS are excited that graduation is near as they prepare to leave Quantico and head out into the real world for their new assignments. In the future, Alex learns someone she cared about at Quantico is not who they seemed to be, as she finds herself at the heart of another possible attack.

next_episode.name: Yes
next_episode.summary: It's graduation day for the NATS of Quantico, while, in the future, Alex and her team find themselves head-to-head with the terrorist,

last_episode.name: Yes
last_episode.summary: It's graduation day for the NATS of Quantico, while, in the future, Alex and her team find themselves head-to-head with the terrorist,

tvmaze2114_0001_0001_0001.name: Run
tvmaze2114_0001_0001_0001.summary: A diverse group of recruits has arrived at the FBI Quantico Base for training. They are the best, the brightest and the most vetted, so it seems impossible that one of them is suspected of masterminding the biggest attack on New York City since 9/11.

tvmaze2114_0002_0001_0002.name: America
tvmaze2114_0002_0001_0002.summary: Alex is on the run and must outsmart Liam and his team to get into her apartment for anything that could help clear her name. Meanwhile, in a flashback to Quantico training, the NATS are tasked with finding a needle in a haystack while looking for potential threats to national security.

tvmaze2114_0003_0001_0003.name: Cover
tvmaze2114_0003_0001_0003.summary: At Quantico, Alex learns of her father's FBI past; and, in the future, Liam asks Alex's mother to take part in a televised press conference geared to getting Alex to turn herself in. In other events, at Quantico, the NATS learn the art of profiling and focus on their classmates' strengths and weaknesses.

tvmaze2114_0004_0001_0004.name: Kill
tvmaze2114_0004_0001_0004.summary: At Quantico, the recruits take part in a hostage rescue training exercise that leaves Alex questioning whether she should quit; and, in the future, she finds possible evidence that seems to point to one of her closest classmates.

tvmaze2114_0005_0001_0005.name: Found
tvmaze2114_0005_0001_0005.summary: The trainees leave campus for the first time while undergoing their first undercover assignment. With an evening full of unpredictable events, Alex and Ryan find themselves getting close while the recruits' skills are tested. In the future, Alex decides to tell her side of the story and sits down for her first public interview leaving everyone watching to wonder who is really telling the truth.

tvmaze2114_0006_0001_0006.name: God
tvmaze2114_0006_0001_0006.summary: The NATs learn surveillance by putting it into practice with Miranda and her troubled son, Charlie. Shelby tries to keep Caleb at a distance, but Raina opens the door to a closer relationship with Simon. In the future, Alex is helped when she tries to hack into an FBI computer.

tvmaze2114_0007_0001_0007.name: Go
tvmaze2114_0007_0001_0007.summary: It's midterm exam time at Quantico where the NATS are given an explosive assignment which results in some people going home for good. In the future, Alex continues to try and clear her name, finding Nimah and Raina who provide more questions than answers leaving Alex and the world to wonder, "who can you really trust?"

tvmaze2114_0008_0001_0008.name: Over
tvmaze2114_0008_0001_0008.summary: In the future, a hack of the FBI computer system causes confidential information to become public; and Alex realizes that a second bomb is in NYC. In other events, at Quantico, the NATs receive individual assignments that are actually connected.

tvmaze2114_0009_0001_0009.name: Guilty
tvmaze2114_0009_0001_0009.summary: At "Quantico," the NATS attend a class with guest speaker Dr. Susan Langdon. Dr. Langdon is a former agent and profiler who tasks the trainees with looking at serial killer cases to find the one victim that doesn't fit the case, but when Simon becomes too good at finding things that don't belong, it's his life that becomes endangered. In the future, Alex is interrogated by a highly sophisticated FBI team while Ryan's life hangs in the balance.

tvmaze2114_0010_0001_0010.name: Quantico
tvmaze2114_0010_0001_0010.summary: At Quantico, an emergency disciplinary hearing causes deep secrets to be spilled, while in the future Alex works covertly with her team to find the real bomber before her time runs out.

tvmaze2114_0011_0001_0011.name: Inside
tvmaze2114_0011_0001_0011.summary: The terrorists behind the Grand Central Station bombing reveal themselves. In other events, at Quantico, the recruits are given time off for the holidays, but not everyone is in a merry mood when secrets are spilled.

tvmaze2114_0012_0001_0012.name: Alex
tvmaze2114_0012_0001_0012.summary: Alex finds herself in the middle of a congressional hearing to testify about the terrorist bombings. Convinced Elias didn't act alone, she is determined to find answers and the truth. While back at Quantico, a new group of NATS join Alex and her classmates, causing tension and competition between the groups of trainees.

tvmaze2114_0013_0001_0013.name: Clear
tvmaze2114_0013_0001_0013.summary: This week the NATS learn how to source information from confidential informants, but when they test their skills in the real world, they soon realize being an agent is not as easy as it seems. Meanwhile, in the future, Alex and a fellow agent find themselves in a life or death situation when they are forced to provide classified information that could result in deadly consequences.

tvmaze2114_0014_0001_0014.name: Answer
tvmaze2114_0014_0001_0014.summary: At Quantico, the NATS team up for defensive driving lessons while tensions between Liam and Drew explode, resulting in shocking admissions and consequences. In the future, Simon grapples with his new reality in the aftermath of what's transpired. Even though his friends try and help him, it's uncertain he will ever be the same again.

tvmaze2114_0015_0001_0015.name: Turn
tvmaze2114_0015_0001_0015.summary: A terror cell tries to infiltrate Quantico, forcing Miranda and Liam to pay a deadly price. While in the future, Alex continues to get instructions from the terrorist - only this time, it's Claire Haas' life that hangs in the balance.

tvmaze2114_0016_0001_0016.name: Clue
tvmaze2114_0016_0001_0016.summary: At Quantico, the NATS are given a training exercise that hits too close to home for Shelby. While in the future, Alex finds an unlikely ally in Hannah, as she continues to try and stop the terrorist from striking again.

tvmaze2114_0017_0001_0017.name: Care
tvmaze2114_0017_0001_0017.summary: At Quantico, the NATS' current assignment is to learn about human trafficking when Liam and Miranda challenge them to cross the U.S. / Canadian border without passports. Meanwhile, in the future, Simon continues to help Alex try to find the terrorist, but doing so puts his own life in great risk.

tvmaze2114_0018_0001_0018.name: Soon
tvmaze2114_0018_0001_0018.summary: At Quantico, the NATs look into each other's background to determine who gets high-level security clearance, and in the process Alex, Shelby and Iris learn some surprising truths about Drew, Will and Caleb. Meanwhile, in the future, Alex contacts Claire Haas in order to find her missing friends and is shocked when she discovers what happened to Caleb.

tvmaze2114_0019_0001_0019.name: Fast
tvmaze2114_0019_0001_0019.summary: It's career day at Quantico as the NATS meet representatives from various FBI branches to help them decide their future paths. In the future, Alex continues to search for the terrorist, and in the process, discovers some familiar faces - including one who knows the terrorist's endgame.

tvmaze2114_0020_0001_0020.name: Drive
tvmaze2114_0020_0001_0020.summary: With only a few weeks until graduation, the NATS are dispatched to various field offices where Alex and Ryan find themselves working a case together. Meanwhile, in the future, Shelby and Caleb's relationship takes a turn, and Alex doesn't know who to trust when she discovers new information about the man she loves.

tvmaze2114_0021_0001_0021.name: Closure
tvmaze2114_0021_0001_0021.summary: The NATS are excited that graduation is near as they prepare to leave Quantico and head out into the real world for their new assignments. In the future, Alex learns someone she cared about at Quantico is not who they seemed to be, as she finds herself at the heart of another possible attack.

tvmaze2114_0022_0001_0022.name: Yes
tvmaze2114_0022_0001_0022.summary: It's graduation day for the NATS of Quantico, while, in the future, Alex and her team find themselves head-to-head with the terrorist,

show_list.name: Rick and Morty
show_list.summary: The show centers around the titular characters Rick and Morty. Rick is a mentally gifted, but sociopathic and alcoholic scientist and a grandfather to Morty; an awkward, impressionable, and somewhat spineless teenage boy. Rick moves into the family home of Morty, where he immediately becomes a bad influence.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Rick takes Morty to another dimension to get some seeds for him but Morty's parents are considering to put Rick in a retirement home for keeping Morty away from school to help him in his lab.

last_episode.name: The Wedding Squanchers
last_episode.summary: Birdperson is getting married and invites the Smith family to the wedding.

tvmaze216_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze216_0001_0001_0001.summary: Rick takes Morty to another dimension to get some seeds for him but Morty's parents are considering to put Rick in a retirement home for keeping Morty away from school to help him in his lab.

tvmaze216_0002_0001_0002.name: Lawnmower Dog
tvmaze216_0002_0001_0002.summary: Morty's small, white dog Snuffles gets on the nerves of the family, so Rick quickly builds a knowledge enhancing helmet for the dog. In the meantime, Rick and Morty decide to incept the dreams of Morty's math teacher, Mr. Goldenfold in order to convince him to give Morty A's in math. While the duo are sent on an epic dream world journey, Snuffles slowly gains sentience, which leads to a slew of even more problems.

tvmaze216_0003_0001_0003.name: Anatomy Park
tvmaze216_0003_0001_0003.summary: It's around Christmas time and Jerry's parents are coming to visit so he wants everybody to have a normal holiday without technology and without Rick. Fortunately for him, Rick has other plans, involving building a molecular theme park inside of a friend of his named Ruben, and he shrinks down Morty and sends him in there to test it out.

tvmaze216_0004_0001_0004.name: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
tvmaze216_0004_0001_0004.summary: Rick and Morty try to get to the bottom of a mystery in this M. Night Shyamalan style twistaroony of an episode.

tvmaze216_0005_0001_0005.name: Meeseeks and Destroy
tvmaze216_0005_0001_0005.summary: Rick provides the family with a solution to their problems, freeing him up to go on an adventure led by Morty. Sounds good, better record this one, broh!

tvmaze216_0006_0001_0006.name: Rick Potion #9
tvmaze216_0006_0001_0006.summary: Rick provides Morty with a love potion to get Jessica. The serum backfires & Rick's attempt to fix things creates Cronenberg inspired monsters. Rick is okay with it but Morty feels partly responsible for creating a living nightmare.

tvmaze216_0007_0001_0007.name: Raising Gazorpazorp
tvmaze216_0007_0001_0007.summary: Morty convinces Rick to buy him a sexy robot. Guess what tho? Trouble happens, dog.

tvmaze216_0008_0001_0008.name: Rixty Minutes
tvmaze216_0008_0001_0008.summary: When Rick hooks up the family's tv receiver with reality-tv shows from alternate dimensions, and allows them to see themselves in different versions of their lives, they begin to wonder what they have, and more importantly - what could have been.

tvmaze216_0009_0001_0009.name: Something Ricked This Way Comes
tvmaze216_0009_0001_0009.summary: Rick goes to battle with the devil, and Summer gets upset about it, broh. Plus Jerry and Morty hang out, broh!

tvmaze216_0010_0001_0010.name: Close Rick-Counters of the Rick Kind
tvmaze216_0010_0001_0010.summary: Rick has a run in with some old associates, resulting in a fallout with Morty. You got any chips, broh?

tvmaze216_0011_0001_0011.name: Ricksy Business
tvmaze216_0011_0001_0011.summary: Beth and Jerry head for an iceberg of a date leaving Rick in charge. Morty doesn't get to go on any more adventures if the house isn't in the same condition when they get back.

tvmaze216_0012_0002_0001.name: A Rickle In Time
tvmaze216_0012_0002_0001.summary: Rick don goofed this time and mussed up the whole time frame broh! Beth and Jerry get romantic!

tvmaze216_0014_0002_0003.name: Auto Erotic Assimilation
tvmaze216_0014_0002_0003.summary: Rick becomes emotional; Beth and Jerry are hard on each other.

tvmaze216_0016_0002_0005.name: Get Schwifty
tvmaze216_0016_0002_0005.summary: Rick and Morty must step up and save things; a new religion starts up.

tvmaze216_0017_0002_0006.name: The Ricks Must Be Crazy
tvmaze216_0017_0002_0006.summary: Rick forgets to check his oil, and must repair his car.

tvmaze216_0018_0002_0007.name: Big Trouble In Little Sanchez
tvmaze216_0018_0002_0007.summary: Rick joins in on hijinks, Beth and Jerry sort out relationship issues.

tvmaze216_0019_0002_0008.name: Interdimensional Cable 2: Tempting Fate
tvmaze216_0019_0002_0008.summary: Jerry gets sick and Rick sparks up the TV.

tvmaze216_0021_0002_0010.summary: Birdperson is getting married and invites the Smith family to the wedding.

show_list.name: Limitless
show_list.summary: "Limitless", based on Relativity's 2011 Bradley Cooper thriller, picks up where the movie left off and follows Brian Sinclair as he discovers the power of the mysterious drug NZT, and is coerced into using his newfound drug-enhanced abilities to solve weekly cases for the FBI.

last_episode.name: Finale: Part Two!!
last_episode.summary: Following a stunning betrayal to their team, Brian and the FBI race to stop an NZT-enabled Sands and his associates from orchestrating an international incident. Also, Brian experiences devastating side effects when his NZT immunity starts to wear off.

tvmaze2473_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze2473_0001_0001_0001.summary: Brian Finch's life takes an extraordinary turn when he uses a mysterious drug, NZT, that allows him to access his full brain capacity. However, when an NZT-related murder lands Brian on the FBI's radar, he uses the drug in an attempt to stay ahead of the authorities long enough to clear his name.

tvmaze2473_0002_0001_0002.name: Badge! Gun!
tvmaze2473_0002_0001_0002.summary: Brian risks his new FBI job when he disobeys orders to stay out of the investigation into a renowned journalist's murder.

tvmaze2473_0003_0001_0003.name: The Legend of Marcos Ramos
tvmaze2473_0003_0001_0003.summary: When Brian helps Agents Harris and Boyle investigate the murder of a retired FBI agent, they're shocked to find a link to the elusive head of a notorious drug cartel. Also, Brian reconnects with an old flame, Shauna, but worries her renewed interest is really in the NZT version of him.

tvmaze2473_0004_0001_0004.name: Page 44
tvmaze2473_0004_0001_0004.summary: Senator Edward Morra's representative, demands he steal the FBI's secret files on NZT. Also, Agent Harris is emotionally conflicted when she learns what her estranged father left her following his death.

tvmaze2473_0005_0001_0005.name: Personality Crisis
tvmaze2473_0005_0001_0005.summary: Brian learns a shocking secret about Rebecca's late father but worries that telling her will land him in legal trouble. Also, Brian accidentally meddles in Rebecca's personal life while learning self-defense from her secret boyfriend, FBI Agent Casey Rooks (Desmond Harrington),

tvmaze2473_0006_0001_0006.name: Side Effects May Include...
tvmaze2473_0006_0001_0006.summary: When Brian begins to experience the side effects of NZT again, Senator Morra demands he betray Rebecca in exchange for another inoculation. Also, Brian secretly looks for an alternate cure for himself while he works with Rebecca outside FBI parameters to find the creators of NZT

tvmaze2473_0007_0001_0007.name: Brian Finch's Black Op
tvmaze2473_0007_0001_0007.summary: When Brian calls in sick for a day off from the FBI, the CIA abducts him from home to borrow his NZT-enhanced capabilities for a black ops mission. As the operation becomes increasingly dangerous, Brian finds himself without FBI support in a situation that's spiraling out of control,

tvmaze2473_0008_0001_0008.name: When Pirates Pirate Pirates
tvmaze2473_0008_0001_0008.summary: When Naz is detained on suspicion of funding terrorism, Brian and Rebecca's efforts to clear her name lead them to Naz's daughter, Ava , who reveals a family secret Naz is keeping from the FBI.

tvmaze2473_0009_0001_0009.name: Headquarters!
tvmaze2473_0009_0001_0009.summary: Brian offers to use NZT to capture the FBI's "Ten Most Wanted" criminals in two weeks, in exchange for Naz giving him his own personal work "headquarters" at the agency. Also, the secretive nature of Brian's new life working for the Bureau creates a rift between him and his father.

tvmaze2473_0010_0001_0010.name: Arm-Ageddon
tvmaze2473_0010_0001_0010.summary: When Boyle's former military buddy is accused of murder and blames it on the loss of control of his prosthetic arm, Boyle asks Brian to help determine if the artificial limb was hacked. Also, Brian's father demands he stop working for the FBI.

tvmaze2473_0011_0001_0011.name: This is Your Brian on Drugs
tvmaze2473_0011_0001_0011.summary: When Agent Casey Rooks (Desmond Harrington) and his SWAT team skim 80 NZT pills for themselves from the recovery of stolen inventory, it starts an internal investigation that is viewed through the shifting perspectives of Brian's immediate circle at the FBI,

tvmaze2473_0012_0001_0012.name: The Assassination of Eddie Morra
tvmaze2473_0012_0001_0012.summary: When an assassin makes an attempt on Senator Edward Morra's life, Brian is ordered to sabotage the FBI's investigation into it in order to prevent exposing the Senator's connection to NZT. As Brian and Morra's fates become further intertwined, Brian is faced with how far he's willing to go to protect the politician.

tvmaze2473_0013_0001_0013.name: Stop Me Before I Hug Again
tvmaze2473_0013_0001_0013.summary: Brian embarks on his first FBI field assignment when he travels to Quantico to lend his skills to the bureau unit that catches serial killers. However, the trip takes a negative turn when Brian realizes the man he's working with may have put away an innocent person in the career-making case that made him a renowned profiler. Also, Brian tries to stay one step ahead of Rebecca as she comes closer to discovering Senator Morra's connection to NZT.

tvmaze2473_0014_0001_0014.name: Fundamentals of Naked Portraiture
tvmaze2473_0014_0001_0014.summary: When a developer at the tech think tank Brian frequents is murdered, he and Rebecca interview the robotic version of the victim that she created before her death for clues to the killer's identity. Also, Brian screens agents for a position to join Mike and Ike as his third bodyguard.

tvmaze2473_0015_0001_0015.name: Undercover!
tvmaze2473_0015_0001_0015.summary: After a list with the real identities of undercover bureau operatives leaks, Brian develops a personal connection with FBI Agent Lucy Church, a tenacious rule-breaker, when he helps her finish a field case before she's exposed. Also, Sands makes a surprising move to end Rebecca's investigation into Senator Morra

tvmaze2473_0016_0001_0016.name: Sands, Agent of Morra
tvmaze2473_0016_0001_0016.summary: When Sands, Senator Morra's deadly representative, enlists Brian's help to eliminate an immediate threat he needs to keep secret from the politician, Brian learns Sands' dangerous and shocking past. Also, Brian's sister, Rachel, scrambles to cover up his abrupt side mission with Sands when the FBI can't reach him regarding a new case

tvmaze2473_0017_0001_0017.name: Close Encounters
tvmaze2473_0017_0001_0017.summary: Brian and Rebecca are placed under quarantine by the CDC after being exposed to an unknown substance after investigating a citywide blackout. Also, trust issues arise after Rebecca catches Brian using his secret stash of NZT.

tvmaze2473_0018_0001_0018.name: Bezgranichnyy
tvmaze2473_0018_0001_0018.summary: When Brian's closest relationships implode due to his inability to cut ties with Eddie Morra, he goes rogue from the FBI to free himself from the senator's control. In Russia, he searches for Piper, Morra's former associate turned adversary, and her alternative NZT vaccine. Also, Rebecca comes closer to discovering Brian's connection to NZT and Senator Morra.

tvmaze2473_0019_0001_0019.name: A Dog's Breakfast
tvmaze2473_0019_0001_0019.summary: Brian's double life unravels when Senator Morra makes contact just as Brian's placed under 24-hour surveillance by the FBI following his rogue trip to Russia. Also, Mike and Ike tell an already suspicious Rebecca about Brian's off-book interaction with Morra's henchman, Sands.

tvmaze2473_0020_0001_0020.name: Hi, My Name is Rebecca Harris
tvmaze2473_0020_0001_0020.summary: When Rebecca learns the truth about her father's death, she takes NZT for the first time and uses it to seek justice for his murder. Also, Sands makes a dangerous move against Brian to ensure the success of his new initiative.

tvmaze2473_0021_0001_0021.name: Finale: Part One!
tvmaze2473_0021_0001_0021.summary: When NZT floods the streets of New York City and threatens to become a national epidemic, the FBI partners with the DOJ in a city-wide manhunt to find the lab producing the drug. Also, Brian has trouble adjusting to his new reality when he lacks the resources to continue searching for Piper.

tvmaze2473_0022_0001_0022.name: Finale: Part Two!!
tvmaze2473_0022_0001_0022.summary: Following a stunning betrayal to their team, Brian and the FBI race to stop an NZT-enabled Sands and his associates from orchestrating an international incident. Also, Brian experiences devastating side effects when his NZT immunity starts to wear off.

show_list.name: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
show_list.summary: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. returns for an action-packed third season, with Director Phil Coulson and Agent Daisy Johnson leading the charge as S.H.I.E.L.D. searches the world for more powered people in the aftermath of their epic battle with Jiaying and her army of Inhumans. However, Coulson and the team soon find out that they are not the only group looking for these new Inhumans.

previous_episode.name: Emancipation
previous_episode.summary: After the Accords are passed, Coulson brings Talbot to the S.H.I.E.L.D. base to take inventory of their Inhumans. Meanwhile, Daisy helps Lincoln escape while Holden discovers the process to create Inhuman Primitives.

next_episode.name: Absolution
next_episode.summary: It's a showdown a season in the making as S.H.I.E.L.D. takes on Hive, and when his master plan is finally revealed, the team must spring into action. Who will live, and who will die?

last_episode.name: Ascension
last_episode.summary: It's a showdown a season in the making as S.H.I.E.L.D. takes on Hive, and when his master plan is finally revealed, the team must spring into action. Who will live, and who will die?

tvmaze31_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze31_0001_0001_0001.summary: Joss Whedon, the creative genius behind the feature film "Marvel's The Avengers," one of the highest grossing films of all time, and of the iconic television series "Buffy The Vampire Slayer," has co-created "Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.," a dynamic, action-packed one-hour drama that brings back Agent Phil Coulson to lead a team of highly skilled agents to investigate extra-normal and super human people and events worldwide.

tvmaze31_0002_0001_0002.summary: Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. agents travel to Peru to investigate an object of unknown origin, codenamed 0-8-4. But when he runs into Comandante Camilla Reyes, more than just sparks fly at 30,000 feet.

tvmaze31_0003_0001_0003.name: The Asset
tvmaze31_0003_0001_0003.summary: When the brilliant scientist Dr. Franklin Hall is kidnapped, Agent Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. agents must race against the clock to locate him. Skye is their only way in -- pushing the team to their limits when the entire plan turns upside-down.

tvmaze31_0004_0001_0004.name: Eye Spy
tvmaze31_0004_0001_0004.summary: Agent Coulson and the S.H.I.E.L.D. team try to track down a mysterious woman who has single-handedly committed numerous high-stakes heists. But when the woman's identity is revealed, a troubling secret stands to ruin Coulson.

tvmaze31_0005_0001_0005.name: Girl in the Flower Dress
tvmaze31_0005_0001_0005.summary: An elusive girl in a flower dress may hold the key to the mystery that brings Coulson and team to Asia to rescue a young man with an unusual and dangerous power. Meanwhile, Skye has a secret that jeopardizes her relationship with the team right when they need her most.

tvmaze31_0006_0001_0006.name: FZZT
tvmaze31_0006_0001_0006.summary: When floating bodies turn up, Coulson and the Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D must hunt down an elusive killer. No one is safe -- not even the team.

tvmaze31_0007_0001_0007.name: The Hub
tvmaze31_0007_0001_0007.summary: Dangerous secrets are being kept from Coulson's team and he works the system to save Ward and Fitz when they are sent on a Level 8 classified mission that may end in tragedy.

tvmaze31_0008_0001_0008.name: The Well
tvmaze31_0008_0001_0008.summary: In the aftermath of the events chronicled in the feature film THOR: THE DARK WORLD, Coulson and The Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. pick up the pieces -- one of which threatens to destroy a member of the team.

tvmaze31_0009_0001_0009.name: Repairs
tvmaze31_0009_0001_0009.summary: Coulson and his team are haunted by a mysterious force that threatens to destroy them all, and only a secret from May's past can save them.

tvmaze31_0010_0001_0010.name: The Bridge
tvmaze31_0010_0001_0010.summary: In a shocking cliffhanger episode, Coulson takes the war back to Centipede, and this time he brings in Mike Peterson for some super-soldier support. As they get closer to the truth, startling secrets are revealed and an unexpected twist threatens the team.

tvmaze31_0011_0001_0011.name: The Magical Place
tvmaze31_0011_0001_0011.summary: Coulson uncovers vital information about the mystery of his death, but, with Centipede out for blood, this knowledge may come at the cost of one of the team.

tvmaze31_0012_0001_0012.name: Seeds
tvmaze31_0012_0001_0012.summary: Coulson and May uncover startling information about Skye's past, while the team is swept into a storm at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy.

tvmaze31_0013_0001_0013.name: T.R.A.C.K.S.
tvmaze31_0013_0001_0013.summary: Hot on the trail of the Clairvoyant, Coulson and his team board a mystery train that seems to be headed for certain death.

tvmaze31_0014_0001_0014.name: T.A.H.I.T.I.
tvmaze31_0014_0001_0014.summary: Coulson goes on the attack to save Skye - enlisting the aid of Ward's former S.O. John Garrett -- and uncovers shocking truths about his own life and S.H.I.E.L.D..

tvmaze31_0015_0001_0015.name: Yes Men
tvmaze31_0015_0001_0015.summary: When Coulson and his team are attacked by Lorelei - a deadly seductress who escaped from Asgard - Thor's Lady Sif, her longtime nemesis, steps in to try to save them.

tvmaze31_0015_0002_0015S02.name: Marvel Studios: Assembling a Universe
tvmaze31_0015_0002_0015S02.summary: A look at the story behind Marvel Studios and the Marvel Cinematic Universe, featuring interviews and behind-the-scenes footage from all of the Marvel films, the Marvel One-Shots and "Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D."

tvmaze31_0016_0001_0016.name: End of the Beginning
tvmaze31_0016_0001_0016.summary: Agents Garrett and Triplett are back to help Coulson's team track down S.H.I.E.L.D.'S nefarious enemy - the Clairvoyant. But will Deathlok destroy them all to protect his master's identity?

tvmaze31_0017_0001_0017.name: Turn, Turn, Turn
tvmaze31_0017_0001_0017.summary: Coulson and his team find themselves without anyone they can trust, only to discover that they are trapped with a traitor in their midst.

tvmaze31_0018_0001_0018.name: Providence
tvmaze31_0018_0001_0018.summary: With Colonel Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team seek refuge in the last place anyone would look, where they begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'s most dangerous secrets -- secrets that could destroy them all.

tvmaze31_0019_0001_0019.name: The Only Light in the Darkness
tvmaze31_0019_0001_0019.summary: With their world turned upside down, Coulson races to save the life of his one true love as the mystery of "The Cellist," which began in Marvel's The Avengers.

tvmaze31_0020_0001_0020.name: Nothing Personal
tvmaze31_0020_0001_0020.summary: Just when there's no one left to trust, Agent Maria Hill -- from "Marvel's The Avengers" and "Marvel's Captain America: The Winter Solider" -- returns to team up with Coulson as S.H.I.E.L.D. is being destroyed around them.

tvmaze31_0021_0001_0021.name: Ragtag
tvmaze31_0021_0001_0021.summary: In the last episode before the epic season finale, Ward's betrayal and HYDRA's shocking secrets are revealed as Coulson's team goes undercover on a mission that leaves no one unscathed.

tvmaze31_0022_0001_0022.name: Beginning of the End
tvmaze31_0022_0001_0022.summary: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of HYDRA.

tvmaze31_0023_0002_0001.name: Shadows
tvmaze31_0023_0002_0001.summary: Coulson and his team are now wanted fugitives with limited resources -- but that's not stopping them from keeping the world safe from powerful and unseen threats everywhere. However, with new members they hardly know, will S.H.I.E.L.D. ever be trusted again?

tvmaze31_0024_0002_0002.name: Heavy is the Head
tvmaze31_0024_0002_0002.summary: Hunted and running out of solutions, Coulson puts his team right in the line of fire in the hopes of saving them all. But with General Talbot, Hydra and Creel all on the attack, can they possibly survive? Meanwhile, a mysterious Doctor (Kyle MacLachlan) harbors some dangerous secrets that could destroy one of our core team members.

tvmaze31_0025_0002_0003.name: Making Friends and Influencing People
tvmaze31_0025_0002_0003.summary: Coulson and his team race against Hydra to get to Donnie Gill -- a dangerous gifted with the ability to freeze objects -- while Simmons is caught in the crossfire.

tvmaze31_0026_0002_0004.name: Face My Enemy
tvmaze31_0026_0002_0004.summary: While on a mission to learn more about the secrets of the mysterious writing, Coulson finds himself attacked by the only person he can trust: Agent Melinda May. Meanwhile, the rest of the team is trapped in an explosive situation, and it's up to Fitz to save them -- but is he up to it?

tvmaze31_0027_0002_0005.name: A Hen in the Wolf House
tvmaze31_0027_0002_0005.summary: Coulson's team is up against the beautiful and deadly Bobbi Morse -- Security Chief for Hydra. Meanwhile, Skye's father forces Raina to reunite him with his daughter at any cost.

tvmaze31_0028_0002_0006.name: A Fractured House
tvmaze31_0028_0002_0006.summary: The world turns against S.H.I.E.L.D. when Hydra impersonates them to attack The United Nations, and an unexpected enemy leads the charge to bring about their downfall.

tvmaze31_0029_0002_0007.name: The Writing on the Wall
tvmaze31_0029_0002_0007.summary: The team discovers murder victims with the alien glyphs on them that Coulson's been etching. All of Coulson's secrets and lies come to a head.

tvmaze31_0030_0002_0008.name: The Things We Bury
tvmaze31_0030_0002_0008.summary: Coulson and team find themselves in an epic face-off against Hydra to uncover an ancient secret, while Ward kidnaps his brother, Senator Christian Ward, for a violent trip down memory lane.

tvmaze31_0031_0002_0009.name: Ye Who Enter Here
tvmaze31_0031_0002_0009.summary: Discovers the ancient city before Hydra, but uncovering the secrets may require one of Coulson's team to make the ultimate sacrifice. Meanwhile, May and Skye race to get to Raina before Whitehall takes her.

tvmaze31_0032_0002_0010.name: What They Become
tvmaze31_0032_0002_0010.summary: Coulson and Whitehall's forces meet in an explosive confrontation that dramatically alters everyone's fates. Meanwhile, Skye discovers shocking secrets about her past, on the Winter finale.

tvmaze31_0033_0002_0011.name: Aftershocks
tvmaze31_0033_0002_0011.summary: In the midseason premiere, "Aftershocks," Coulson's team must deal with the consequences of their war with Hydra as shocking revelations threaten to tear them apart, and Hydra makes a dangerous move that may involve a traitor in S.H.I.E.L.D.'s midst.

tvmaze31_0034_0002_0012.name: Who You Really Are
tvmaze31_0034_0002_0012.summary: Coulson and team come to the aid of a confused Lady Sif, who has lost her memory after fighting with a mysterious warrior, whose true mission will send shockwaves through S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mac continue to hide their true mission from everyone close to them.

tvmaze31_0035_0002_0013.name: One Of Us
tvmaze31_0035_0002_0013.summary: Cal seeks revenge on Coulson by assembling a team of Super Villains to destroy S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, May calls on renowned Dr. Andrew Garner, her charismatic ex-husband, with a crisis that threatens to tear the team apart.

tvmaze31_0036_0002_0014.name: Love In The Time Of Hydra
tvmaze31_0036_0002_0014.summary: Coulson and his team are still reeling from a shocking revelation that leaves the team fractured as they must decide what to do with one of their own. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mack reveal their true allegiance to Hunter, while elsewhere, Ward and Agent 33 embark on a personal mission.

tvmaze31_0037_0002_0015.name: One Door Closes
tvmaze31_0037_0002_0015.summary: War comes to Coulson's doorstep in a way he never anticipated as shocking revelations are brought to light, and Skye struggles to control her new abilities but will soon make a decision that irrevocably changes her life.

tvmaze31_0038_0002_0016.name: Afterlife
tvmaze31_0038_0002_0016.summary: As Robert Gonzales makes his move, Coulson must do whatever it takes to protect the future of S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, Skye's journey to control her powers takes a surprising turn when she meets the enigmatic Inhuman named Lincoln.

tvmaze31_0039_0002_0017.name: Melinda
tvmaze31_0039_0002_0017.summary: The story of Melinda May's transformation into "The Cavalry" is revealed as she finds herself at a crossroads in the war between Coulson and Gonzales. As Skye learns more about her true heritage from Lincoln, the truth about the Inhumans will send her in a new direction.

tvmaze31_0040_0002_0018.name: The Frenemy of My Enemy
tvmaze31_0040_0002_0018.summary: Dangerous new alliance is formed as Coulson and Hunter turn to the last person anyone would expect - Grant Ward! As the war between S.H.I.E.L.D. factions continues, Skye and Lincoln will find themselves drawn into this conflict.

tvmaze31_0041_0002_0019.name: The Dirty Half Dozen
tvmaze31_0041_0002_0019.summary: Gonzales and Coulson must find a way to put their differences aside and work together against Hydra, even if it means teaming up with someone they don't trust.

tvmaze31_0042_0002_0020.name: Scars
tvmaze31_0042_0002_0020.summary: Skye is torn between her loyalty to S.H.I.E.L.D. and her connection to the Inhumans as tensions rise between the groups -- and Coulson reveals a secret he's been hiding from even those closest to him.

tvmaze31_0043_0002_0021.name: S.O.S. (1)
tvmaze31_0043_0002_0021.summary: In Part 1 of the two-part second-season finale, sacrifices are made by Agent Coulson and his team in order to get through a war, and relationships are permanently altered as a result.

tvmaze31_0044_0002_0022.name: S.O.S. (2)
tvmaze31_0044_0002_0022.summary: Coulson and his team launch a last-ditch attack on the helicarrier to stop Jiaying from unleashing the Terrigen crystals and wiping out S.H.I.E.L.D.

tvmaze31_0045_0003_0001.name: Laws Of Nature
tvmaze31_0045_0003_0001.summary: Coulson and his team track down an outbreak of Inhumans and discover that someone is killing or capturing many of them... and it's not who they think. Meanwhile, Fitz takes desperate steps to recover Jemma, and Daisy and Mack ask Lincoln for help.

tvmaze31_0046_0003_0002.name: Purpose in the Machine
tvmaze31_0046_0003_0002.summary: The team turn to Asgardian Elliott Randolph for help deciphering the monolith and rescuring Jemma. Meanwhile, Grant abducts a key player in his quest to rebuild Hydra, while Lance begins his quest to find--and kill--Grant.

tvmaze31_0047_0003_0003.name: A Wanted (In)human
tvmaze31_0047_0003_0003.summary: The ATCU launches a public alert to bring Lincoln in, and he reluctantly turns to Daisy for help when he realizes that he's in over his head. Meanwhile, Rosalind and Coulson negotiate a deal, and Lance and Melinda take the first step to infiltrating Hydra.

tvmaze31_0048_0003_0004.name: Devils You Know
tvmaze31_0048_0003_0004.summary: S.H.I.E.L.D. and the ATCU get a lead on the mysterious Inhuman killer, Lash. Meanwhile, Lance prepares for a face-to-face meeting with Grant, and Melinda turns to Coulson and Andrew for help.

tvmaze31_0049_0003_0005.name: 4,722 Hours
tvmaze31_0049_0003_0005.summary: Jemma tells Fitz how she survived on the alien planet for six and a half months... and who helped her.

tvmaze31_0050_0003_0006.name: Among Us Hide…
tvmaze31_0050_0003_0006.summary: While Melinda recruits Bobbi to help her find Werner after his attack on Andrew, Lance joins Daisy and Mack to confirm if Rosalind's man Banks is the mysterious Lash. Meanwhiile, Fitz and Jemma continue to try and bring Will home.

tvmaze31_0051_0003_0007.name: Chaos Theory
tvmaze31_0051_0003_0007.summary: Melinda realizes who--and what--Andrew really is and confronts him. Meanwhile, Coulson has Daisy give Rosalind a tour of the Zephyr, and Lincoln reaches out to Mack for help.

tvmaze31_0052_0003_0008.name: Many Heads, One Tale
tvmaze31_0052_0003_0008.summary: Having gained Rosalind's trust, Coulson distracts her with a tour of the base while the rest of the team breaks into the ATCU headquarters to learn about the Inhumans they have captured and their attempts at a cure. Meanwhile,Grant learns the true secret of Hydra.

tvmaze31_0053_0003_0009.name: Closure
tvmaze31_0053_0003_0009.summary: After Grant strikes at Coulson through someone close to him, Coulson swears revenge and goes after the only thing that Grant cares about. Meanwhile, Mack takes command of S.H.I.E.L.D., and Jemma and Fitz are captured during a reconaissance mission.

tvmaze31_0054_0003_0010.name: Maveth
tvmaze31_0054_0003_0010.summary: Mack and his team invade the Hydra castle in the hopes of bringing Fitz and Coulson back through the portal. Meanwhile, on the alien world Grant's team find Will and Fitz convinces him to lead them to the extraction point.

tvmaze31_0055_0003_0011.name: Bouncing Back
tvmaze31_0055_0003_0011.summary: President Ellis sanctions Coulson to continue leading S.H.I.E.L.D. to deal with the Inhuman power. Meanwhile, Malick discovers that his new guest can speak, and Daisy's team encounters two new Inhumans in Bogota.

tvmaze31_0056_0003_0012.name: The Inside Man
tvmaze31_0056_0003_0012.summary: Coulson and a reluctant Talbot attend an international symposium on the Inhumans, and discover a traitor in their midst. Meanwhile, the team meets Talbot's new bodyguard, who may provide a vaccine against Terrigenesis.

tvmaze31_0057_0003_0013.name: Parting Shot
tvmaze31_0057_0003_0013.summary: A mission in Russia goes bad, and Bobbi and Lance are captured. To stop a coup and save S.H.I.E.L.D., the couple must make the ultimate sacrifice.

tvmaze31_0058_0003_0014.name: Watchdogs
tvmaze31_0058_0003_0014.summary: A group calling themselves the Watchdogs vows to take out any Inhumans that they can find. They begin their campaign of terror by taking out an ATCu facility, but the team soon learn that the Watchdogs are a front for Hydra.

tvmaze31_0059_0003_0015.name: Spacetime
tvmaze31_0059_0003_0015.summary: Daisy tries to stop a future that she foresees due to an Inhuman's power. Meanwhile, Hive gives Gideon a taste of true power, and Giyera chooses sides.

tvmaze31_0060_0003_0016.name: Paradise Lost
tvmaze31_0060_0003_0016.summary: Hive calls a meeting of Hydra's inner circle to show them his true face... and to teach Gideon a lesson in loyalty. Meanwhile, Daisy and Lincoln contact a former Afterlife resident who has information on Hive, while the others investigate Hydra's newest purchase.

tvmaze31_0061_0003_0017.name: The Team
tvmaze31_0061_0003_0017.summary: Daisy's secret warriors rescue Coulson and his people from Hydra. However, when they return to base with a captive Gideon, Coulson realizes that there may be a traitor among them.

tvmaze31_0062_0003_0018.name: The Singularity
tvmaze31_0062_0003_0018.summary: While Coulson, Melinda, and Lincoln try to recover Daisy, Fitz, Jemma, and Mack go after a scientist who may hold the key to stopping Hive.

tvmaze31_0063_0003_0019.name: Failed Experiments
tvmaze31_0063_0003_0019.summary: Coulson sends a strike team to eliminate Hive before he poses a danger to the world. Meanwhile, Mack tries to save Daisy, and Lincoln insists on taking the anti-toxin that Fitz-Simmons has created to defeat Hive's parasites.

tvmaze31_0064_0003_0020.name: Emancipation
tvmaze31_0064_0003_0020.summary: After the Accords are passed, Coulson brings Talbot to the S.H.I.E.L.D. base to take inventory of their Inhumans. Meanwhile, Daisy helps Lincoln escape while Holden discovers the process to create Inhuman Primitives.

tvmaze31_0065_0003_0021.name: Absolution
