tvmaze66_0154_0007_0019.summary: While Raj is wracked with guilt when he tries to date two women at once, Penny wrestles with whether to take a role in a cheesy movie and Sheldon is torn trying to choose between two gaming systems.

tvmaze66_0155_0007_0020.name: The Relationship Diremption
tvmaze66_0155_0007_0020.summary: Sheldon faces a personal crisis after deciding he's wasting his time with string theory. Meanwhile, a double date between Raj, Emily and the Wolowitzes ends in embarrassment for Howard.

tvmaze66_0156_0007_0021.name: The Anything Can Happen Recurrence
tvmaze66_0156_0007_0021.summary: When Sheldon tries to be spontaneous, it leads to unexpected friction between Penny, Amy and Bernadette. Meanwhile, Raj seeks Howard's help in preparing for a date with Emily.

tvmaze66_0157_0007_0022.name: The Proton Transmogrification
tvmaze66_0157_0007_0022.summary: Professor Proton helps Sheldon cope with grief, while Leonard turns a relationship milestone into a competition with Penny. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette make a "Star Wars Day" gift for the guys.

tvmaze66_0158_0007_0023.name: The Gorilla Dissolution
tvmaze66_0158_0007_0023.summary: Bad day causes Penny to reevaluate her life choices - including Leonard. Meanwhile, Howard and Bernadette struggle to care for Mrs. Wolowitz, and Raj gets relationship advice from Sheldon.

tvmaze66_0159_0007_0024.name: The Status Quo Combustion
tvmaze66_0159_0007_0024.summary: Sheldon is forced to confront an uncertain future and considers a major move. Meanwhile, Raj and Emily take it to the next level, and Mrs. Wolowitz's injury is a major headache for Howard and Bernadette.

tvmaze66_0160_0008_0001.name: The Locomotion Interruption
tvmaze66_0160_0008_0001.summary: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

tvmaze66_0161_0008_0002.name: The Junior Professor Solution
tvmaze66_0161_0008_0002.summary: Sheldon is ordered to teach a class, and the gang is surprised when Howard signs up to take it; and tensions between Penny and Bernadette afford Amy an opportunity to play one against the other.

tvmaze66_0162_0008_0003.name: The First Pitch Insufficiency
tvmaze66_0162_0008_0003.summary: Wolowitz is nervous after NASA asks him to throw out the first pitch at a Los Angeles Angels game. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny try to prove Sheldon wrong after he says that he and Amy are a "superior couple".

tvmaze66_0163_0008_0004.name: The Hook-Up Reverberation
tvmaze66_0163_0008_0004.summary: Raj's honesty about his past comes back to haunt him after his girlfriend, Emily, is cold to Penny. Also, the guys consider becoming part-owners in Stuart's comic book store.

tvmaze66_0164_0008_0005.name: The Focus Attentuation
tvmaze66_0164_0008_0005.summary: Amy and Bernadette accuse Penny of being a "buzzkill" after she gets an email from work during their Vegas weekend. Meanwhile, the guys try to invent something cool, but only come up with new ways to procrastinate.

tvmaze66_0165_0008_0006.name: The Expedition Approximation
tvmaze66_0165_0008_0006.summary: Sheldon and Raj test whether they could survive a dark-matter research expedition in a salt mine by simulating the conditions in a steam tunnel. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny seek advice from Wolowitz and Bernadette after they fight about money.

tvmaze66_0166_0008_0007.name: The Misinterpretation Agitation
tvmaze66_0166_0008_0007.summary: The guys try to help Penny out of an awkward work dilemma. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette argue over whether or not female scientists should play up their sexuality.

tvmaze66_0167_0008_0008.name: The Prom Equivalency
tvmaze66_0167_0008_0008.summary: When the gang recreates a high school prom on the roof the of the guys' apartment building, Sheldon feels pressure to participate in all the typical romantic traditions.

tvmaze66_0168_0008_0009.name: The Septum Deviation
tvmaze66_0168_0008_0009.summary: When Leonard gets minor surgery on his nose, Sheldon is the one in need of sympathy. Meanwhile, Raj's parents' impending divorce causes Howard and Bernadette to work on their own marriage.

tvmaze66_0169_0008_0010.name: The Champagne Reflection
tvmaze66_0169_0008_0010.summary: Sheldon says a tearful goodbye to "Fun with Flags." Also, Leonard, Howard and Raj look for something significant in a dead professor's research, and Bernadette is shocked to learn her co-workers' true feelings from Penny.

tvmaze66_0170_0008_0011.name: The Clean Room Infiltration
tvmaze66_0170_0008_0011.summary: On Christmas Eve, Amy plans a traditional Victorian dinner, while Raj, Leonard and Howard scramble to remove a pigeon that flew into the clean room at the university. To prove a point to Amy, a Scrooge-like Sheldon buys her the worst possible gift.

tvmaze66_0171_0008_0012.name: The Space Probe Disintegration
tvmaze66_0171_0008_0012.summary: Wolowitz tries to distract Raj, who is anxiously awaiting data from a space probe he helped launch. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Leonard go dress shopping with Penny and Amy.

tvmaze66_0172_0008_0013.name: The Anxiety Optimization
tvmaze66_0172_0008_0013.summary: The gang tries to help Sheldon when he becomes stuck in a rut at work by increasing his anxiety level. Howard teases Raj with a new game called "Cinnamon or Emily?"

tvmaze66_0173_0008_0014.name: The Troll Manifestation
tvmaze66_0173_0008_0014.summary: After Leonard and Sheldon co-publish a physics paper, they must defend themselves against criticism from an online bully. Also, girls' night finds Penny, Amy and Bernadette confronting embarrassing moments from their past.

tvmaze66_0174_0008_0015.name: The Comic Book Store Regeneration
tvmaze66_0174_0008_0015.summary: Wolowitz receives some shocking news as everyone prepares for the reopening of Stuart's comic book store. Penny teaches Sheldon how to "let it go," but can't follow her own advice after she learns something infuriating about Amy. Also, Leonard and Raj think they spot Nathan Fillion at a restaurant.

tvmaze66_0175_0008_0016.name: The Intimacy Acceleration
tvmaze66_0175_0008_0016.summary: As a joke, Sheldon and Penny try an experiment designed to make participants fall in love. Also, Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape a room with a "zombie." And, after returning from Mrs. Wolowitz' funeral, Bernadette and Howard run into trouble at the airport.

tvmaze66_0176_0008_0017.name: The Colonization Application
tvmaze66_0176_0008_0017.summary: Trouble arises when Amy learns Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonize Mars. Also, a trip to the pet store ends in a fight for Sheldon and Amy, Leonard surprises Penny with a very "adult" purchase, and, Raj is caught snooping in Emily's apartment.

tvmaze66_0177_0008_0018.name: The Leftover Thermalization
tvmaze66_0177_0008_0018.summary: Friction ensues when a magazine fails to mention Leonard in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Also, a blackout at Mrs. Wolowitz's home leads to a final family dinner in her honor.

tvmaze66_0178_0008_0019.name: The Skywalker Incursion
tvmaze66_0178_0008_0019.summary: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they take a detour to try to meet an idol. Also, when Bernadette and Howard battle over the fate of his Dr. Who TARDIS, Raj and Amy offer to settle the dispute with a game of ping pong.

tvmaze66_0179_0008_0020.name: The Fortification Implementation
tvmaze66_0179_0008_0020.summary: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to major crossroads in their relationship. Also, Wolowitz meets the half-brother he never knew he had, and when Penny is invited to appear on Wil Wheaton's podcast, she and Leonard have a huge, on-air argument.

tvmaze66_0180_0008_0021.name: The Communication Deterioration
tvmaze66_0180_0008_0021.summary: When Raj is asked to create a message in case a NASA mission discovers alien life, the guys fight over what he should do. Also, Penny is torn between auditioning for a movie or keeping her successful pharmaceutical sales job.

tvmaze66_0181_0008_0022.name: The Graduation Transmission
tvmaze66_0181_0008_0022.summary: Wolowitz questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon can't get a toy drone to fly. Meanwhile, a cancelled flight nearly prevents Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, and Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially.

tvmaze66_0182_0008_0023.name: The Maternal Combustion
tvmaze66_0182_0008_0023.summary: Personalities collide when Sheldon and Leonard's mothers finally meet. Meanwhile, Howard finally decides to "man up" and do his fair share of the housework - but not without a little help from his friends.

tvmaze66_0183_0008_0024.name: The Commitment Determination
tvmaze66_0183_0008_0024.summary: In the Season 8 finale, Leonard and Penny are pressured to set a wedding date by Sheldon, whose relationship with Amy has taken an interesting turn.

tvmaze66_0184_0009_0001.name: The Matrimonial Momentum
tvmaze66_0184_0009_0001.summary: After driving to Vegas to get married, Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another girl. Also, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy pushes pause on their relationship.

tvmaze66_0185_0009_0002.name: The Separation Oscillation
tvmaze66_0185_0009_0002.summary: Leonard confronts the woman he kissed on the North Sea in an attempt to set Penny's mind at ease. Also, Sheldon films a special episode of "Fun with Flags" after his breakup with Amy, and Bernadette feels guilty about withholding a secret from Penny.

tvmaze66_0186_0009_0003.name: The Bachelor Party Corrosion
tvmaze66_0186_0009_0003.summary: The guys surprise Leonard with a belated bachelor-party weekend in Mexico, but their plans hit a bump in the road when they get a flat tire on the way. Meanwhile, the girls lean on Penny to tell her unsuspecting family that she and Leonard eloped.

tvmaze66_0187_0009_0004.name: The 2003 Approximation
tvmaze66_0187_0009_0004.summary: Sheldon learns of an impending change in his living arrangements and decides to revert back to 2003, a simpler time before he met Leonard and Penny. Also, Howard and Raj form a band to play at the Comic Book Store.

tvmaze66_0188_0009_0005.name: The Perspiration Implementation
tvmaze66_0188_0009_0005.summary: The guys take a fencing lesson from Barry Kripke and Sheldon finds himself in an awkward position when Kripke expresses interest in Amy. Also, when Stuart struggles to get female customers at the Comic Book Store, Penny, Amy and Bernadette come by to help him out.

tvmaze66_0189_0009_0006.name: The Helium Insufficiency
tvmaze66_0189_0009_0006.summary: In the midst of a nation-wide helium shortage, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to get the supplies they need. Also, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app on Amy's phone to try and find her a new man.

tvmaze66_0190_0009_0007.name: The Spock Resonance
tvmaze66_0190_0009_0007.summary: While being interviewed for a documentary about Spock from "Star Trek", Sheldon struggles to suppress his emotions about his recent break-up with Amy. Also, Wolowitz and Bernadette butt heads over remodeling his childhood home.

tvmaze66_0191_0009_0008.name: The Mystery Date Observation
tvmaze66_0191_0009_0008.summary: When Leonard, Penny and Bernadette learn that Amy is going out on a dinner date, the trio set out to spy on her and the guy. Meanwhile, Sheldon recruits Raj and Howard to find a woman for him, since they were responsible for getting Amy and him together.

tvmaze66_0192_0009_0009.name: The Platonic Permutation
tvmaze66_0192_0009_0009.summary: Sheldon and Amy try hanging out as friends when they spend Thanksgiving together at the aquarium. Also, Wolowitz reluctantly agrees to volunteer at the soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily, and Penny discovers that Leonard knows more about her than she thought.

tvmaze66_0193_0009_0010.name: The Earworm Reverberation
tvmaze66_0193_0009_0010.summary: Over for dinner despite their previously awkward date, and Wolowitz and Koothrappali become obsessed with a fan of their band, "Footprints on the Moon,"

tvmaze66_0194_0009_0011.name: The Opening Night Excitation
tvmaze66_0194_0009_0011.summary: After more than five years of dating, Sheldon and Amy spend their first night together. Also, Leonard, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali must decide who will take their extra Star Wars movie ticket.

tvmaze66_0195_0009_0012.name: The Sales Call Sublimation
tvmaze66_0195_0009_0012.summary: Penny gets more than she bargained for when Leonard agrees to meet with a psychiatrist on her behalf. Also, Sheldon and Koothrappali collaborate on an astronomical discovery, and Wolowitz and Bernadette can't believe what they are feeling after Stuart moves out.

tvmaze66_0196_0009_0013.name: The Empathy Optimization
tvmaze66_0196_0009_0013.summary: After having to deal with a sick Sheldon, Leonard, Penny and the gang try to treat themselves to a Sheldon-free weekend.

tvmaze66_0197_0009_0014.name: The Meemaw Materialization
tvmaze66_0197_0009_0014.summary: Sheldon's thrilled when his Meemaw comes to visit, but his excitement quickly fades when she butts heads with Amy. Also, Raj meets a new girl at the comic book store who makes him question his relationship with Emily.

tvmaze66_0198_0009_0015.name: The Valentino Submergence
tvmaze66_0198_0009_0015.summary: Sheldon and Amy host a live Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older, Howard and Bernadette find a surprise in their hot tub and Raj is torn between Emily and the cute girl he met at the Comic Bookstore.

tvmaze66_0199_0009_0016.name: The Positive Negative Reaction
tvmaze66_0199_0009_0016.summary: When the gang finds out about Bernadette's pregnancy, they celebrate by singing karaoke. Also, Bernadette is concerned when Wolowitz freaks out over her pregnancy announcement, and Wolowitz is convinced he must make more money to provide for the baby.

tvmaze66_0200_0009_0017.name: The Celebration Experimentation
tvmaze66_0200_0009_0017.summary: After more than nine years together, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon's birthday, surprising him with a special guest.

tvmaze66_0201_0009_0018.name: The Application Deterioration
tvmaze66_0201_0009_0018.summary: Leonard, Sheldon, and Wolowitz run into problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Also, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Koothrappali dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup.

tvmaze66_0202_0009_0019.name: The Solder Excursion Diversion
tvmaze66_0202_0009_0019.summary: Amy is shocked at a revelation from Sheldon after she buys him a new laptop. Also, Koothrappali sells out Leonard and Wolowitz after they lie to their wives in order to attend an early screening of a movie.

tvmaze66_0203_0009_0020.name: The Big Bear Precipitation
tvmaze66_0203_0009_0020.summary: Sheldon spills a secret of Leonard's when the two take a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy. Also, when Koothrappali goes overboard with pregnancy gifts, Wolowitz and Bernadette must draw the line.

tvmaze66_0204_0009_0021.name: The Viewing Party Combustion
tvmaze66_0204_0009_0021.summary: Everyone must choose sides when a small argument between Leonard and Sheldon erupts into a heated fight during a group get-together.

tvmaze66_0205_0009_0022.name: The Fermentation Bifurcation
tvmaze66_0205_0009_0022.summary: The gang goes to a wine bar and runs into Penny's old boyfriend, Zack. Also, Bernadette gets stuck spending the evening with Sheldon when she can't go wine tasting with the group, and things don't go as planned when Koothrappali introduces his new girlfriend, Claire.

tvmaze66_0206_0009_0023.name: The Line Substitution Solution
tvmaze66_0206_0009_0023.summary: Sheldon hires Stuart to spend the day with Amy when he'd rather go to a movie screening. Also, Leonard's mother, Beverly, comes to town and Penny struggles to make a connection with her.

tvmaze66_0207_0009_0024.name: The Convergence Convergence
tvmaze66_0207_0009_0024.summary: Chaos ensues when Leonard's recently divorced parents, Alfred and Beverly, and Sheldon's devoutly religious mother, Mary, come to town. Also, Wolowitz and Koothrappali think the government is out to get them when they are contacted about their guidance system.

show_list.name: Leverage
show_list.summary: Leverage is a slick and crafty drama following a team of expert thieves that take down corrupt corporations in elaborate high-tech schemes. Insurance investigator Nate Ford (Academy Award-winner Timothy Hutton) exposed scams and recovered stolen items worth millions. But his life hit the skids when his insurance company allowed his ailing 8-year-old son to die. Years later, Nate gets even as the leader of a specialized team of thieves, computer experts and con artists that right corporate and governmental injustices against honest citizens. To expose corruption, Nate will do wrong for all the right reasons –– he will provide Leverage.

first_episode.name: The Nigerian Job
first_episode.summary: When Nathan Ford, a former insurance company investigator, is approached by a man asking him to help retrieve some stolen property, he is dubious. When he finds out that the job requires him to supervise and maintain control of three known thieves that he himself caught in the course of his insurance investigations, he's more than dubious. However, the job offers him the opportunity to get some of his own back from the insurance company that allowed his son to die, so he takes it despite his misgivings.

last_episode.name: The Long Goodbye Job
last_episode.summary: Nate takes the team on one of its most dangerous missions, a con related to the death of his son.

tvmaze662_0001_0001_0001.name: The Nigerian Job
tvmaze662_0001_0001_0001.summary: When Nathan Ford, a former insurance company investigator, is approached by a man asking him to help retrieve some stolen property, he is dubious. When he finds out that the job requires him to supervise and maintain control of three known thieves that he himself caught in the course of his insurance investigations, he's more than dubious. However, the job offers him the opportunity to get some of his own back from the insurance company that allowed his son to die, so he takes it despite his misgivings.

tvmaze662_0002_0001_0002.name: The Homecoming Job
tvmaze662_0002_0001_0002.summary: Corporal Robert Perry, an Army reservist who fought in Iraq, was severely injured in an apparent error by Castleman Security, government contractors working in Iraq. The Army investigation clears Castleman of involvement, thus freeing them of any monetary obligation, and Perry lives too far from veteran's resources to allow him to receive government funded treatment that would allow him to work. He contacts Nathan Ford for help. What Nathan Ford and the rest of the Leverage team find is far more than a simple error.

tvmaze662_0003_0001_0003.name: The Two-Horse Job
tvmaze662_0003_0001_0003.summary: After a Wall Street broker sets fire to his stable-killing his underachieving racehorses in the process-the team visits Kentucky to help the heartsick trainer, Eliot's high school love.

tvmaze662_0004_0001_0004.name: The Miracle Job
tvmaze662_0004_0001_0004.summary: The team helps an old friend of Nate's, now a priest, save his church from the hands of a shady developer.

tvmaze662_0005_0001_0005.name: The Bank Shot Job
tvmaze662_0005_0001_0005.summary: While Nate and Sophie try to con a corrupt Judge, they are taken hostage during a botched bank robbery.

tvmaze662_0006_0001_0006.name: The Stork Job
tvmaze662_0006_0001_0006.summary: A job where the team tries to recover a war orphan for a grieved couple hits close to home for Parker.

tvmaze662_0007_0001_0007.name: The Wedding Job
tvmaze662_0007_0001_0007.summary: A job for the wife of a wrongly-jailed restaurateur lands the team between the FBI and rival mob families.

tvmaze662_0008_0001_0008.name: The Mile High Job
tvmaze662_0008_0001_0008.summary: The team traces incriminating evidence about a corporation's misdeeds to two witnesses on a plane to the Cayman Islands, not knowing what the corporation has planned for the flight.

tvmaze662_0009_0001_0009.name: The Snow Job
tvmaze662_0009_0001_0009.summary: Nate complicates a simple con regarding a sleazy contractor and the recovery of a family's house.

tvmaze662_0010_0001_0010.name: The 12-Step Job
tvmaze662_0010_0001_0010.summary: When the team cons an addicted embezzler into entering rehab, Nate confronts some of his own issues regarding alcoholism.

tvmaze662_0011_0001_0011.name: The Juror #6 Job
tvmaze662_0011_0001_0011.summary: When one of Parker's aliases receives jury duty, Nate forces her to go, resulting in a showdown between the team and a corporation tampering with the jury.

tvmaze662_0012_0001_0012.name: The First David Job
tvmaze662_0012_0001_0012.summary: The team goes after the CEO of Nate's former insurance company, responsible for denying his late son's medical care, but the situation causes conflict among the crew.

tvmaze662_0013_0001_0013.name: The Second David Job
tvmaze662_0013_0001_0013.summary: In order to take down his former boss, Nate must reunite the splintered team to help him.

tvmaze662_0014_0002_0001.name: The Beantown Bailout Job
tvmaze662_0014_0002_0001.summary: Now sober, Nathan Ford reunites Sophie, Hardison, Parker, and Eliot to help him con members of an Irish mob.

tvmaze662_0015_0002_0002.name: The Tap-Out Job
tvmaze662_0015_0002_0002.summary: When a scheme against a crooked fight promoter goes awry, Eliot is forced to step into the ring.

tvmaze662_0016_0002_0003.name: The Order 23 Job
tvmaze662_0016_0002_0003.summary: To swindle a felon, the team must use a hospital and stage a virus outbreak.

tvmaze662_0017_0002_0004.name: The Fairy Godparents Job
tvmaze662_0017_0002_0004.summary: To recover funds from an incarcerated investment banker, the team tries to help his introverted stepson.

tvmaze662_0018_0002_0005.name: The Three Days of the Hunter Job
tvmaze662_0018_0002_0005.summary: The team cons a sleazy tabloid newscaster with the story of a government cover-up.

tvmaze662_0019_0002_0006.name: The Top Hat Job
tvmaze662_0019_0002_0006.summary: The team employs very unusual methods to infiltrate a corporation that has been selling tainted food to the public.

tvmaze662_0020_0002_0007.name: The Two Live Crew Job
tvmaze662_0020_0002_0007.summary: The team must recover priceless artwork from a band of thieves.

tvmaze662_0021_0002_0008.name: The Ice Man Job
tvmaze662_0021_0002_0008.summary: With Sophie gone, Parker and Hardison must assume new roles to recover a cache of stolen diamonds and help an innocent man accused of the crime.

tvmaze662_0022_0002_0009.name: The Lost Heir Job
tvmaze662_0022_0002_0009.summary: Nathan leads a con against a corrupt lawyer trying to swindle a client's estate.

tvmaze662_0023_0002_0010.name: The Runway Job
tvmaze662_0023_0002_0010.summary: To bring down an oppressive sweatshop owner, Nate and the team crash a fashion show.

tvmaze662_0024_0002_0011.name: The Bottle Job
tvmaze662_0024_0002_0011.summary: To save the bar in Nathan's building from being lost to an avaricious loan shark, the team tries an old-school con.

tvmaze662_0025_0002_0012.name: The Zanzibar Marketplace Job
tvmaze662_0025_0002_0012.summary: When Nate's ex-wife, Maggie, is thrown into a Ukranian jail for a crime she didn't commit, Nate and the team are forced to partner with an old nemesis to get her out.

tvmaze662_0026_0002_0013.name: The Future Job
tvmaze662_0026_0002_0013.summary: The team must shut down the scams of a phony psychic.

tvmaze662_0027_0002_0014.name: The Three Strikes Job
tvmaze662_0027_0002_0014.summary: The team uses a crooked politician's love of baseball to take him down but end up with more than they expect.

tvmaze662_0028_0002_0015.name: The Maltese Falcon Job
tvmaze662_0028_0002_0015.summary: The team is trying to take down a corrupt local mayor, even with the stakes rising to dangerous levels.

tvmaze662_0029_0003_0001.name: The Jailhouse Job
tvmaze662_0029_0003_0001.summary: As the team works to free Nate from jail, he must take on a corrupt warden and free an innocent man.

tvmaze662_0030_0003_0002.name: The Reunion Job
tvmaze662_0030_0003_0002.summary: To uncover a password, the team infiltrates the high school reunion of an amoral software magnate who's the IT department for the Axis of Evil.

tvmaze662_0031_0003_0003.name: The Inside Job
tvmaze662_0031_0003_0003.summary: When Parker is trapped in an unknown location while working a theft for her mentor, the LEVERAGE team must race the clock to find her and free her.

tvmaze662_0032_0003_0004.name: The Scheherazade Job
tvmaze662_0032_0003_0004.summary: When Parker is trapped in an unknown location while working a theft for her mentor, the LEVERAGE team must race the clock to find her and free her.

tvmaze662_0033_0003_0005.name: The Double-Blind Job
tvmaze662_0033_0003_0005.summary: Nate and the team runs a con against a corrupt CEO of a pharmaceuticals company who is marketing a product which could kill thousands.

tvmaze662_0034_0003_0006.name: The Studio Job
tvmaze662_0034_0003_0006.summary: When Eliot poses as a country music singer to help run a con against a corrupt recording studio executive, things get complicated when he becomes a bona fide star.

tvmaze662_0035_0003_0007.name: The Gone Fishin' Job
tvmaze662_0035_0003_0007.summary: The team takes on a debt collector scamming innocent taxpayers, not knowing he is backed by a private militia.

tvmaze662_0036_0003_0008.name: The Boost Job
tvmaze662_0036_0003_0008.summary: Nate and the team infiltrate a crew of top-flight car thieves to bring down a greedy car dealer.

tvmaze662_0037_0003_0009.name: The Three-Card Monte Job
tvmaze662_0037_0003_0009.summary: An old enemy complicates matters for Nate and his crew as they try to help several small-time business people who were conned into committing crimes.

tvmaze662_0038_0003_0010.name: The Underground Job
tvmaze662_0038_0003_0010.summary: Nate and the team investigate a fatal explosion in a coal mine and uncover far more than the negligent practices they suspected.

tvmaze662_0039_0003_0011.name: The Rashomon Job
tvmaze662_0039_0003_0011.summary: Each member of the team recalls the story of an artifact all of them tried to steal on the same night five years ago.

tvmaze662_0040_0003_0012.name: The King George Job
tvmaze662_0040_0003_0012.summary: Pieces of Sophie's past complicate a job in London where the team tries to expose an unscrupulous antiques trafficker who is using children as slave labor.

tvmaze662_0041_0003_0013.name: The Morning After Job
tvmaze662_0041_0003_0013.summary: A con against a dirty financier could be the key to the team finding Damien Moreau.

tvmaze662_0042_0003_0014.name: The Ho, Ho, Ho Job
tvmaze662_0042_0003_0014.summary: The team runs into trouble while recovering Christmas gifts for a charity when an old enemy returns.

tvmaze662_0043_0003_0015.name: The Big Bang Job
tvmaze662_0043_0003_0015.summary: The team infiltrates a Department of Defense research lab in order to stop Damien Moreau, the villain they have been working to catch all season, from murdering a brilliant engineer and auctioning her work off to international terrorists.

tvmaze662_0044_0003_0016.name: The San Lorenzo Job
tvmaze662_0044_0003_0016.summary: The team follows Moreau to San Lorenzo only to find that Moreau is the chief advisor to the current President. In order to take Moreau down, the team must first take over the country.

tvmaze662_0045_0004_0001.name: The Long Way Down Job
tvmaze662_0045_0004_0001.summary: The team must battle a treacherous mountain, dangerous conditions, and hired mercenaries to retrieve evidence to bring down a corrupt financial executive.

tvmaze662_0046_0004_0002.name: The 10 Li'l Grifters Job
tvmaze662_0046_0004_0002.summary: When a mark is killed in the middle of a con and Nate is accused of the crime, the crew must find the real killer to prove Nate's innocence.

tvmaze662_0047_0004_0003.name: The 15 Minutes Job
tvmaze662_0047_0004_0003.summary: The team uses a PR executive's own notoriety against him to bring him down.

tvmaze662_0048_0004_0004.name: The Van Gogh Job
tvmaze662_0048_0004_0004.summary: Nate and the crew discover the history behind a Van Gogh painting from World War II they are attempting to recover.

tvmaze662_0049_0004_0005.name: The Hot Potato Job
tvmaze662_0049_0004_0005.summary: The Leverage team tries to recover a rare agricultural object worth millions of dollars.

tvmaze662_0050_0004_0006.name: The Carnival Job
tvmaze662_0050_0004_0006.summary: An innovative computer chip the team steals from an executive's home becomes the ransom when the executive's daughter is kidnapped.

tvmaze662_0051_0004_0007.name: The Grave Danger Job
tvmaze662_0051_0004_0007.summary: The team goes after a funeral home director who is scamming bereaved families out of their money but quickly discover the scam involves a Mexican drug cartel.

tvmaze662_0052_0004_0008.name: The Boiler Room Job
tvmaze662_0052_0004_0008.summary: Nate and the team take on one of their toughest assignments: a con man from a family with a long history of pulling off successful scams.

tvmaze662_0053_0004_0009.name: The Cross My Heart Job
tvmaze662_0053_0004_0009.summary: While stuck at an airport, the team must retrieve a heart donated to a fifteen-year-old patient when it is intercepted by a sick defense contractor.

tvmaze662_0054_0004_0010.name: The Queen's Gambit Job
tvmaze662_0054_0004_0010.summary: Sterling asks Nate to steal a nuclear reactor component which someone intends to use to produce uranium which will then be sold to terrorists. Nate thinks Sterling is holding something back but he decides to do it. They figure out that the man selling it will hand it off while his step-daughter is competing in a chess tournament in Dubai. They try to proceed as planned but Sterling shows complicating things.

tvmaze662_0055_0004_0011.name: The Experimental Job
tvmaze662_0055_0004_0011.summary: When the team investigates the disappearance of homeless vets around Boston, they stumble across a sinister plot.

tvmaze662_0056_0004_0012.name: The Office Job
tvmaze662_0056_0004_0012.summary: While Nate and the team try to uncover an embezzler by infiltrating an office, they get roped into participating in a documentary of the company.

tvmaze662_0057_0004_0013.name: The Girls' Night Out Job
tvmaze662_0057_0004_0013.summary: While Nate and the team try to uncover an embezzler by infiltrating an office, they get roped into participating in a documentary of the company.

tvmaze662_0058_0004_0014.name: The Boys' Night Out Job
tvmaze662_0058_0004_0014.summary: A con to take down a cunning thief who is part of a larger conspiracy is told from the point-of-view of Nate, Eliot, and Hardison.

tvmaze662_0059_0004_0015.name: The Lonely Hearts Job
tvmaze662_0059_0004_0015.summary: While searching for a philanthropist's missing wife, the team comes up against a grifter ring running a web of sophisticated "Sweetheart Scams". Now, Nate must learn how to steal hearts... or risk losing Sophie's for good.

tvmaze662_0060_0004_0016.name: The Gold Job
tvmaze662_0060_0004_0016.summary: The Leverage team hits the recession-driven Cash-for-Gold industry by targeting a corrupt brother-sister team and steering them through an elaborate treasure hunt.

tvmaze662_0061_0004_0017.name: The Radio Job
tvmaze662_0061_0004_0017.summary: When Latimer hires Nate's father to pull off a heist in an ultra-secure government office, the Leverage team must stage a fake hostage stand-off when they're trapped inside and the feds lay siege to the building.

tvmaze662_0062_0004_0018.name: The Last Dam Job
tvmaze662_0062_0004_0018.summary: The Leverage team must recruit old friends and rivals in order to take down Latimer and a foe from their past.

tvmaze662_0063_0005_0001.name: The (Very) Big Bird Job
tvmaze662_0063_0005_0001.summary: Nate and the team go after the CEO of a shipping company whose cost-cutting measures were the cause of a tragic plane crash.

tvmaze662_0064_0005_0002.name: The Blue Line Job
tvmaze662_0064_0005_0002.summary: The Leverage crew helps a veteran hockey player who thinks team management is trying to get him injured on purpose but discover their real intentions are far more ominous.

tvmaze662_0065_0005_0003.name: The First Contact Job
tvmaze662_0065_0005_0003.summary: To take down a wealthy scientist who stole a colleague's work, Nate and the crew convinces him he's made contact with aliens.

tvmaze662_0066_0005_0004.name: The French Connection Job
tvmaze662_0066_0005_0004.summary: Eliot goes undercover at a culinary arts school to take down an avaricious restaurateur.

tvmaze662_0067_0005_0005.name: The Gimme a K Street Job
tvmaze662_0067_0005_0005.summary: To help students whose cheerleading school is putting them in danger, the team takes on its most corrupt adversary: Congress.

tvmaze662_0068_0005_0006.name: The D.B. Cooper Job
tvmaze662_0068_0005_0006.summary: A flashback to the 1970s of an FBI agent's final regret, his failure to capture hijacker D.B. Cooper, becomes a mystery Nate must solve.

tvmaze662_0069_0005_0007.name: The Real Fake Car Job
tvmaze662_0069_0005_0007.summary: Nate and the crew concoct a story about a vintage car to get a corrupt Wall Street businessman to break his immunity agreement with the government.

tvmaze662_0070_0005_0008.name: The Broken Wing Job
tvmaze662_0070_0005_0008.summary: When a torn ACL leaves Parker behind on the crew's latest job, she spies on the Brew Pub's customers for fun and discovers a group of thieves planning a heist.

tvmaze662_0071_0005_0009.name: The Rundown Job
tvmaze662_0071_0005_0009.summary: Eliot and the team assist his old partner, counter-terrorism specialist Colonel Michael Vance, in stopping a biological weapon from being released in Washington, D.C.

tvmaze662_0072_0005_0010.name: The Frame-Up Job
tvmaze662_0072_0005_0010.summary: Nate must clear Sophie's name when she is framed for the theft of a priceless work of art.

tvmaze662_0073_0005_0011.name: The Low Low Price Job
tvmaze662_0073_0005_0011.summary: The crew takes on a big-box retail chain who is bribing the city to run local mom-and-pop stores out of business.

tvmaze662_0074_0005_0012.name: The White Rabbit Job
tvmaze662_0074_0005_0012.summary: The team attempts one of the most difficult cons ever devised to stop a businessman from bankrupting his business and the town that depends on it.

tvmaze662_0075_0005_0013.name: The Corkscrew Job
tvmaze662_0075_0005_0013.summary: Nate and the crew take on the greedy owner of a winery.

tvmaze662_0076_0005_0014.name: The Toy Job
tvmaze662_0076_0005_0014.summary: The team goes after a CEO who is selling dangerous toys to the public.

tvmaze662_0077_0005_0015.name: The Long Goodbye Job
tvmaze662_0077_0005_0015.summary: Nate takes the team on one of its most dangerous missions, a con related to the death of his son.

show_list.name: Burn Notice
show_list.summary: My name is Michael Westen. I used to be a spy. Until I got a burn notice, I was blacklisted. When you're burned, you've got nothing: no cash, no credit, no job history. You're stuck in whatever city they decide to dump you in. Miami. You do whatever work comes your way. You rely on anyone who's still talking to you. A trigger-happy ex-girlfriend... An old friend who used to inform on you to the FBI... Family too... if you're desperate... Bottom line? Until you figure out who burned you... you're not going anywhere.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Michael Westen, a spy, is "burned" while on assignment in Nigeria. Dumped in his hometown of Miami, with no money or resources to his name, Michael agrees to help a man accused of stealing valuables from his employer's home.

tvmaze667_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze667_0001_0001_0001.summary: Michael Westen, a spy, is "burned" while on assignment in Nigeria. Dumped in his hometown of Miami, with no money or resources to his name, Michael agrees to help a man accused of stealing valuables from his employer's home.

tvmaze667_0002_0001_0002.name: Identity
tvmaze667_0002_0001_0002.summary: Laura, one of Madeline's friends, was scammed and beaten up by a con artist. Michael agrees to help Laura at Madeline's insistence in exchange for information on two men that were asking about him.

tvmaze667_0003_0001_0003.name: Fight or Flight
tvmaze667_0003_0001_0003.summary: Oleg, Michael's landlord, asks him to help Cara, a waitress in one of his clubs, after she stops showing up for work. It turns out that Cara, a single mother, is being threatened after she witnessed a drug dealer brutally beat up a man. Michael then attempts to have Cara and her teenager daughter Sophie to move to Buffalo, New York. Thoough Cara agrees to the moving, Sophie refuses to leave town, as she feels unhappy of leaving everything behind that she knows, including a school prom that she wants to attend.

tvmaze667_0004_0001_0004.name: Old Friends
tvmaze667_0004_0001_0004.summary: Michael's friend Bill asks for the spy's help in freeing his daughter from a prostitution ring. Meanwhile, Michael dodges multiple assassination attempts.

tvmaze667_0005_0001_0005.name: Family Business
tvmaze667_0005_0001_0005.summary: Michael infiltrates a family of gunrunners who are pressuring an airport supervisor and his pregnant wife. Also, the FBI begins to put pressure on Sam to gather more information on Michael.

tvmaze667_0006_0001_0006.name: Unpaid Debts
tvmaze667_0006_0001_0006.summary: Michael discovers a surprise aboard a boat he has retrieved from Jamaican gangsters. Meanwhile, a CSS (Central Security Service) agent urges Michael to stop his investigation into who burned him.

tvmaze667_0007_0001_0007.name: Broken Rules
tvmaze667_0007_0001_0007.summary: Michael poses as a thief to infiltrate a crime gang who are terrorizing a local store owner.

tvmaze667_0008_0001_0008.name: Wanted Man
tvmaze667_0008_0001_0008.summary: With Michael's assistance, Fiona helps a man who has been framed for the theft of an expensive broach.

tvmaze667_0009_0001_0009.name: Hard Bargain
tvmaze667_0009_0001_0009.summary: A house-sitter's fiancée is kidnapped and held for ransom. Nick, the house-sitter, hires Michael to rescue her, since the kidnappers mistakenly believe Nick can afford to pay a $5 million ransom.

tvmaze667_0010_0001_0010.name: False Flag
tvmaze667_0010_0001_0010.summary: Michael is hired to track down a woman's estranged husband, who has disappeared with their son. Michael soon finds himself pitted against somebody just as skilled and dangerous as he is.

tvmaze667_0011_0001_0011.name: Dead Drop (1)
tvmaze667_0011_0001_0011.summary:
Sam works a case for a woman named Gillian, who's being blackmailed into using her security clearance to help smuggle heroin into the U.S.

Meanwhile, Michael attempts to arrange a meeting with the man who he believes burned him, Philip Cowan.

tvmaze667_0012_0001_0012.name: Loose Ends (2)
tvmaze667_0012_0001_0012.summary: Michael and Fiona work to rescue Sam from heroin smugglers, after Kent and Melissa's deal goes sour. Meanwhile, Michael attempts to evade the government agents who assassinated Philip Cowan.

tvmaze667_0013_0002_0001.name: Breaking and Entering
tvmaze667_0013_0002_0001.summary: Having been recruited by the people who burned him, Michael's new handler Carla tasks him with helping a computer tech, Jimmy, whose wife and daughter were kidnapped, liberate some information that is guarded by bowelless mercenaries.

tvmaze667_0014_0002_0002.name: Turn and Burn
tvmaze667_0014_0002_0002.summary: At Sam's request, Michael helps a waitress named Sophia who is being stalked by a cartel soldier.

tvmaze667_0015_0002_0003.name: Trust Me
tvmaze667_0015_0002_0003.summary: Andy, a cell-phone salesman, was conned into investing in a fake Cuban nightclub. Michael helps Andy when the loan sharks he borrowed from come knocking.

tvmaze667_0016_0002_0004.name: Comrades
tvmaze667_0016_0002_0004.summary: Introduced by Nate, Michael helps a Russian woman named Katya whose sister was smuggled into the U.S. by gangsters. However, Katya cannot afford their extortionate demands, and her sister is being held captive.

tvmaze667_0017_0002_0005.name: Scatter Point
tvmaze667_0017_0002_0005.summary: Michael is asked for help by Trevor, a former "wheelman" who's gone straight. However, Trevor is being pressured into working an upcoming jewel heist by his old boss Timo and fears for his family's safety.

tvmaze667_0018_0002_0006.name: Bad Blood
tvmaze667_0018_0002_0006.summary: As Michael helps an old friend who's suspected of embezzling from a hip-hop mogul, Michael finds himself meeting one of Carla's men, Victor who recruits Michael to participate in a heist.

tvmaze667_0019_0002_0007.name: Rough Seas
tvmaze667_0019_0002_0007.summary: Michael is hired to track down nearly a million dollars worth of pharmaceuticals that were stolen by thieves on their way to Tanzania.

tvmaze667_0020_0002_0008.name: Double Booked
tvmaze667_0020_0002_0008.summary: An associate from Michael's past hires him to assassinate a woman named Jeannie, who is about to become a very rich widow. As Michael investigates, the situation grows more complicated.

tvmaze667_0021_0002_0009.name: Good Soldier (1)
tvmaze667_0021_0002_0009.summary: Hired by Fiona's boyfriend's friend Henry, Michael poses as a disgruntled bodyguard to thwart a kidnapping plot masterminded by a ruthless man named Lesher.

tvmaze667_0022_0002_0010.name: Do No Harm (2)
tvmaze667_0022_0002_0010.summary:
Michael prevents a man from committing suicide, whose son suffers from a heart condition. He had lost his savings in a scam after investing in a "miracle drug" for his son, so Michael decides to get him his money back.

Meanwhile, he has to deal with an explosion at his place and his brother in jail.

tvmaze667_0023_0002_0011.name: Hot Spot
tvmaze667_0023_0002_0011.summary:
In order to get free football tickets, Sam asks Michael to join him in helping Coach Sean Martin, as one of his players is threatened by a gangster.

Meanwhile, Michael works on finding out who tried to kill him.

tvmaze667_0024_0002_0012.name: Seek and Destroy
tvmaze667_0024_0002_0012.summary:
Michael, under the alias of Miles Parker, is hired by Scott Chandler to investigate strange activity - log-ins at odd hours, unusual computer activity and telephone bugging - at an art gallery. But after being attacked by the gallery's receptionist, Michael finds himself working against Chandler.

Meanwhile, Michael needs to find the person who planted the bomb at his loft, therefor he turns to arms dealer Seymour for help.

tvmaze667_0025_0002_0013.name: Bad Breaks
tvmaze667_0025_0002_0013.summary: Michael finds himself trapped inside a private bank with Jason Bly during an armed robbery. Meanwhile, Michael's predicament disrupts Sam's love life.

tvmaze667_0026_0002_0014.name: Truth & Reconciliation
tvmaze667_0026_0002_0014.summary: Facing pressure from Sam and Fiona, Michael agrees to help bring a Haitian murderer to justice.

tvmaze667_0027_0002_0015.name: Sins of Omission
tvmaze667_0027_0002_0015.summary:
Michael's ex-fiancée seeks his help in freeing her son, who was kidnapped by a black market dealer named Brennen.

Meanwhile, Michael has to get to Victor, the guy who tried to kill him.

tvmaze667_0028_0002_0016.name: Lesser Evil
tvmaze667_0028_0002_0016.summary: As Michael interrogates Victor, Michael discovers the truth behind Victor's tragic past. When the truth about Carla and the organization is finally revealed, everyone is put in danger.

tvmaze667_0062_0005_0018S01.name: Burn Notice: The Fall of Sam Axe

show_list.name: Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
show_list.summary: When the planet is threatened by Super Villains, time-traveling conquerors, alien invaders, mythical monsters or mad robots bent on the total destruction of humanity; when the forces of evil are so overwhelming that no single hero has the power to save the world; when there is no hope left, the AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!

tvmaze671_0003_0001_0003.name: The Man in the Ant Hill

tvmaze671_0027_0002_0001.name: The Private War of Doctor Doom

tvmaze671_0034_0002_0008.name: The Ballad of Beta Ray Bill

show_list.name: The Blacklist
show_list.summary: The Blacklist is a crime drama involving a former government agent who turned into a high-profile criminal turning himself in to the FBI offering to help catch criminals.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Ex-government agent and one of the FBI's Most Wanted fugitives, Raymond "Red" Reddington mysteriously turns himself in to the FBI and offers to give up everyone he has ever worked with including a long-thought-dead terrorist but under one condition - he'll only talk to newly-minted female FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen with whom he seemingly has no connection. For Liz, it's going to be one hell of a first day on the job and what follows is a twisting series of events as the race to stop a terrorist begins.

previous_episode.name: Alexander Kirk
previous_episode.summary: The FBI task force's hunt for revenge nears its endgame. As Reddington and the team close in on the mysterious arch-criminal responsible for recent tragic events, they're forced to operate outside their comfort zone -- and outside the law -- in order to take down their enemy once and for all.

next_episode.name: Alexander Kirk: Conclusion
next_episode.summary: As Reddington and the task force close in on the person responsible for Liz's death, a shocking betrayal leaves them racing to save one of their own.

last_episode.name: Alexander Kirk: Conclusion
last_episode.summary: As Reddington and the task force close in on the person responsible for Liz's death, a shocking betrayal leaves them racing to save one of their own.

tvmaze69_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze69_0001_0001_0001.summary: Ex-government agent and one of the FBI's Most Wanted fugitives, Raymond "Red" Reddington mysteriously turns himself in to the FBI and offers to give up everyone he has ever worked with including a long-thought-dead terrorist but under one condition - he'll only talk to newly-minted female FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen with whom he seemingly has no connection. For Liz, it's going to be one hell of a first day on the job and what follows is a twisting series of events as the race to stop a terrorist begins.

tvmaze69_0002_0001_0002.name: The Freelancer
tvmaze69_0002_0001_0002.summary: Red predicts an impending catastrophe, rooted by the work of an assassin, called "The Freelancer." Together, Liz and Red go undercover to prevent from having his next target, Floriana Campo from being killed. Elsewhere, Ressler and newly re-hired CIA agent, Meera Malik, who's been added to Red's private security detail, keep an eye on them from a distance. Meanwhile, Liz considers what she should do next concerning Tom and the mysterious box she found hidden under the floorboards.

tvmaze69_0003_0001_0003.name: Wujing
tvmaze69_0003_0001_0003.summary: The FBI is on the hunt for a high-ranking Chinese spy, Wujing which Red claims has hired him to help decode a classified CIA transmission. Liz, posing as an FBI cryptographer goes with Red to decode the message while protecting US government secrets. Meanwhile, Liz proactively investigates Tom.

tvmaze69_0004_0001_0004.name: The Stewmaker
tvmaze69_0004_0001_0004.summary: While continuing her investigation into the truth about Tom, Liz testifies against drug lord, Hector Lorca. Later another witness is abducted when he is forced to testify against the dangerous drug trafficker. Red's interest is peaked and he informs the team that the witness may have been taken by "The Stewmaker" a man responsible for hundreds of missing and presumed dead people. Meanwhile, in an unlikely twist of events, Red and Ressler must work together for the first time.

tvmaze69_0005_0001_0005.name: The Courier
tvmaze69_0005_0001_0005.summary: Red finds out that The Courier - a middle man that no one crosses - is delivering a package worth millions of dollars to an Iranian spy. Only the Courier is a ghost no one including Red, knows what he looks like. While racing to stop the mysterious criminal transaction, Liz , inadvertently finds herself thrust into a dangerous kidnapping plot. Meanwhile, Ressler must finally accept that Liz is a valuable asset to the team.

tvmaze69_0006_0001_0006.name: Gina Zanetakos
tvmaze69_0006_0001_0006.summary: After Tom confronts Liz about the box - he claims he's innocent and insists that they turn it into the FBI so his name can be cleared. Elsewhere, Red informs Liz and the FBI that the next name on the Blacklist is beautiful and deadly corporate terrorist, Gina Zanetakos.

tvmaze69_0007_0001_0007.name: Frederick Barnes
tvmaze69_0007_0001_0007.summary: After a chemical attack on a subway, Liz and the FBI search for the man responsible. Liz reluctantly calls on Red for his help after she finds her search for the next person on the blacklist, brilliant scientist Frederick Barnes, heading to a dead end. Meanwhile, Liz wants nothing to do with Red after he implicated Tom.

tvmaze69_0008_0001_0008.name: General Ludd
tvmaze69_0008_0001_0008.summary: Liz uncovers an elaborate plot to destroy the country's financial system when a new name on the Blacklist is revealed by Red. Meanwhile Tom supports Liz when a family member falls ill.

tvmaze69_0009_0001_0009.name: Anslo Garrick (1)
tvmaze69_0009_0001_0009.summary: Donald attempts to protect Red from a possible assassination attempt but is misled. The newest member on the blacklist, Anslo Garrick, infiltrates the FBI black site and tries to capture Red. Meanwhile Liz gets caught in an elevator and tries to figure out what is going on.

tvmaze69_0010_0001_0010.name: Anslo Garrick (2)
tvmaze69_0010_0001_0010.summary: Liz infiltrates the blacksite and disarms the signal jammers to call in backup but runs into trouble along the way. The fate of Ressler hangs in the balance as Red tries to bargain with Anslo Garrick. Meanwhile, Tom becomes increasingly worried about Liz' situation and the fate of Red is unknown.

tvmaze69_0011_0001_0011.name: The Good Samaritan Killer
tvmaze69_0011_0001_0011.summary: The entire FBI team is under investigation as internal affairs tries to find the mole. Elsewhere, Red is missing and conducts his own investigation into who betrayed him. Meanwhile, a serial killer from Liz's past, "The Good Samaritan" strikes again. Liz is allowed to join the hunt for the killer as Cooper knows Red will likely reach out to help knowing how much this unsolved case means to Liz.

tvmaze69_0012_0001_0012.name: The Alchemist
tvmaze69_0012_0001_0012.summary: The team goes undercover to pursue the Alchemist, who uses science to transform DNA and who's been assigned to protect a mob informant. Elsewhere, Liz targets an unlikely couple; Tom and Liz's relationship is tested; and Ressler faces a big decision.

tvmaze69_0013_0001_0013.name: The Cyprus Agency
tvmaze69_0013_0001_0013.summary: After a recent spate of abductions of babies from their mothers, Red informs Liz that the "Cyprus Agency" is the illegal adoption organization responsible. Coincidentally, Liz and Tom contemplate adoption of their own which fuels Liz to track down the organizations CEO, Owen Mallory.

tvmaze69_0014_0001_0014.name: Madeline Pratt
tvmaze69_0014_0001_0014.summary: Liz helps Tom come to terms about their impending adoption while Red reveals that a woman from his past, Madeline Pratt is the next target on the Blacklist. Elsewhere, at an elaborate party at the Syrian Embassy, Red convinces Liz to pull off a covert heist.

tvmaze69_0015_0001_0015.name: The Judge
tvmaze69_0015_0001_0015.summary: When a prominent Prosecutor is found after being missing for 12 years Red believes that this is the work of Ruth Kipling also known as "The Judge." Only a myth, the Judge runs an underground criminal appeals process in which those who have wrongly imprisoned and punished others are judged and punished themselves. Meanwhile, Red investigates the woman who tempts Tom while in Orlando at a teacher's conference.

tvmaze69_0016_0001_0016.name: Mako Tanida
tvmaze69_0016_0001_0016.summary: The next target on the Blacklist is one of Red's past associates, crime lord Mako Tanida. After Tanida escapes from prison he is out for revenge. Elsewhere, Tom confronts Jolene after interfering with his mission.

tvmaze69_0017_0001_0017.name: Ivan
tvmaze69_0017_0001_0017.summary: When a new cyber defense asset gets stolen all roads lead to a Russian cyber terrorist known only as "Ivan". With Red's assistance, Liz discovers a huge cover-up. Meanwhile, new evidence surrounding the disappearance of Jolene helps unravel some of the mystery behind Tom.

tvmaze69_0018_0001_0018.name: Milton Bobbit
tvmaze69_0018_0001_0018.summary: Red and the team are on the hunt for "The Undertaker" - a life insurance claim adjuster who convinces ordinary people to become contract killers. Meanwhile, Liz works with Red to uncover Tom's secrets.

tvmaze69_0019_0001_0019.name: The Pavlovich Brothers
tvmaze69_0019_0001_0019.summary: The Pavlovich brothers specialize in abductions of high value targets and according to Red, they are planning their next hit. While the team tries to protect the next target, Red has a job of his own for the Pavlovich Brothers. Elsewhere, Liz patiently tries to uncover the truth about Tom.

tvmaze69_0020_0001_0020.name: The Kingmaker
tvmaze69_0020_0001_0020.summary: After a Politician in Prague is framed for a murder, Red suspects it's the work of The Kingmaker - a strategist behind the rise of some of the world's most powerful politicians. While Red helps Liz and the FBI catch him, Liz uncovers a secret that Red's been keeping from her.

tvmaze69_0021_0001_0021.name: Berlin
tvmaze69_0021_0001_0021.summary: Liz refuses to work with Red after discovering the truth about the death of her father. Seeking to make amends and force Liz to see him, Red brings the FBI a case they can't ignore. Meanwhile, Liz reveals what she knows about Tom's secret life to the FBI.

tvmaze69_0022_0001_0022.name: Berlin: Conclusion
tvmaze69_0022_0001_0022.summary: With the crashing of the mysterious prisoner transport plane, the city is on lock down as the authorities are on the hunt for all the escapees. Meanwhile, with Red in custody, Liz uses her power to get him out since he is their best chance at finding all the suspects. Elsewhere, their main objective is to track down Berlin, a prisoner on the plane who is somehow involved.

tvmaze69_0023_0002_0001.name: Lord Baltimore
tvmaze69_0023_0002_0001.summary: Red continues to battle Berlin and faces a new threat from a man named Lord Baltimore. An important person comes back from the past into Red's world. Meanwhile, Liz  tries to move forward with her life after her showdown with Tom.

tvmaze69_0024_0002_0002.name: Monarch Douglas Bank
tvmaze69_0024_0002_0002.summary: When the Monarch Douglas Bank is robbed, Red seizes the opportunity to try and take the money -laundering bank down. Liz questions Red's intentions as she investigates the crime. Meanwhile, a new member joins Cooper's taskforce after impressing everyone on the team.

tvmaze69_0025_0002_0003.name: Dr. James Covington
tvmaze69_0025_0002_0003.summary: When a man is found with his heart cut out, Agents Keen and Ressler team up with agent Samar Navabi to uncover the intricacies of Dr. Covington's black-market operation. Meanwhile, Red and his associate try to capitalize on a new opportunity in Indonesia, leaving Reddington in a vulnerable position.

tvmaze69_0026_0002_0004.name: Dr. Linus Creel
tvmaze69_0026_0002_0004.summary: After a series of seemingly nonviolent citizens become killers, Red tips off Liz  that a dangerous social-psychological experiment may be underway. Elsewhere, Red tries to convince, Naomi and her husband into accepting a complicated proposition.

tvmaze69_0027_0002_0005.name: The Front
tvmaze69_0027_0002_0005.summary: Agents Keen Ressler,, and Cooper pursue an eco-terrorist cell in search of a destructive weapon. Meanwhile, Liz tries to lose her guardian. Elsewhere, Red uses manipulation to pursue someone close to his heart. Amir Arison and Mozhan Marno also star.

tvmaze69_0028_0002_0006.name: The Mombasa Cartel
tvmaze69_0028_0002_0006.summary: When a mutilated corpse washes ashore, Agent Liz Keen consults Red over what he knows about the deadly underworld of wildlife poachers. Meanwhile Agent Donald Ressler develops a dangerous habit.

tvmaze69_0029_0002_0007.name: The Scimitar
tvmaze69_0029_0002_0007.summary: When an Iranian nuclear scientist is suspiciously assassinated, a revenge ploy begins against a valued American. Red informs agents Keen and Navabi that a dangerously conniving hitman "The Scimitar" has been sent to the job. Liz and Ressler find themselves in a tricky predicament as they investigate a surveillance lead. Agent Keen attempts to gather information on Berlin, while Red finds company with a woman working at a food truck.

tvmaze69_0030_0002_0008.name: The Decembrist
tvmaze69_0030_0002_0008.summary: Red's motives for Berlin take a sudden turn when he learns Berlin was manipulated by the latest Blacklister to avenge Red. Red and Berlin travel to Moscow to track down a high ranking Russian official who they believe is responsible. Meanwhile, Liz struggles to keep her secret from unraveling.

tvmaze69_0031_0002_0009.name: Luther Braxton
tvmaze69_0031_0002_0009.summary: When the elusive Reddington is arrested and taken to a secret detention facility Liz and the task force set out to save Red before he disappears forever. Meanwhile, Red encounters Luther Braxton at the detention facility, a thief that he shares a complicated history with.

tvmaze69_0032_0002_0010.name: Luther Braxton: Conclusion
tvmaze69_0032_0002_0010.summary: As chaos ensues at the Factory leaving the fate of Red and the task force unknown, FBI boss Cooper struggles to rescue his team from the detention facility. Meanwhile, it's a race against time to stop Luther Braxton from attaining confidential information.

tvmaze69_0033_0002_0011.name: Ruslan Denisov
tvmaze69_0033_0002_0011.summary: When an undercover CIA agent is kidnapped by a band of separatists in Uzbekistan, the task force sets a rescue mission in motion. Red informs Agents Keen and Ressler that they are up against "Ruslan Denisov," a very dangerous past associate.

tvmaze69_0034_0002_0012.name: The Kenyon Family
tvmaze69_0034_0002_0012.summary: When Red tips Liz off on the disappearance of Justin Kenyon, a polygamous cult leader with dangerous shipping containers buried on his property, the task force sets out to investigate. Meanwhile Red utilizes his sources to appease Fitch's last words and travels to track down his hidden safe.

tvmaze69_0035_0002_0013.name: The Deer Hunter
tvmaze69_0035_0002_0013.summary: When Liz learns of a serial killer known as "The Deer Hunter" who tracks his victims like prey, Red helps the task force search for the killer. Meanwhile, the local DC police suspect the city Harbormaster was murdered as Liz struggles to keep her secret from unraveling.

tvmaze69_0036_0002_0014.name: T. Earl King VI
tvmaze69_0036_0002_0014.summary: Former paramour involves Reddington in a deadly game with a wealthy, powerful family dynasty whose ill-begotten fortune was amassed from an underground auction of human and material contraband. Meanwhile, Tom takes on a new mission.

tvmaze69_0037_0002_0015.name: The Major
tvmaze69_0037_0002_0015.summary: When Agent Keen is questioned in court as a suspect in the murder of the DC Harbormaster, her unusual relationship with Red and their task force falls under scrutiny. Meanwhile, Red enlists Cooper and Ressler to locate "The Major," a dangerous former associate who is key in keeping Liz out of prison.

tvmaze69_0038_0002_0016.name: Tom Keen
tvmaze69_0038_0002_0016.summary: As evidence mounts against Liz in the case of the murdered DC Harbormaster, a federal judge makes it clear to her that she will face severe criminal charges. Reddington and Ressler jump into high gear to exonerate Liz but the only solution is to find the recently vanished Tom Keen - wherever he may be operating in world.

tvmaze69_0039_0002_0017.name: The Longevity Initiative
tvmaze69_0039_0002_0017.summary: The task force tracks a scientist who abducts disabled patients to conduct experiments on immortality. Now back in Washington, DC, Tom scrambles to save himself from new enemies.

tvmaze69_0040_0002_0018.name: Vanessa Cruz
tvmaze69_0040_0002_0018.summary: The task force tracks a provocative female Blacklister, a frame-up artist who targets the wealthy elite. Tom pleads for Liz's help. Red pressures Liz for the Fulcrum, claiming it's now a matter of life and death.

tvmaze69_0041_0002_0019.name: Leonard Caul
tvmaze69_0041_0002_0019.summary: As Red fights for his life, he pleads with Liz to track down a key figure from his past with knowledge of the Fulcrum.

tvmaze69_0042_0002_0020.name: Quon Zhang
tvmaze69_0042_0002_0020.summary: After decoding the information that is embedded in The Fulcrum, Red is determined to stop the imminent threat. Meanwhile, the task force discovers that deceased bodies of Chinese-American women are being smuggled out of the country under false identities. Liz continues to search for answers about her past after discovering a picture hidden in Red's secret flat.

tvmaze69_0043_0002_0021.name: Karakurt
tvmaze69_0043_0002_0021.summary: The FBI tracks a dangerous Russian assassin named Karakurt. Liz and Ressler gain insight on Karakurt by visiting Russian Counter-Intelligence, which also provides information about Liz's mother. Meanwhile, Cooper falls into a compromising position.

tvmaze69_0044_0002_0022.name: Tom Connolly
tvmaze69_0044_0002_0022.summary: In the season finale Liz realizes she is being framed by The Cabal forcing Red to use his connections to help her clear her name. As Cooper receives shocking news, Ressler Samar and Aram must decide who on the task force can still be trusted.

tvmaze69_0045_0003_0001.name: The Troll Farmer
tvmaze69_0045_0003_0001.summary: The season premiere kicks off with the FBI hunting Liz for the murder of the Attorney General. Red and Liz are named to the FBI's Ten Most Wanted Fugitives list and set out on the run to evade capture. Red calls upon a Blacklister called "The Troll Farmer," to help them flee the city, while the task force must question whom of their own can still be trusted. Dembe is put in a dangerous and compromising position.

tvmaze69_0046_0003_0002.name: Marvin Gerard
tvmaze69_0046_0003_0002.summary: Ressler is hot on the trail for Liz after she escapes to the Russian embassy for safety. There is no one left for her to trust but Red, who enlists a lawyer named Marvin Gerard to get them out of a sticky hostage situation. Meanwhile, the FBI tries to force Cooper out of the task force.

tvmaze69_0047_0003_0003.name: Eli Matchett
tvmaze69_0047_0003_0003.summary: Red and Liz take a detour towards the Midwest as part of their mission to exonerate Liz and defeat the Cabal. Ressler, Samar and Aram continue to track the fugitives and in the process stumble upon what could become a global food crisis. Meanwhile, Cooper turns to an unlikely ally.

tvmaze69_0048_0003_0004.name: The Djinn
tvmaze69_0048_0003_0004.summary: Red and Liz continue their mission to clear Liz's name. Red enlists the help of the task force to help them find a woman called the Djinn, a mysterious woman who fulfills revenge fantasies. They believe the Djinn can lead them to the Cabal, the next step in exonerating Liz. Harry Lennix, Ryan Eggold, Amir Arison, Mozhan Marne.

tvmaze69_0049_0003_0005.name: Arioch Cain
tvmaze69_0049_0003_0005.summary: An enormous bounty is posted for Agent Keen drawing out any number of unknown assassins while the FBI and Reddington join forces to protect her.

tvmaze69_0050_0003_0006.name: Sir Crispin Crandall
tvmaze69_0050_0003_0006.summary: Red and Liz catch wind that Andras Halmi a trusted advisor of The Director has gone missing. In pursuit of finding Halmi, Red and Liz narrowly escape a violent confrontation. Meanwhile, Tom ends up in a brutal "Fight Club" to find the one man he thinks will be able to exonerate Liz.

tvmaze69_0051_0003_0007.name: Zal Bin Hasaan
tvmaze69_0051_0003_0007.summary: A family tragedy in Samar's past resurfaces when the Task Force hunt for an elusive international terrorist. The FBI and the Cabal gain significant ground in their search for Liz and Red. Meanwhile, Tom encounters complications in his plan to exonerate Liz.

tvmaze69_0052_0003_0008.name: Kings of the Highway
tvmaze69_0052_0003_0008.summary: Red and Liz are unexpectedly separated from each other when Red falls into a dangerous situation. Samar makes a risky decision to help Liz while Tom and Cooper continue on their expedition to exonerate Liz.

tvmaze69_0053_0003_0009.name: The Director
tvmaze69_0053_0003_0009.summary: While Liz awaits trial Red and Aram take bold measures to ensure her protection.

tvmaze69_0054_0003_0010.name: The Director: Conclusion
tvmaze69_0054_0003_0010.summary: As The Cabal prepares to assassinate Liz, Red calls upon the task force to combine efforts to outmaneuver The Cabal to exonerate her. Red delivers a final ultimatum.

tvmaze69_0055_0003_0011.name: Mr. Gregory Devry
tvmaze69_0055_0003_0011.summary: With her name finally cleared, Liz attempts to reclaim her former life. Red works with the task force to infiltrate an assembly of high-level criminals at large in a rare, risky opportunity to capture the heads of the world's most lethal organized crime syndicates.

tvmaze69_0056_0003_0012.name: The Vehm
tvmaze69_0056_0003_0012.summary: After an associate of Red's is murdered by a rare medieval device, he alerts the task force that a vigilante group from the Middle Ages known as "The Holy Vhem" has been resurrected and is lethal. Red teams up with Liz and the task force to stop the assassins before any more of the targets are killed. Meanwhile, upon receiving shocking news, Liz carefully considers her next move.

tvmaze69_0057_0003_0013.name: Alistair Pitt
tvmaze69_0057_0003_0013.summary: Red and Liz work with the taskforce to stop a negotiator who has resurfaced to unite two rival crime families. Tom reconnects with a former flame.

tvmaze69_0058_0003_0014.name: Lady Ambrosia
tvmaze69_0058_0003_0014.summary: After a missing child that has been presumed dead turns up alive, Red and Liz work with the taskforce to search for a dangerous woman who may be kidnapping children. Meanwhile, Tom faces shocking consequences after his plan to help Liz goes awry.

tvmaze69_0059_0003_0015.name: Drexel
tvmaze69_0059_0003_0015.summary: After the founder of a successful internet start-up is found dead, Red recognizes the crime scene as the work of a notorious killer. Liz and the task force work with Red to track the murderer through a dangerous underground news source. Meanwhile, Tom faces a life threatening situation, while Liz considers options for her baby.

tvmaze69_0060_0003_0016.name: The Caretaker
tvmaze69_0060_0003_0016.summary: After a State Department official is found dead in Beijing, Red and Liz link the murder to a secret keeper known as "The Caretaker," who maintains an impenetrable safety deposit vault for criminals. Red and Liz work with the task force to find the Caretaker and his collection of lethal and classified secrets. Meanwhile, Tom makes a risky decision, while Liz persists on her quest to find out more about her mother.

tvmaze69_0061_0003_0017.name: Mr. Solomon
tvmaze69_0061_0003_0017.summary: After Red learns that a tactical nuclear weapon is being targeted by thieves, it's a race against the clock as the task force struggles to stop them -- and prevent an imminent nuclear disaster. Meanwhile, Tom and Liz make a decision that will change their relationship forever.

tvmaze69_0062_0003_0018.name: Mr. Solomon: Conclusion
tvmaze69_0062_0003_0018.summary: After a tragedy puts a member of the team in grave danger, the task force must rely on Red and his unconventional methods to survive. Meanwhile, Tom and Liz face an unexpected complication that could affect their baby's future.

tvmaze69_0063_0003_0019.name: Cape May
tvmaze69_0063_0003_0019.summary: A mysterious beauty on the run from unknown assailants accidentally crosses paths with Reddington and enlists his help to fight back against her attackers.

tvmaze69_0064_0003_0020.name: The Artax Network
tvmaze69_0064_0003_0020.summary: After an unexpected loss devastates the FBI task force, they must track down their assailants; a mysterious group whose agents operate using a worldwide satellite network. Meanwhile, Reddington is forced to confront a ghost from his past -- one who knows many of Red's secrets.

tvmaze69_0065_0003_0021.name: Susan Hargrave
tvmaze69_0065_0003_0021.summary: When Reddington links an elegant, powerful and extremely dangerous woman to the recent tragic events, the task force is forced to play a deadly cat and mouse game to stop her before she strikes again.

tvmaze69_0066_0003_0022.name: Alexander Kirk
tvmaze69_0066_0003_0022.summary: The FBI task force's hunt for revenge nears its endgame. As Reddington and the team close in on the mysterious arch-criminal responsible for recent tragic events, they're forced to operate outside their comfort zone -- and outside the law -- in order to take down their enemy once and for all.

tvmaze69_0067_0003_0023.name: Alexander Kirk: Conclusion
tvmaze69_0067_0003_0023.summary: As Reddington and the task force close in on the person responsible for Liz's death, a shocking betrayal leaves them racing to save one of their own.

show_list.name: Homeland
show_list.summary: The winner of 6 Emmy Awards including Outstanding Drama Series, Homeland is an edge-of-your-seat sensation. Marine Sergeant Nicholas Brody is both a decorated hero and a serious threat. CIA officer Carrie Mathison is tops in her field despite being bipolar. The delicate dance these two complex characters perform, built on lies, suspicion, and desire, is at the heart of this gripping, emotional thriller in which nothing short of the fate of our nation is at stake.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: In the opener of this "Manchurian Candidate"-like political thriller, a marine rescued after eight years as a POW in Afghanistan returns home a war hero. But a CIA operative suspects he may actually be an enemy agent with a connection to Al Qaeda and part of a plan to commit a terrorist act on U.S. soil.

last_episode.name: A False Glimmer
last_episode.summary: The clock runs out.

tvmaze7_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze7_0001_0001_0001.summary: In the opener of this "Manchurian Candidate"-like political thriller, a marine rescued after eight years as a POW in Afghanistan returns home a war hero. But a CIA operative suspects he may actually be an enemy agent with a connection to Al Qaeda and part of a plan to commit a terrorist act on U.S. soil.

tvmaze7_0002_0001_0002.name: Grace
tvmaze7_0002_0001_0002.summary: An undercover agent with connections to a Saudi prince who may be funding terrorist activities provides Carrie with a revealing bit of electronic evidence. Meanwhile, Carrie studies surveillance footage of life in Brody's home, where he appears troubled by traumatic memories and resists Pentagon and media pressure to be hyped as an American war hero.

tvmaze7_0003_0001_0003.name: Clean Skin
tvmaze7_0003_0001_0003.summary: An exclusive television interview will thrust the Brody family into the national spotlight, unless Dana pulls off her plan to sidetrack the whole bogus process. Elsewhere, Carrie and the team sniff out an Al Qaeda attack on American soil; and Carrie's embedded operative in Prince Farid's camp gets trapped in a chilling situation.

tvmaze7_0004_0001_0004.name: Semper I
tvmaze7_0004_0001_0004.summary: Political powers make big plans to promote Brody as a national hero, but erratic behavior on his part threatens his media image. Elsewhere, a desperate Carrie searches for evidence to link Brody with Abu Nazir, while Saul enjoins her to follow the terrorist financier's money trail.

tvmaze7_0005_0001_0005.name: Blind Spot
tvmaze7_0005_0001_0005.summary: Carrie believes her suspicions about Brody may be proven correct when he confronts the sole survivor of the insurgents who held him hostage. But the reunion ultimately raises more questions. Meanwhile, the agency zeros in on Aileen and Faisel, the lovers who used funds from the stolen jewelry to purchase the house near the airport.

tvmaze7_0006_0001_0006.name: The Good Soldier
tvmaze7_0006_0001_0006.summary: Having lost a number of essential personnel to Nazir's terrorist plot against the U.S., the CIA issue polygraph tests on everyone who had contact with them. This includes Brody, which Carrie hopes will reveal the truth about him.

tvmaze7_0007_0001_0007.name: The Weekend
tvmaze7_0007_0001_0007.summary: Carrie and Brody spend a weekend in the countryside, which ends up complicating their relationship further. Elsewhere, Jessica and Mike catch flak about the truth behind their relationship, while Saul catches Aileen hightailing it to Mexico.

tvmaze7_0008_0001_0008.name: Achilles Heel
tvmaze7_0008_0001_0008.summary: While Carrie and Saul are left reeling by the news that Walker is alive, the intelligence organisations squabble over how to capture him. The FBI leans toward using the public's help, but Carrie thinks they should use his family to draw him out. Elsewhere, Brody sets out to find a mysterious man who has surprising info about his years as a captive.

tvmaze7_0009_0001_0009.name: Crossfire
tvmaze7_0009_0001_0009.summary: Brody's efforts to sever ties with Abu Nazir triggers flashbacks to his time as a captive. Meanwhile, the mosque shooting results in a public-relations nightmare for Carrie.

tvmaze7_0010_0001_0010.name: Representative Brody
tvmaze7_0010_0001_0010.summary: Walker's Washington contact is identified by Carrie and Saul, but the target is protected via diplomatic immunity. Meanwhile, political bigwigs approach Brody about running for a disgraced congressman's seat.

tvmaze7_0011_0001_0011.name: The Vest
tvmaze7_0011_0001_0011.summary: When the dust settles from an explosion, Saul finds a manic Carrie hospitalised and realises there may be merit to her wild theories. Meanwhile, with his congressional campaign set to kick off, Brody takes the family on a weekend getaway to Gettysburg, where he obtains an important item.

tvmaze7_0012_0001_0012.name: Marine One
tvmaze7_0012_0001_0012.summary: In the Season 1 finale, a near-catatonic Carrie is confined to bed as Saul puzzles over the unnerving implications of her time line. Elsewhere, Walker settles on a perch from which to complete his mission; and Brody preps for the vice president's policy summit.

tvmaze7_0013_0002_0001.name: The Smile
tvmaze7_0013_0002_0001.summary: In the Season 2 premiere, Brody learns he is the political "future of the party," and receives a tantalizing offer from the vice president, while a recovering Carrie receives a disturbing request from a surprising source. In Beirut, Saul gets involved in some cloak-and-dagger doings.

tvmaze7_0014_0002_0002.name: Beirut is Back
tvmaze7_0014_0002_0002.summary: Carrie reluctantly returns to Beirut and an operation that might possibly spell the end of Abu Nazir; back in Washington, Brody is pressed into service by his handler, and his relationship with Jessica deteriorates. Meanwhile, Capt. Mike Faber has questions about the shooting of Elizabeth Gaines.

tvmaze7_0015_0002_0003.name: State of Independence
tvmaze7_0015_0002_0003.summary: The results of Carrie's Beirut mission lead her to believe that she'll be rejoining the CIA; and Brody discovers that the bomb maker is on a watch list and in imminent danger of being caught. Meanwhile, Jessica steps into the political spotlight.

tvmaze7_0016_0002_0004.name: New Car Smell
tvmaze7_0016_0002_0004.summary: Estes green-lights a covert mission based on intelligence gleaned from Beirut, and picks his own trusted operative to lead it; and Brody is shocked to bump into Carrie at Langley. Meanwhile, Dana and the vice president's son appear to have something in common.

tvmaze7_0017_0002_0005.name: Q&A
tvmaze7_0017_0002_0005.summary: Estes green-lights a covert mission based on intelligence gleaned from Beirut, and picks his own trusted operative to lead it; and Brody is shocked to bump into Carrie at Langley. Meanwhile, Dana and the vice president's son appear to have something in common.

tvmaze7_0018_0002_0006.name: A Gettysburg Address
tvmaze7_0018_0002_0006.summary: Dana's visit to the hospital proves shocking; Faber's interest in Tom Walker piques the CIA's interest; Brody agrees to team with Carrie and Quinn to prevent an attack on the U.S., but his loyalty is called to the fore when Gettysburg once again becomes a focal point of a pivotal engagement.

tvmaze7_0019_0002_0007.name: The Clearing
tvmaze7_0019_0002_0007.summary: In the aftermath of the ambush, Carrie and the team scramble to gain control of the operation, while Brody attends a well-heeled fund-raiser at a Virginia horse farm. Elsewhere, Saul drops in on Aileen, who is in solitary confinement, hoping she can shed some light on the latest attack; and a conflicted Dana leans on Finn to fess up to their crime.

tvmaze7_0020_0002_0008.name: I'll Fly Away
tvmaze7_0020_0002_0008.summary: Brody's juggling of alliances appear to be leading him to a major meltdown, so Carrie, against Quinn's orders, stages a dicey intervention. Meanwhile, a conflicted Dana seeks comfort from an unlikely source.

tvmaze7_0021_0002_0009.name: Two Hats
tvmaze7_0021_0002_0009.summary: Things for Brody are threatening to spiral out of control, forcing him to make a phone call he has been avoiding; Carrie preps for a pivotal meeting; Saul teams with Virgil and Max for an assignment.

tvmaze7_0022_0002_0010.name: Broken Hearts
tvmaze7_0022_0002_0010.summary: Brody and Walden develop a chink in their political relationship, and it may impact their future, while Dana and Finn come to an understanding concerning their differences. Meanwhile, Carrie discovers she's not as looped in as she thought.

tvmaze7_0023_0002_0011.name: In Memoriam
tvmaze7_0023_0002_0011.summary: Carrie's hunt for Nazir continues, but she suspects something's amiss inside the Agency, while interrogation reveals Roya's true colours. Meanwhile, unexpected circumstances put Saul's career in jeopardy

tvmaze7_0024_0002_0012.name: The Choice
tvmaze7_0024_0002_0012.summary: In the Series 2 finale, Carrie is faced with a pivotal decision, while Brody meets with Faber to contemplate the future of the family. Meanwhile, Saul undertakes a secret assignment; and Quinn has a decision to make that may prove to be a game-changer.

tvmaze7_0025_0003_0001.name: Tin Man is Down
tvmaze7_0025_0003_0001.summary: Season 3 begins with Brody remaining at large, while Carrie is called to testify before a senate committee investigating the terrorist bombing in Washington, D.C. Meanwhile, Saul takes command at the CIA; and the Brody family deal with a tragic occurrence.

tvmaze7_0026_0003_0002.name: Uh... Oh... Ah...
tvmaze7_0026_0003_0002.summary: Saul attempts to track down those responsible for the Langley attack and recruits an unlikely expert to follow the money trail.
