Meanwhile, Quinn takes matters into his own hands; Carrie learns who is really on her side; and the Brody family turn to therapy to mend their broken household.

tvmaze7_0027_0003_0003.name: Tower of David
tvmaze7_0027_0003_0003.summary: Brody returns to his faith for guidance in an unexpected way when he finds himself facing increasingly desperate straits. Back in the U.S., Carrie struggles to connect with Saul when a mysterious man offers to help her but at a significant cost.

tvmaze7_0028_0003_0004.name: Game On
tvmaze7_0028_0003_0004.summary: Carrie meets a new client over breakfast and learns that the crippled CIA can still exercise power when needed. Meanwhile, Dana runs away and Jessica seeks the police's help in finding her; and Saul follows the money trail to an unexpected location.

tvmaze7_0029_0003_0005.name: The Yoga Play
tvmaze7_0029_0003_0005.summary: A mysterious man enters the country at the U.S.-Canadian border; Carrie puts her mission on the line to do a risky favor; Saul is forced to socialize with his adversary, Sen. Lockhart, on an elite hunting trip; Dana makes a shocking discovery that could end her getaway for good.

tvmaze7_0030_0003_0006.name: Still Positive
tvmaze7_0030_0003_0006.summary: Carrie turns the tables on the mastermind of the Langley bombing and recruits one of Iran's most powerful operatives. Meanwhile, Saul struggles to keep an intrusive Sen. Lockhart at bay; and Dana makes a radical decision that changes her family forever.

tvmaze7_0031_0003_0007.name: Gerontion
tvmaze7_0031_0003_0007.summary: With his old adversary in custody, Saul makes the gamble of his career. Meanwhile, Carrie and Quinn scramble to contain a local police investigation; and Mira comes to a crossroad in her marriage.

tvmaze7_0032_0003_0008.name: A Red Wheelbarrow
tvmaze7_0032_0003_0008.summary: Carrie and Quinn pursue a key suspect in the Langley bombing; Saul faces political backlash; Fara discovers the high toll that an intelligence job can take; the Brody family receive startling news.

tvmaze7_0033_0003_0009.name: One Last Thing
tvmaze7_0033_0003_0009.summary: Carrie reunites with Brody, but the circumstances are more difficult than either of them imagined. Meanwhile, Saul gets a win from an unlikely source; and Dana struggles with her new life away from home.

tvmaze7_0034_0003_0010.name: Good Night
tvmaze7_0034_0003_0010.summary: Brody embarks on a high-stakes mission, but his fragile condition threatens the operation. Meanwhile, Quinn makes an uncomfortable discovery about Carrie; and Fara is forced to rejoin the team due to a sudden crisis.

tvmaze7_0035_0003_0011.name: Big Man in Tehran
tvmaze7_0035_0003_0011.summary: Brody's loyalty to the mission wavers when he meets a ghost from his past. Meanwhile, Lockhart's confirmation looms; and Saul stares into the precipice between success and failure.

tvmaze7_0036_0003_0012.name: The Star
tvmaze7_0036_0003_0012.summary: Season 3 ends with security forces closing in on Carrie and Brody, and Brody struggling to find redemption. Meanwhile, Saul plans a last-ditch rescue mission.

tvmaze7_0037_0004_0001.name: The Drone Queen
tvmaze7_0037_0004_0001.summary: Carrie makes a vital choice when her counterpart in Islamabad gives her urgent intelligence resulting in a media disaster. Saul has issues with his new position/job.

tvmaze7_0038_0004_0002.name: Trylon and Perisphere
tvmaze7_0038_0004_0002.summary: An inquiry brings Carrie back to the US where she has issues debating between her motherhood duties and her commitment to solving the drone strike issue. Quinn becomes more mentally unstable and an old case worker reveals new information.

tvmaze7_0039_0004_0003.name: Shalwar Kameez
tvmaze7_0039_0004_0003.summary: Carrie attempts to recruit an asset and leaves the US again. Quinn has further issues and communicates with the lady he previous protected and the CIA question his resignation.

tvmaze7_0040_0004_0004.name: Iron in the Fire
tvmaze7_0040_0004_0004.summary: Carrie gets a tip from Redmond regarding Quinn's lead. Saul calls in a favor with an old friend in the Pakistani military. Fara uncovers a deep-rooted conspiracy.

tvmaze7_0041_0004_0005.name: About a Boy
tvmaze7_0041_0004_0005.summary: Carrie tries to earn the trust of a frightened asset. On his way out of town, Saul catches a break when he spots a familiar face. Quinn and Fara stake out a new suspect.

tvmaze7_0042_0004_0006.name: From A to B and Back Again

tvmaze7_0043_0004_0007.name: Redux
tvmaze7_0043_0004_0007.summary: Lockhart arrives in Islamabad to help negotiate Saul's release. Meanwhile, Carrie's investigation gets complicated as she deals with Saul's situation, the search for a hospital employee with the key to Haqqani's true medical condition and a serious threat to her own sharp focus.

tvmaze7_0044_0004_0008.name: Halfway to a Donut
tvmaze7_0044_0004_0008.summary: Carrie organizes a last-ditch operation. Lockhart and Martha stall the ISI.

tvmaze7_0045_0004_0009.name: There's Something Else Going On
tvmaze7_0045_0004_0009.summary: Carrie improvises to salvage her mission; the CIA closes in on a leak

tvmaze7_0046_0004_0010.name: 13 Hours in Islamabad
tvmaze7_0046_0004_0010.summary: The security breach at the Embassy has far reaching consequences.

tvmaze7_0047_0004_0011.name: Krieg Nicht Lieb
tvmaze7_0047_0004_0011.summary: Carrie puts her life on the line to get her team out of Pakistan.

tvmaze7_0048_0004_0012.name: Long Time Coming
tvmaze7_0048_0004_0012.summary: Series 4 ends with Carrie and Saul returning to the U.S. and investigating what she saw in Islamabad.

tvmaze7_0049_0005_0001.name: Separation Anxiety
tvmaze7_0049_0005_0001.summary: While Carrie tries to build a new life in Berlin, a request from her boss forces her back into the world she abandoned.

tvmaze7_0050_0005_0002.name: The Tradition of Hospitality
tvmaze7_0050_0005_0002.summary: Carrie and Düring visit a refugee camp. Saul and Allison are at odds.

tvmaze7_0051_0005_0003.name: Super Powers
tvmaze7_0051_0005_0003.summary: Jonas and Carrie revisit her past. Quinn stalks his prey.

tvmaze7_0052_0005_0004.name: Why Is This Night Different?
tvmaze7_0052_0005_0004.summary: Answers elude Carrie; Laura asks Jonas for help; Saul and Allison run an operation.

tvmaze7_0053_0005_0005.name: Better Call Saul
tvmaze7_0053_0005_0005.summary: The hacktivists rise up; Quinn covers for Carrie; Dar and Allison assess the damage.

tvmaze7_0054_0005_0006.name: Parabiosis
tvmaze7_0054_0005_0006.summary: Saul orders a sweep at the station. Carrie looks to Düring for support.

tvmaze7_0055_0005_0007.name: Oriole
tvmaze7_0055_0005_0007.summary: Carrie reconnects with old friends; Saul opens up to Allison.

tvmaze7_0056_0005_0008.name: All About Allison
tvmaze7_0056_0005_0008.summary: Carrie needs Allison's help. Quinn's plans change.

tvmaze7_0057_0005_0009.name: The Litvinov Ruse
tvmaze7_0057_0005_0009.summary: The CIA and BND make a play.

show_list.name: The Walking Dead
show_list.summary:
The Walking Dead is an American horror drama television series developed by Frank Darabont, based on the comic book series of the same name by Robert Kirkman, Tony Moore, and Charlie Adlard. Andrew Lincoln plays the show's lead character, sheriff's deputy Rick Grimes, who awakens from a months-long coma to confront a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Grimes reunites with his family and becomes the leader of a group he forms with other survivors. Together they struggle to survive in and adapt to a world filled with zombies and some humans who are even more dangerous than the zombies themselves.

The Walking Dead premiered in the U.S. on October 31, 2010, on the cable television channel AMC and internationally in November 2010 on Fox International Channels.AMC has renewed the series each year because of its consistently increasing Nielsen ratings, which have been unprecedentedly high for a cable series, including averaging the most 18- to 49-year-old adult viewers of any cable or broadcast television series during its fourth and fifth seasons.

The series has been well received by critics and nominated for several awards, including the Writers Guild of America Award for Television: New Series and the Golden Globe Award for Best Television Series – Drama.

first_episode.name: Days Gone Bye
first_episode.summary: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma into a world terrorized by the walking dead. Morgan and Duane, whom he meets along the way, help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

previous_episode.name: Last Day on Earth
previous_episode.summary: In the aftermath of a tragic blow, Eugene falls captured by Dwight, a member of the Saviors, whom are hell bent on getting even with Alexandria, Negan teaches Rick and co a brutal lesson, which shows that Rick and co finally have something to fear.

tvmaze73_0001_0001_0001.name: Days Gone Bye
tvmaze73_0001_0001_0001.summary: Rick searches for his family after emerging from a coma into a world terrorized by the walking dead. Morgan and Duane, whom he meets along the way, help teach Rick the new rules for survival.

tvmaze73_0002_0001_0002.name: Guts
tvmaze73_0002_0001_0002.summary: Rick unknowingly causes a group of survivors to be trapped by walkers. The group dynamic devolves from accusations to violence, as Rick must confront an enemy far more dangerous than the undead.

tvmaze73_0003_0001_0003.name: Tell It to the Frogs
tvmaze73_0003_0001_0003.summary: Rick makes a decision to go back to Atlanta to retrieve the bag of guns and save a man's life. Lori and Shane must deal with the surprising return of someone they thought was dead.

tvmaze73_0004_0001_0004.name: Vatos
tvmaze73_0004_0001_0004.summary: Rick's mission to Atlanta is jeopardized when things go awry. Jim becomes unhinged in camp.

tvmaze73_0005_0001_0005.name: Wildfire
tvmaze73_0005_0001_0005.summary: Rick leads the group to the CDC after the attack. Jim must make a terrible life and death decision

tvmaze73_0006_0001_0006.name: TS-19
tvmaze73_0006_0001_0006.summary: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor. But all is not what it seems in their newfound haven.

tvmaze73_0006_0002_0006S01.name: The Walking Dead Webisodes: Torn Apart

tvmaze73_0007_0002_0001.name: What Lies Ahead
tvmaze73_0007_0002_0001.summary: After the CDC explosion, the survivors are still on the move when they encounter a herd of walkers that separates one of their own, leading them to a possible safe haven.

tvmaze73_0008_0002_0002.name: Bloodletting
tvmaze73_0008_0002_0002.summary: Coming to the aid of another, Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get badly needed medical supplies.

tvmaze73_0009_0002_0003.name: Save the Last One
tvmaze73_0009_0002_0003.summary: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by the undead. Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.

tvmaze73_0010_0002_0004.name: Cherokee Rose
tvmaze73_0010_0002_0004.summary: Shane makes a deadly sacrifice which leads to unusual behavior and self-distancing. The rest of the group tries to hang on somewhere between living to die and dying to live.

tvmaze73_0011_0002_0005.name: Chupacabra
tvmaze73_0011_0002_0005.summary: Glenn, the only one breaking barriers between both groups, knows far too much for his comfort level. Daryl finds a sign of life and, in his delirium, tries to make it back to the farm alive.

tvmaze73_0012_0002_0006.name: Secrets
tvmaze73_0012_0002_0006.summary: Secrets are told and secrets are revealed. Hershel refuses to acknowledge the world’s new reality. Andrea comes out of her shell. Everyone is becoming more and more aware that “everything is food for something.”

tvmaze73_0013_0002_0007.name: Pretty Much Dead Already
tvmaze73_0013_0002_0007.summary: Hershel sets a deadline. All secrets are out in the open. Glenn stands up for himself and Shane takes charge.

tvmaze73_0014_0002_0008.name: Nebraska
tvmaze73_0014_0002_0008.summary: Rick and the others try to restore order in the aftermath of a terrible discovery. Hershel takes up an old habit and disappears, Rick and Glenn must follow him into town.

tvmaze73_0015_0002_0009.name: Triggerfinger
tvmaze73_0015_0002_0009.summary: Trapped, Rick, Hershel and Glenn fight to survive against new foes, both dead and alive. Shane finds Lori in danger on the road and makes it his mission to bring her back to the farm.

tvmaze73_0016_0002_0010.name: 18 Miles Out
tvmaze73_0016_0002_0010.summary: Rick and Shane come into conflict over the fate of an outsider. Andrea helps Hershel's youngest daughter face a crucial decision.

tvmaze73_0017_0002_0011.name: Judge, Jury, Executioner
tvmaze73_0017_0002_0011.summary: Rick sides with Shane on an important decision, causing Dale to worry that the group is losing its humanity. Carl's actions have unintended consequences on the group.

tvmaze73_0018_0002_0012.name: Better Angels
tvmaze73_0018_0002_0012.summary: The group learns that someone dangerous may be on the loose near the farm. As night falls, Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn comb the woods to handle the situation and keep the group safe.

tvmaze73_0019_0002_0013.name: Beside the Dying Fire
tvmaze73_0019_0002_0013.summary: Rick and Carl return from the woods to find the farm in jeopardy. The group is split up in the ensuing chaos. With things looking grim, Rick’s leadership is questioned.

tvmaze73_0019_0003_0013S02.name: The Walking Dead Webisodes: Cold Storage

tvmaze73_0020_0003_0001.name: Seed
tvmaze73_0020_0003_0001.summary: With the world growing increasingly more dangerous and Lori’s pregnancy advancing, Rick discovers a potentially safe haven. But first he must secure the premises, pushing his group to its limit.

tvmaze73_0021_0003_0002.name: Sick
tvmaze73_0021_0003_0002.summary: After a traumatic event, a life hangs in the balance. Complicating matters, the group must also deal with a potential threat to their new surroundings.

tvmaze73_0022_0003_0003.name: Walk with Me
tvmaze73_0022_0003_0003.summary: After witnessing an accident, Andrea and Michonne are introduced to a new community of survivors. As conflicts arise with their new acquaintances, a decision must be made.

tvmaze73_0023_0003_0004.name: Killer Within
tvmaze73_0023_0003_0004.summary: The group is severed and lives are put in jeopardy. In Woodbury, Merle has a request for the Governor.

tvmaze73_0024_0003_0005.name: Say the Word
tvmaze73_0024_0003_0005.summary: After another loss, Rick struggles. Michonne remains suspicious of the Governor as he throws a party with a unique twist for the people of Woodbury.

tvmaze73_0025_0003_0006.name: Hounded
tvmaze73_0025_0003_0006.summary: As Andrea grows closer to the Governor, Michonne makes a decision about Woodbury. Glenn and Maggie go on a run. Rick struggles.

tvmaze73_0026_0003_0007.name: When the Dead Come Knocking
tvmaze73_0026_0003_0007.summary: The Governor presses for information. A new guest arrives at the prison, forcing Rick's hand.

tvmaze73_0027_0003_0008.name: Made to Suffer
tvmaze73_0027_0003_0008.summary: Andrea steps up as the people of Woodbury are thrown into uncharted territory. At the prison, a new threat arises.

tvmaze73_0028_0003_0009.name: The Suicide King
tvmaze73_0028_0003_0009.summary: Rick tries to rescue a member of his group. Woodbury is in disarray after a recent attack. New guests raise concerns at the prison.

tvmaze73_0029_0003_0010.name: Home
tvmaze73_0029_0003_0010.summary: As the group debates their next course of action, Rick wanders after a lost friend. Daryl and Merle question their choices. The Governor restores order in Woodbury and makes plans to punish those responsible.

tvmaze73_0030_0003_0011.name: I Ain’t A Judas
tvmaze73_0030_0003_0011.summary: Their security threatened, Rick and the group must make a choice. With Woodbury in a police state, Andrea grows uneasy.

tvmaze73_0031_0003_0012.name: Clear
tvmaze73_0031_0003_0012.summary: Realizing they are heavily outgunned against the Governor's forces, Rick leads an expedition to get more weapons.

tvmaze73_0032_0003_0013.name: Arrow on the Doorpost
tvmaze73_0032_0003_0013.summary: In an effort to prevent any more deaths, Rick and the Governor meet to come up with a peace treaty.

tvmaze73_0033_0003_0014.name: Prey
tvmaze73_0033_0003_0014.summary: The Governor chases a dissenter who fled Woodbury. While the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his upcoming plans.

tvmaze73_0034_0003_0015.name: This Sorrowful Life
tvmaze73_0034_0003_0015.summary: Rick and the group are faced with a serious problem. If they want a truce with the Governor, they will have to make a huge sacrifice.

tvmaze73_0035_0003_0016.name: Welcome to the Tombs
tvmaze73_0035_0003_0016.summary: Rick and the group have to seriously consider if the prison is worth defending as the Governor's impending attack looms over their heads.

tvmaze73_0035_0004_0016S03.name: The Walking Dead Webisodes: The Oath

tvmaze73_0036_0004_0001.name: 30 Days Without an Accident
tvmaze73_0036_0004_0001.summary: Rick and the group are as close to an ideal life as possible at the prison. Will they be able to hold on to humanity in the face of a new evil?

tvmaze73_0037_0004_0002.name: Infected
tvmaze73_0037_0004_0002.summary: As the group faces a brand new enemy, Rick and the others must fight to protect the livelihood they worked so hard to create at the prison.

tvmaze73_0038_0004_0003.name: Isolation
tvmaze73_0038_0004_0003.summary: As one group leaves the prison in search for supplies at a local college, those who stay must deal with recent losses while preserving what remains.

tvmaze73_0039_0004_0004.name: Indifference
tvmaze73_0039_0004_0004.summary: While on a supplies mission to a local college, members of the group run into multiple hurdles. Things at the prison are getting worse.

tvmaze73_0040_0004_0005.name: Internment
tvmaze73_0040_0004_0005.summary: Multiple enemies put pressure on Rick and the group. Could this finally be the breaking point for the survivors and the prison?

tvmaze73_0041_0004_0006.name: Live Bait
tvmaze73_0041_0004_0006.summary: A familiar face returns as each member of the group struggles to find his or her humanity in a world of constant threats.

tvmaze73_0042_0004_0007.name: Dead Weight
tvmaze73_0042_0004_0007.summary: A new and scary chapter is unfolding at a camp outside the prison. Will peace be attainable with the addition of new members?

tvmaze73_0043_0004_0008.name: Too Far Gone
tvmaze73_0043_0004_0008.summary: Just when everything started to calm down at the prison, Rick and his group now face imminent danger and destruction. This time, they might not win.

tvmaze73_0044_0004_0009.name: After
tvmaze73_0044_0004_0009.summary: As Rick deals with old wounds, members of the prison have to come to terms with their new environment and ask themselves if survival alone is enough.

tvmaze73_0045_0004_0010.name: Inmates
tvmaze73_0045_0004_0010.summary: The group encounters many obstacles in their quest to find stability and safety, but sometimes all they have to guide them is hope.

tvmaze73_0046_0004_0011.name: Claimed
tvmaze73_0046_0004_0011.summary: The group encounters many obstacles in their quest to find stability and safety, but sometimes all they have to guide them is hope.

tvmaze73_0047_0004_0012.name: Still
tvmaze73_0047_0004_0012.summary: Faced with the day-to-day survival of life outside shelter, a simple request by someone in the group leads to a bizarre but enlightening mission.

tvmaze73_0048_0004_0013.name: Alone
tvmaze73_0048_0004_0013.summary: As one group finds what may be an ideal shelter, another group comes to realize that the best protection comes from those around them.

tvmaze73_0049_0004_0014.name: The Grove
tvmaze73_0049_0004_0014.summary: After finding an idyllic place to establish a new shelter, the group starts to question whether it is possible to go back to the way things were.

tvmaze73_0050_0004_0015.name: Us
tvmaze73_0050_0004_0015.summary: However brutal some survivors believe they must be to stay alive, we get to see that faith can sometimes be the strongest survival tool.

tvmaze73_0051_0004_0016.name: A
tvmaze73_0051_0004_0016.summary: As multiple paths collide, Rick comes face to face with sheer brutality. Will he and the group have what it takes to survive?

tvmaze73_0051_0004_0016S05.name: Inside The Walking Dead: Walker University

tvmaze73_0052_0005_0001.name: No Sanctuary
tvmaze73_0052_0005_0001.summary: The true motives of the Terminans come to light when Rick and the others end up in a vulnerable situation.

tvmaze73_0053_0005_0002.name: Strangers
tvmaze73_0053_0005_0002.summary: With supplies running low and not knowing whether to trust the people around them, Rick leads a mission where the risk might not be worth the reward.

tvmaze73_0054_0005_0003.name: Four Walls and a Roof
tvmaze73_0054_0005_0003.summary: Rick and the group find themselves pitted against some very nasty people, but they might just have a plan to gain the upper hand.

tvmaze73_0055_0005_0004.name: Slabtown
tvmaze73_0055_0005_0004.summary: In this episode, we get to meet a whole group of other survivors, but what looks safe and nice on the outside has a bit of a dark side.

tvmaze73_0056_0005_0005.name: Self Help
tvmaze73_0056_0005_0005.summary: A new set of issues confront our group while on a mission. Will they be able to push through and survive these challenges? Or better yet, each other?

tvmaze73_0057_0005_0006.name: Consumed
tvmaze73_0057_0005_0006.summary: Cautiously, members of our group must venture into a familiar location on a heroic rescue mission. It's a huge stage, but so are the stakes.

tvmaze73_0058_0005_0007.name: Crossed
tvmaze73_0058_0005_0007.summary: Between holding down the church and going on a rescue mission, our group is spread pretty thin. Is this going to be the breaking point?

tvmaze73_0059_0005_0008.name: Coda
tvmaze73_0059_0005_0008.summary: Rick seeks a peaceful agreement when rules and morals are tossed aside by new enemies.

tvmaze73_0060_0005_0009.name: What Happened and What's Going On
tvmaze73_0060_0005_0009.summary: After the recent trials the group has faced, a slight detour could be the solution they've been searching for.

tvmaze73_0061_0005_0010.name: Them
tvmaze73_0061_0005_0010.summary: Life on the road has left the group beaten and beleaguered. Will they be able to trudge along? Are they even the same people they once were?

tvmaze73_0062_0005_0011.name: The Distance
tvmaze73_0062_0005_0011.summary: After a spectacular storm, Rick and the group meet a seemingly friendly person.

tvmaze73_0063_0005_0012.name: Remember
tvmaze73_0063_0005_0012.summary: Molding into a new lifestyle is proving difficult for the group. Has life on the road proven too treacherous to go back to who they once were?

tvmaze73_0064_0005_0013.name: Forget
tvmaze73_0064_0005_0013.summary: Rick and the group continue to acclimate to their new surroundings. Will they be able to go back to normalcy? Better yet, what is normal now?

tvmaze73_0065_0005_0014.name: Spend
tvmaze73_0065_0005_0014.summary: While trying to secure their new home, Rick and his group face many challenges, some life threatening. Is this really the utopia it seems to be?

tvmaze73_0066_0005_0015.name: Try
tvmaze73_0066_0005_0015.summary: The group realizes that sheltered life might not be possible as life within the walls starts to mimic life outside. Will these setbacks break Rick?

tvmaze73_0067_0005_0016.name: Conquer
tvmaze73_0067_0005_0016.summary: Daryl experiences trouble on a run while Rick and his group continue to feel like outsiders in Alexandria, where trouble is creeping into the gates.

tvmaze73_0068_0006_0001.name: First Time Again
tvmaze73_0068_0006_0001.summary: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.

tvmaze73_0069_0006_0002.name: JSS
tvmaze73_0069_0006_0002.summary: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

tvmaze73_0070_0006_0003.name: Thank You
tvmaze73_0070_0006_0003.summary: Rick and his group get caught up in a dangerous little town on the road back to Alexandria. Meanwhile, Daryl, Sasha and Abraham continue to lead away the remaining walkers away from the safe-zone.

tvmaze73_0071_0006_0004.name: Here's Not Here
tvmaze73_0071_0006_0004.summary: A new face appears; trust issues form.

tvmaze73_0072_0006_0005.name: Now
tvmaze73_0072_0006_0005.summary: Following a number of setbacks, the mood in Alexandria grows grim for the sheltered citizens.

tvmaze73_0073_0006_0006.name: Always Accountable
tvmaze73_0073_0006_0006.summary: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria.

tvmaze73_0074_0006_0007.name: Heads Up
tvmaze73_0074_0006_0007.summary: Alexandria is finally able to begin pulling itself back together; peace is embraced between the two groups.

tvmaze73_0075_0006_0008.name: Start to Finish
tvmaze73_0075_0006_0008.summary: After having a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria yet again. Only this time, the threat might be too big to defeat.

tvmaze73_0076_0006_0009.name: No Way Out
tvmaze73_0076_0006_0009.summary: With walkers inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the group are scared, outnumbered and things are only getting worse.

tvmaze73_0077_0006_0010.name: The Next World
tvmaze73_0077_0006_0010.summary: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

tvmaze73_0078_0006_0011.name: Knots Untie
tvmaze73_0078_0006_0011.summary: After Rick comes to the realization that Alexandria might not be as safe as he thought, decisions must be made about where to go from here.

tvmaze73_0079_0006_0012.name: Not Tomorrow Yet
tvmaze73_0079_0006_0012.summary: Rick and the group realize the only way to maintain the peace of Alexandria is to fight a new enemy. This time, though, our group might be outmatched.

tvmaze73_0080_0006_0013.name: The Same Boat
tvmaze73_0080_0006_0013.summary: With no hope of safety in Alexandria, Rick and his band of survivors soon discover a larger world with new dangers and new opportunities.

tvmaze73_0081_0006_0014.name: Twice as Far
tvmaze73_0081_0006_0014.summary: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.

tvmaze73_0082_0006_0015.name: East
tvmaze73_0082_0006_0015.summary: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

tvmaze73_0083_0006_0016.name: Last Day on Earth
tvmaze73_0083_0006_0016.summary: In the aftermath of a tragic blow, Eugene falls captured by Dwight, a member of the Saviors, whom are hell bent on getting even with Alexandria, Negan teaches Rick and co a brutal lesson, which shows that Rick and co finally have something to fear.

show_list.name: Royal Pains
show_list.summary: "Royal Pains" centers on young doctor Hank Lawson who seems to have it all ... thriving career, beautiful girlfriend, and swank NYC apartment. With one fateful and principled decision in the ER, Hank loses it all. Months later, single and blackballed from the medical community, Hank goes for a weekend in the Hamptons with his best friend. Crashing a party at a mega-mansion on the beach, Hank jumps into action when a guest requires medical attention that only he is able to diagnose. The next morning, Hank is summoned to another mansion. And then another. Hank's career is revived, but in a way he's not exactly happy about, as he becomes the on-call doctor for the rich, famous and infamous. Anyone who's anyone in the Hamptons has a lawyer on retainer. Now meet the newest accessory - the concierge doctor.

first_episode.name: Pilot
first_episode.summary: Dr. Hank Lawson has been recently fired from his job as an emergency room doctor. With an assist from his ambitious brother, he stumbles into a new career as a concierge physician for the rich and privileged in the Hamptons.

previous_episode.name: Lending a Shoulder
previous_episode.summary: Hank has an epiphany after running into his former fiancé; Evan and Paige help Elán through her labor; and Divya envisions a new future for her career and family.

tvmaze771_0001_0001_0001.name: Pilot
tvmaze771_0001_0001_0001.summary: Dr. Hank Lawson has been recently fired from his job as an emergency room doctor. With an assist from his ambitious brother, he stumbles into a new career as a concierge physician for the rich and privileged in the Hamptons.

tvmaze771_0002_0001_0002.name: There Will Be Food
tvmaze771_0002_0001_0002.summary: A ballerina loses consciousness after Evan feeds her hotdogs and other foods she had to give up to maintain her dancer's physique; vulnerable Jill exposes some of her feelings to Hank after funding for her free clinic falls through.

tvmaze771_0003_0001_0003.name: Strategic Planning
tvmaze771_0003_0001_0003.summary: The overbearing wife of a U.S. Senator calls Hank and Divya to perform a discreet physical on her teenage son, who will be the starting quarterback for Notre Dame in the fall.

tvmaze771_0004_0001_0004.name: TB or Not TB
tvmaze771_0004_0001_0004.summary: A chef disappears without treatment after suffering from a stroke; Evan and Divya evaluate their positions in Hank's new business; On the day that Hank had previously planned to get married, he spends time with Jill.

tvmaze771_0005_0001_0005.name: No Man Is an Island
tvmaze771_0005_0001_0005.summary: Hank and Evan take on a job looking after a wealthy family who live on a private island which is technology-free. Despite Hank's better judgment, a woman plans on having her baby right there on the island. Meanwhile, Evan finds himself clashing with a teenage family member. Back at home, Jill struggles with hospital politics.

tvmaze771_0006_0001_0006.name: If I Were a Sick Man
tvmaze771_0006_0001_0006.summary: Hank finds himself needing to quarantine the guests from a party and considers making a call to the County Health to announce a possible outbreak. Elsewhere, Evan makes some interesting facts concerning Divya's personal life, and Jill wants to keep her relationship with Hank under wraps.

tvmaze771_0007_0001_0007.name: Crazy Love
tvmaze771_0007_0001_0007.summary: Hank helps out with victims from a car accident who have injuries which are not apparent. Elsewhere, Jill's childhood pal returns to the Hamptons after receiving a job offer from Boris. Also, Divya examines her relationship a little closer with her fiance after he comes for a visit.

tvmaze771_0008_0001_0008.name: The Honeymoon's Over
tvmaze771_0008_0001_0008.summary: Hank's relationship with Jill becomes strained when he gives care to an illustrator with a heart ailment. Elsewhere, Divya needs to diagnose a shy newlywed before the honeymoon can begin.

tvmaze771_0009_0001_0009.name: It's Like Jamais Vu All Over Again
tvmaze771_0009_0001_0009.summary: During an equestrian show, a young girl falls from her horse and is complaining of strange symptoms which makes Hank believe her father is hiding something. Elsewhere, Divya weighs over telling her dad the truth about her job, and Hank meets Jill's ex-husband.

tvmaze771_0010_0001_0010.name: Am I Blue?
tvmaze771_0010_0001_0010.summary: Tucker's dad tries to kick his drug habit with a rapid detox program, but Hank objects because of it's dangers; Evan tries to prove he can have a female friend; Hank finally hears from Boris, and is invited to New York; Charlie learns about Hank and Jill's relationship, but is not ready to quit trying to patch things up with Jill.

tvmaze771_0011_0001_0011.name: Nobody's Perfect
tvmaze771_0011_0001_0011.summary: While in New York to examine Boris' strange illness, Hank discovers the Gardner family wants to go after his medical license; Evan and Divya face a medical crisis while on a reclusive millionaire's yacht; Jill and her estranged husband clash over the divorce papers.

tvmaze771_0012_0001_0012.name: Wonderland
tvmaze771_0012_0001_0012.summary: Hank treats a woman suffering from hallucinations; Jill allows Charlie to move in temporarily; Divya and Raj prepare for their engagement party.

tvmaze771_0024_0002_0012.name: Open Up Your Yenta Mouth And Say Ah

tvmaze771_0040_0003_0010.name: A Little Art, A Little Science

tvmaze771_0045_0003_0015.name: Hank And The Deep Blue Sea

tvmaze771_0051_0004_0005.name: You Give Love A Bad Name

tvmaze771_0078_0006_0003.name: A Bridge Not Quite Far Enough

tvmaze771_0083_0006_0008.name: I Did Not See That Coming

tvmaze771_0089_0007_0001.name: Rebound
tvmaze771_0089_0007_0001.summary: Hank helps a TV host who is off her game and takes a big step in his personal life. When Evan and Paige buy a new home and get some unexpected news, they learn the next chapter in their lives will be filled with ups and downs. Divya gets more than she bargained for when she saves the life of a young skateboarder on the street, and Boris offers Evan an exciting career opportunity.

tvmaze771_0090_0007_0002.name: False Start
tvmaze771_0090_0007_0002.summary: Hank treats a rookie triathlete who encourages him to try triathlons - and online dating - for himself. Evan and Paige temporarily move into the guesthouse with Hank, and Evan reveals a startling part of his past. Meanwhile, after last week's shocking ending, Jeremiah gets Divya out of a jam and helps her keep things in perspective when a sensationalized video of her starts to spread.

tvmaze771_0091_0007_0003.name: Playing Doctor
tvmaze771_0091_0007_0003.summary: An intense Hollywood method actor wants to shadow Hank to prepare for his next role. Divya performs a genetic test on a royal patient who doesn't want to play by the rules. And Evan accidentally takes his new motto of transparency at Hamptons Heritage a step too far, while Paige learns to put her plans aside and embrace chaos during a home renovation project.

tvmaze771_0092_0007_0004.name: The Prince of Nucleotides
tvmaze771_0092_0007_0004.summary: Hank treats a transgender teenager and learns her life is more complicated than he expected. Evan and Jeremiah host a gala fundraiser for the Center for Rare & Orphan Diseases and Jeremiah makes a major purchase for the lab. Meanwhile Paige and Evan's journey to parenthood takes an unexpected turn, and Divya grows closer to Prince Quami.

tvmaze771_0093_0007_0005.name: Voices Carry
tvmaze771_0093_0007_0005.summary: Hank goes to Manhattan with Olympia, but their time away together isn't exactly what he expected. Evan fears Boris is keeping a secret from him within the hospital, and a surprise visitor from her past leads Divya to feel overwhelmed by the men in her life. Paige is eager for her home renovations to be finished and is shocked when she discovers the reason for the delay.

tvmaze771_0094_0007_0006.name: Secret Asian Man
tvmaze771_0094_0007_0006.summary: Keller calls Hank for help when he suffers an embarrassing medical problem, but Hank believes Keller's new girlfriend may be affecting his health in more ways than one. Divya treats a group of Civil War reenactors who seem to be suffering from a disease more likely to afflict their ancestors. And Evan worries he may be in over his head when he gets roped into a secret project with Boris.

tvmaze771_0095_0007_0007.name: Lama Trauma
tvmaze771_0095_0007_0007.summary: Hank helps Boris prep a secret patient for surgery as Evan tries to chase a bad omen out of the hospital. Meanwhile an offer from Quami leads Divya to make a major decision about her personal life.

tvmaze771_0096_0007_0008.name: Lending a Shoulder
tvmaze771_0096_0007_0008.summary: Hank has an epiphany after running into his former fiancé; Evan and Paige help Elán through her labor; and Divya envisions a new future for her career and family.

show_list.name: Game of Thrones
show_list.summary: Based on the bestselling book series A Song of Ice and Fire by George R.R. Martin, this sprawling new HBO drama is set in a world where summers span decades and winters can last a lifetime. From the scheming south and the savage eastern lands, to the frozen north and ancient Wall that protects the realm from the mysterious darkness beyond, the powerful families of the Seven Kingdoms are locked in a battle for the Iron Throne. This is a story of duplicity and treachery, nobility and honor, conquest and triumph. In the "Game of Thrones", you either win or you die.

previous_episode.name: Oathbreaker
previous_episode.summary: Daenerys meets her future. Bran meets the past. Tommen confronts the High Sparrow. Arya trains to be No One. Varys finds an answer. Ramsay gets a gift.

next_episode.name: Book of the Stranger
next_episode.summary: Tyrion strikes a deal. Jorah and Daario undertake a difficult task. Jaime and Cersei try to improve their situation.

tvmaze82_0001_0001_0001.name: Winter is Coming
tvmaze82_0001_0001_0001.summary: Lord Eddard Stark, ruler of the North, is summoned to court by his old friend, King Robert Baratheon, to serve as the King's Hand. Eddard reluctantly agrees after learning of a possible threat to the King's life. Eddard's bastard son Jon Snow must make a painful decision about his own future, while in the distant east Viserys Targaryen plots to reclaim his father's throne, usurped by Robert, by selling his sister in marriage.

tvmaze82_0002_0001_0002.name: The Kingsroad
tvmaze82_0002_0001_0002.summary: An incident on the Kingsroad threatens Eddard and Robert's friendship. Jon and Tyrion travel to the Wall, where they discover that the reality of the Night's Watch may not match the heroic image of it.

tvmaze82_0003_0001_0003.name: Lord Snow
tvmaze82_0003_0001_0003.summary: Jon Snow attempts to find his place amongst the Night's Watch. Eddard and his daughters arrive at King's Landing.

tvmaze82_0004_0001_0004.name: Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things
tvmaze82_0004_0001_0004.summary: Tyrion stops at Winterfell on his way home and gets a frosty reception from Robb Stark. Eddard's investigation into the death of his predecessor gets underway.

tvmaze82_0005_0001_0005.name: The Wolf and the Lion
tvmaze82_0005_0001_0005.summary: Catelyn's actions on the road have repercussions for Eddard. Tyrion enjoys the dubious hospitality of the Eyrie.

tvmaze82_0006_0001_0006.name: A Golden Crown
tvmaze82_0006_0001_0006.summary: Viserys is increasingly frustrated by the lack of progress towards gaining his crown.

tvmaze82_0007_0001_0007.name: You Win or You Die
tvmaze82_0007_0001_0007.summary: Eddard's investigations in King's Landing reach a climax and a dark secret is revealed.

tvmaze82_0008_0001_0008.name: The Pointy End
tvmaze82_0008_0001_0008.summary: Tyrion joins his father's army with unexpected allies. Events in King's Landing take a turn for the worse as Arya's lessons are put to the test.

tvmaze82_0009_0001_0009.name: Baelor
tvmaze82_0009_0001_0009.summary: Catelyn must negotiate with the irascible Lord Walder Frey.

tvmaze82_0010_0001_0010.name: Fire and Blood
tvmaze82_0010_0001_0010.summary: Daenerys must realize her destiny. Jaime finds himself in an unfamiliar predicament.

tvmaze82_0011_0002_0001.name: The North Remembers
tvmaze82_0011_0002_0001.summary: War grips the continent of Westeros. As Tyrion Lannister tries to take his strong-willed nephew in hand in King's Landing, Stannis Baratheon launches his own campaign to take the Iron Throne with the help of a mysterious priestess. In the east, Daenerys must lead her retinue through a desolate wasteland whilst beyond the Wall the Night's Watch seeks the aid of a wildling.

tvmaze82_0012_0002_0002.name: The Night Lands
tvmaze82_0012_0002_0002.summary: Stannis uses Ser Davos to seek out new allies for his war with the Lannisters. On the road north, Arya confides in Gendry. Robb Stark sends Theon Greyjoy to win an alliance with his father and the fierce warriors of the Iron Islands. Cersei and Tyrion clash on how to rule in King's Landing.

tvmaze82_0013_0002_0003.name: What is Dead May Never Die
tvmaze82_0013_0002_0003.summary: Catelyn Stark treats with King Renly in the hope of winning an alliance. Tyrion undertakes a complex plan in King's Landing to expose an enemy. At Winterfell, Bran's dreams continue to trouble him.

tvmaze82_0014_0002_0004.name: Garden of Bones
tvmaze82_0014_0002_0004.summary: Tyrion attempts to restrain Joffrey's cruelty. Catelyn attempts to broker a peace between Stannis and Renly. Daenerys and her followers arrive at the great city of Qarth and hope to find refuge there. Arya and Gendry arrive at Harrenhal, a great castle now under Lannister occupation.

tvmaze82_0015_0002_0005.name: The Ghost of Harrenhal
tvmaze82_0015_0002_0005.summary: Confusion rages in the Stormlands in the wake of a devastating reversal. Catelyn must flee with a new ally, whilst Littlefinger sees an opportunity in the chaos. Theon seeks to prove himself to his father in battle. Arya receives a promise from the enigmatic Jaqen H'ghar. The Night's Watch arrives at the Fist of the First Men. Daenerys Targaryen receives a marriage proposal.

tvmaze82_0016_0002_0006.name: The Old Gods and the New
tvmaze82_0016_0002_0006.summary: Arya has a surprise visitor; Dany vows to take what is hers; Joffrey meets his subjects; Qhorin gives Jon a chance to prove himself.

tvmaze82_0017_0002_0007.name: A Man Without Honor
tvmaze82_0017_0002_0007.summary: Jaime meets a relative; Theon hunts; Dany receives an invitation.

tvmaze82_0018_0002_0008.name: The Prince of Winterfell
tvmaze82_0018_0002_0008.summary: Theon holds the fort; Arya calls in her debt with Jaqen; Robb is betrayed; Stannis and Davos approach their destination.

tvmaze82_0019_0002_0009.name: Blackwater
tvmaze82_0019_0002_0009.summary: A massive battle rages for control of King's Landing and the Iron Throne.

tvmaze82_0020_0002_0010.name: Valar Morghulis
tvmaze82_0020_0002_0010.summary: Tyrion awakens to a changed situation. King Joffrey doles out rewards to his subjects. As Theon stirs his men to action, Luwin offers some final advice. Brienne silencesJaime; Arya receives a gift from Jaqen; Dany goes to a strange place; Jon proves himself to Qhorin.

tvmaze82_0021_0003_0001.name: Valar Dohaeris
tvmaze82_0021_0003_0001.summary: Jon is brought before Mance Rayder, the King Beyond the Wall, while the Night's Watch survivors retreat south. In King's Landing, Tyrion asks for his reward. Littlefinger offers Sansa a way out. Cersei hosts a dinner for the royal family. Daenerys sails into Slaver's Bay.

tvmaze82_0022_0003_0002.name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
tvmaze82_0022_0003_0002.summary: Sansa (Sophie Turner) says too much. Shae (Sibel Kekilli) asks Tyrion (Peter Dinklage) for a favor. Jaime (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) finds a way to pass the time. Arya (Maisie Williams) runs into the Brotherhood Without Banners.

tvmaze82_0023_0003_0003.name: Walk of Punishment
tvmaze82_0023_0003_0003.summary: Tyrion shoulders new responsibilities. Jon (Kit Harington) is taken to the Fist of the First Men. Daenerys (Emilia Clarke) meets with the slavers. Jaime strikes a deal with his captors.

tvmaze82_0024_0003_0004.name: And Now His Watch is Ended
tvmaze82_0024_0003_0004.summary: The Night's Watch takes stock. Varys (Conleth Hill) meets his better. Arya is taken to the commander of the Brotherhood. Daenerys exchanges a chain for a Whip.

tvmaze82_0025_0003_0005.name: Kissed by Fire
tvmaze82_0025_0003_0005.summary: The Hound (Rory McCann) is judged by the gods; Jaime is judged by men. Jon proves himself; Robb (Richard Madden) is betrayed. Tyrion learns the cost of weddings.

tvmaze82_0026_0003_0006.name: The Climb
tvmaze82_0026_0003_0006.summary: Tywin (Charles Dance) plans strategic unions for the Lannisters. Melisandre (Carice van Houten) visits the Riverlands. Robb (Richard Madden) weighs a compromise to repair his alliance with House Frey. Roose Bolton (Michael McElhatton) decides what to do with Jaime Lannister (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau). Jon (Kit Harington), Ygritte (Rose Leslie) and the Wildlings face a daunting climb.

tvmaze82_0027_0003_0007.name: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
tvmaze82_0027_0003_0007.summary: Daenerys (Emilia Clarke) exchanges gifts with a slave lord outside Yunkai. As Sansa (Sophie Turner) frets about her prospects, Shae (Sibel Kekilli) chafes at Tyrion's (Peter Dinklage) new situation. Tywin counsels the king, and Melisandre reveals a secret to Gendry (Joe Dempsie). Brienne (Gwendoline Christie) faces a formidable foe in Harrenhal.

tvmaze82_0028_0003_0008.name: Second Sons
tvmaze82_0028_0003_0008.summary: King's Landing hosts a wedding, and Tyrion and Sansa spend the night together. Daenerys meets the Titan's Bastard. Davos (Liam Cunningham) demands proof from Melisandre. Sam (John Bradley) and Gilly (Hannah Murray) meet an older Gentleman.

tvmaze82_0029_0003_0009.name: The Rains of Castamere
tvmaze82_0029_0003_0009.summary: Robb (Richard Madden) presents himself to Walder Frey (David Bradley), and Edmure (Tobias Menzies) meets his bride. Jon (Kit Harington) faces his harshest test yet. Bran (Isaac Hempstead Wright) discovers a new gift. Daario (Ed Skrein) and Jorah (Iain Glen) debate how to take Yunkai. House Frey joins with House Tully.

tvmaze82_0030_0003_0010.name: Mhysa
tvmaze82_0030_0003_0010.summary: Joffrey (Jack Gleeson) challenges Tywin (Charles Dance). Bran tells a ghost story. In Dragonstone, mercy comes from strange quarters. Daenerys (Emilia Clarke) waits to see if she is a conqueror or a liberator.

tvmaze82_0031_0004_0001.name: Two Swords
tvmaze82_0031_0004_0001.summary: Tyrion (Peter Dinklage) welcomes a guest to King's Landing. At Castle Black, Jon Snow (Kit Harington) finds himself unwelcome. Dany (Emilia Clarke) is pointed to Meereen, the mother of all slave cities. Arya (Maisie Williams) runs into an old friend.

tvmaze82_0032_0004_0002.name: The Lion and the Rose
tvmaze82_0032_0004_0002.summary: Tyrion lends Jaime (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) a hand. Joffrey (Jack Gleeson) and Margaery (Natalie Dormer) host a breakfast. At Dragonstone, Stannis (Stephen Dillane) loses patience with Davos (Liam Cunningham). Ramsay (Iwan Rheon) finds a purpose for his pet. North of the Wall, Bran (Isaac Hempstead Wright) sees where they must go.

tvmaze82_0033_0004_0003.name: Breaker of Chains
tvmaze82_0033_0004_0003.summary: Tyrion ponders his options. Tywin (Charles Dance) extends an olive branch. Sam (John Bradley) realizes Castle Black isn't safe, and Jon proposes a bold plan. The Hound (Rory McCann) teaches Arya the way things are. Dany chooses her Champion.

tvmaze82_0034_0004_0004.name: Oathkeeper
tvmaze82_0034_0004_0004.summary: Dany balances justice and mercy. Jaime tasks Brienne (Gwendoline Christie) with his honor. Jon secures volunteers while Bran, Jojen (Thomas Brodie-Sangster), Meera (Ellie Kendrick) and Hodor (Kristian Nairn) stumble on shelter.

tvmaze82_0035_0004_0005.name: First of His Name
tvmaze82_0035_0004_0005.summary: Cersei (Lena Headey) and Tywin (Charles Dance) plot the Crown's next move. Dany (Emilia Clarke) discusses future plans. Jon (Kit Harington) embarks on a new mission.

tvmaze82_0036_0004_0006.name: The Laws of Gods and Men
tvmaze82_0036_0004_0006.summary: Stannis (Stephen Dillane) and Davos (Liam Cunningham) set sail with a new strategy. Dany meets with supplicants. Tyrion (Peter Dinklage) faces down his father in the throne room.

tvmaze82_0037_0004_0007.name: Mockingbird
tvmaze82_0037_0004_0007.summary: Tyrion enlists an unlikely ally. Daario (Michiel Huisman) entreats Dany to allow him to do what he does best. Jon's warnings about the Wall's vulnerability fall on deaf ears. Brienne (Gwendoline Christie) follows a new lead on the road with Pod (Daniel Portman).

tvmaze82_0038_0004_0008.name: The Mountain and the Viper
tvmaze82_0038_0004_0008.summary: Mole's Town receives unexpected visitors. Littlefinger's (Aidan Gillen) motives are questioned. Ramsay (Iwan Rhoen) attempts to prove himself to his father. Tyrion's (Peter Dinklage) fate is decided.

tvmaze82_0039_0004_0009.name: The Watchers on the Wall
tvmaze82_0039_0004_0009.summary: Jon Snow (Kit Harington) and the rest of the Night's Watch face the biggest challenge to the Wall yet.

tvmaze82_0040_0004_0010.name: The Children
tvmaze82_0040_0004_0010.summary: An unexpected arrival north of the Wall changes circumstances. Dany (Emilia Clarke) is forced to face harsh realities. Bran (Isaac Hempstead Wright) learns more of his destiny. Tyrion sees the truth of his Situation.

tvmaze82_0041_0005_0001.name: The Wars to Come
tvmaze82_0041_0005_0001.summary: In the Season 5 premiere, Varys discusses a conspiracy with Tyrion; Daenerys' rule faces a new threat; Jon finds himself between two kings; and Cersei and Jaime try to move on from Tywin's demise.

tvmaze82_0042_0005_0002.name: The House of Black and White
tvmaze82_0042_0005_0002.summary: Arya arrives in Braavos; Brienne and Podrick find danger while traveling; Cersei worries about Myrcella in Dorne when Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyn's death; Jon is tempted by Stannis.

tvmaze82_0043_0005_0003.name: High Sparrow
tvmaze82_0043_0005_0003.summary: Cersei meets the High Sparrow after learning of a clergyman's embarrassing tale. Meanwhile, Davos talks to Jon about the future of Winterfell, where Ramsay Snow has just learned the identity of his future bride; Arya grows impatient doing menial tasks in the House of Black and White; and Tyrion searches for more comfortable surroundings on a long trip with Varys.

tvmaze82_0044_0005_0004.name: Sons of the Harpy
tvmaze82_0044_0005_0004.summary: Margaery seeks prudent counsel. Jaime Struggles in foreign lands. Dany answers the Harpy's call.

tvmaze82_0045_0005_0005.name: Kill the Boy
tvmaze82_0045_0005_0005.summary: Dany makes a difficult decision in Meereen. Jon recruits the help of an unexpected ally. Brienne searches for Sansa. Theon remains under Ramsay's control.

tvmaze82_0046_0005_0006.name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
tvmaze82_0046_0005_0006.summary: Arya trains. Jorah and Tyrion run into slavers. Trystane and Myrcella make plans. Jaime and Bronn reach their destination. The Sand Snakes attack.

tvmaze82_0047_0005_0007.name: The Gift
tvmaze82_0047_0005_0007.summary: Jon prepares for conflict. Sansa tries to talk to Theon. Brienne waits for a sign. Stannis remains stubborn. Jaime attempts to reconnect with family.

tvmaze82_0048_0005_0008.name: Hardhome
tvmaze82_0048_0005_0008.summary: Arya makes progress in her training. Sansa confronts an old friend. Cersei struggles. Jon travels.

tvmaze82_0049_0005_0009.name: The Dance of Dragons
tvmaze82_0049_0005_0009.summary: Stannis confronts a troubling decision. Jon returns to The Wall. Mace visits the Iron Bank. Arya encounters someone from her past. Dany reluctantly oversees a traditional celebration of athleticism.

tvmaze82_0050_0005_0010.name: Mother's Mercy
tvmaze82_0050_0005_0010.summary: Cersei seeks forgiveness; Jon faces a new challenge; Arya plots to cross a name off her list; Tyrion sees a familiar face; and Daenerys finds herself surrounded by strangers.

tvmaze82_0050_0006_0010S07.name: Inside Game of Thrones - The Best Seat in the House

tvmaze82_0050_0006_0010S08.name: Inside Game of Thrones - Prosthetics
tvmaze82_0050_0006_0010S08.summary: A glimpse from the prosthetics department of Game of Thrones.

tvmaze82_0051_0006_0001.name: The Red Woman
tvmaze82_0051_0006_0001.summary: Jon Snow is dead. Daenerys meets a strong man. Cersei sees her daughter again.

tvmaze82_0052_0006_0002.name: Home
tvmaze82_0052_0006_0002.summary: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven. In King's Landing, Jaime advises Tommen. Tyrion demands good news, but has to make his own. At Castle Black, the Night's Watch stands behind Thorne. Ramsay Bolton proposes a plan, and Balon Greyjoy entertains other proposals.

tvmaze82_0053_0006_0003.name: Oathbreaker
tvmaze82_0053_0006_0003.summary: Daenerys meets her future. Bran meets the past. Tommen confronts the High Sparrow. Arya trains to be No One. Varys finds an answer. Ramsay gets a gift.

tvmaze82_0054_0006_0004.name: Book of the Stranger
tvmaze82_0054_0006_0004.summary: Tyrion strikes a deal. Jorah and Daario undertake a difficult task. Jaime and Cersei try to improve their situation.

tvmaze82_0055_0006_0005.name: The Door
tvmaze82_0055_0006_0005.summary: Tyrion seeks a strange ally. Bran learns a great deal. Brienne goes on a mission. Arya is given a chance to prove herself.
